<GameName>Space Draw</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Space Draw is a VR creation tool with 3D painting as the main playing method. Users can easily draw a fantastic virtual world.<br />
<br />
The simple and easy to use operation design takes care of various types of users, so that users can quickly understand the fun of painting.<br />
<br />
It provides a new creative concept different from traditional painting and subverts the understanding of traditional painting. Traditional painting is a 3D three-dimensional effect converted into a 2D plane effect.<br />
<br />
Space Draw transforms the painting from a 2D plane to a 3D three-dimensional effect. It has clear visual hierarchy and more visual impact, enabling players to create as they wish.

<GameName>Ansoku</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Ansoku is a relaxing, fun, simple, and yet challenging puzzle game with a high replay value. <br />
<br />
The concept of the game is simple, use the given blocks to create rows, once a row is created it will be cleared and you receive the sum of its points and charge your rotate points. If however, you can no longer place any of the blocks you are given, the game will be over. <br />
<br />
Now also available on desktop, its main intent is to be a game that can be played when you just want to relax. It can run in its own smaller window so you can do things on the side if you wish. No time pressure, play at your own pace and you can stop the game at any time to return where you left off later.<br />
<br />
Play smart and grow your high score!<br />
<br />

<GameName>Greenlander</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>Greenlander</strong> is a brutal top-down action game set in Greenland during the mid-1500's. You play as a Norse settler who takes up the mantle of his Viking ancestors and embarks on a grim quest for revenge against the Sea Pirates that destroyed his home. Greenlander is fast-paced, challenging, and brutal. Cut enemies apart and split their skulls with your Axe, block their swords and arrows with your Shield, and blow them apart with your improvised matchlock cannon Jormungandr.<h2 class="bb_tag">Gameplay</h2><br>Greenlander's gameplay consists of curated combat encounters with multiple ways to complete them. You'll need to experiment with your pathing, enemy kill order, and special abilities to succeed. Over the course of your revenge-fueled journey you'll acquire new equipment and abilities as enemies become stronger and more numerous.<h2 class="bb_tag">Setting</h2><br>Experience a gloomy, medieval Greenland, surrounded by crushing waves and perpetually soaked in torrential rain. WASD to Move, Left Mouse/ R Key to Fight, Right Mouse to Aim, Shift+ Tab to invite friends from Steam. Right now the game is keeping update, we will add more and more crazy functions to this game, please keeping an eye on it, Thanks for your understanding.<br />

这是一个单人/多人剑术射击和格斗竞技场。现在包含2种不同的游戏模式，一种是混沌格斗（4队格斗死亡赛），另一种是团战（2队死亡斗），可以在房间设置页面设置获胜分数，游戏胜负的判断标准是先达到获胜分数的队伍。两种游戏模式各有两张不同的地图。现在它还包含每个玩家的四种不同的职业，他们有不同的能力，你可以在游戏中随时切换角色，但它会耗尽你的一个生命。 欢迎您和您的朋友参加。人们被分成不同的2或3或4团队，利用你的智慧和行动来了解谁将生存，最后一支团队将获得极其丰厚的奖励！分享这个游戏给你的朋友，爱人，父母，同学，老师，同事，祖父母甚至杰弗里达默,玩得开心！<br />

<GameId>2204410</GameId>
<GameName>Manav</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Manav is greengrocer game. Your character gathers his product from garden and sells at town.<br />
<br />
Your main character have a garden with lemon trees, onion plants, garlic plants, parsley plants. You can gather these resources unlimited.<br />
Plants will grow again after few seconds you gather resources. Gathered resources will go to your boxes in the town. <br />
You can carry 3 resources in the town. After select your 3 target resources, you will search for customer who wanted these resources.<br />
If character find customer who wanted any of these resources, can sell his product and gain money. Manav is easy, relaxing game about this gathering and selling resources circle.

<GameId>2204430</GameId>
<GameName>Ruler of the Waves 1916</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<i>Broadside thunder,<br>steel plate sundered,<br>munitions ablaze,<br>once triumphant -<br>sinking to a watery grave,<br>Ruler of the Waves.<br>- Inscriptus</i><br><br><br>Man the turrets of mighty Dreadnought battleships and battlecruisers and blow your enemy out of the water to secure your position as... the Ruler of the Waves!<br><br>Ruler of the Waves 1916 is a naval combat game and turret-based shooter. The main gameplay involves aiming and firing the turrets. Since turrets take 30 seconds to reload, the player must utilize multiple turrets on multiple ships to maximize their firepower. Things are made more difficult due to the movement of the ships and the sea, and consistent accuracy will be a challenge to all but the most experienced gunner. Sink all the enemy boats to achieve victory - with bonus points earned for quickness.<br><br>The game follows, in a fictional sense, the major battlecruiser engagements in WWI such as the Battles of Heligoland Bight and Jutland, which would be the last time ships of this kind reigned supreme before improvements to high-flying aircraft and deep-diving submarines made them all but obsolete. <br><br>Dreadnought-era battleships and battlecruisers are similar in size and firepower, but differ in terms of armor thickness, turret layout, and speed. Battleships are more heavily armored, whereas battlecruisers have the advantage in mobility. <br><br>The player will have an opportunity to board both types of ship and unleash mighty salvos upon the opposing fleet.

Help Mr. Ball have a safe and comfortable trip 1 user reviewsI appreciate it's smooth controls. The game is just as described, every jump requires precision and patience for the right moments. I'm glad I wasn't able to save on my own and load the save if I fell, I feel like the challenge of the game would be reduced too much. Having to start from wherever you land is demoralizing, but I found it to be a part of the fun. Something I wasn't aware of at the start is how much your jump is charged, I was able to figure this out by seeing the light beneath Mr. Ball growing brighter.

You are a hunter gatherer, Finnish man coming back from the woods. You will find your family butchered by something sinister...<br />

Credits<br />

Hunted: Kalevala is made by 3rd year game production students at JAMK, Business Information Technology. Jyväskylä Finland.<br />
Game was made over approximately 4 months, with a lot of hiccups and problems on the way. With no Unreal Engine experience before this project.<br />

Masa Gorse 3 user reviewsReview at: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ijQvCQ__Df4&t=10s
Well this game is not what I expected. A single small environment where you fight a single monster. No explanation of what the point of the story for this game is. No clear instructions on buttons. The only way to get out of the middle of the game is a hard exit or you die. The monster and you can glitch on invisible walls or rocks.The game is pretty and the monster looks cool but that is where the positives end. 

Firstly, the game is using 100% of my GPU. Performance aside, it is not clear at all what you're supposed to do. You can't even look up the controls in the options. You are just dropped into the forest with no weapon or any idea of how to make one, while the OST of the Witcher 3 if it was composed and performed by a drunkard blares in the background.

It has potential, but it needs some more work.

Edit:
The good news is that I found the weapons, the bad is the combat is just terrible.

Cats will hide in all apartments of a multi-storey building. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the bedside tables, check the toilet.... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places.<br><br><strong>Key Features:</strong><br>- 5 floors;<br>- 250 cats;<br>- Hints;<br><br>During the development of this game, we were motivated by the game &quot;<i>A Building Full of Cats</i>&quot;. 9 user reviewsNow if you have played [i]A Building Full of Cats[/i] then you'll find this game strangely familiar. There is a thread in which the creator mentions that they did reach out to the other team asking for permission to borrow the concept which is to clear out several floors that are full of cats.

These levels have their own theme, colour and music. There is one scrollable screen on each floor and a bathroom you have to enter. Now, of the two games this appears to be the lesser one (there are no animations when changing floors) but I enjoyed it just the same. Looking for secret cats that require interaction with objects on our part is just pure fun! 

Perhaps it's best to start with this one of the two games so that the experience with [i]A Building Full of Cats[/i] will be a bit more enjoyable.A blatant rip off of another game with basically the same title, and this one is not as good.  All cats found within 30 minutes, and there are no secrets or surprises.  Achievements don't count on your profile.  I'd recommend the other game over this one.   I'm still giving this one a positive, because it's fine for what it is at the sale price of 40% off.In the game you need to find cute cats in different places of the room, all rooms are unique and visually beautiful.Has lovely colors, has lovely music, and the dev fixes bugs immediately. Is it similar to A Building Full of Cats? Indeed it is since the dev was inspired to make this game due to the other game. Listen folks, we can't get enough hidden kitty games so if you enjoy these types of games then pick this one up as wellI found some cats... Shocker.

As you come home from a long journey to see your son once more, you discover he is gone. A castle has been presumably summoned from thin air and it has a dark, gloomy presence to it. Inspired by the classic Castlevania games from the 80's, you have to fight your way through monsters, unknown creatures, and beasts in order to get to your final destination: the castle. <br><br>At your disposal you have a boomerang that you can throw and also hover in the air with, knives you can pick up throughout the levels and throw at enemies for additional damage, and a holy shield with which you can block damage and jump on top of enemies. You also gain experience from killing enemies, making you even stronger...be careful not to kill too many though. <GameId>2203140</GameId>
<GameName>Keep Sheep</GameName>
<CONTENT>
The newest popular match 3 game Keep Sheep is coming! Compete with players from all over the world! Challenge super difficult puzzle!<br />
<br />
Only 0.1% of the players can solve the puzzle and clear the level! It is said that the IQ of those who clear the level is as high as that of Einstein! Come and challenge yourself!<br />
<br />
How to play Keep Sheep:<br />
There is a groove below, a total of 7 blocks can be placed in the groove.<br />
Match three tiles with the same pattern. Clicking on tiles automatically places them in the groove below. When there are 3 tiles of the same pattern in the groove, they will be automatically eliminated.<br />
*Note: Up to 7 moves can be used to remove three tiles with the same pattern in each round! If the groove is full of tiles, it means you fail. Every step matters!<br />
Tiles will have many layers. Only after the tiles on the upper layer are eliminated, the blocks on the lower layer can be eliminated.<br />
When there are no tiles on the grass, you have successfully cleared the level!<br />
<br />
Keep Sheep FEATURES<br />
Easy match - Challenge your brain through thousands of mahjong puzzles. classic elimination gameplay. The low difficulty level at the beginning will help you quickly get started, and then puzzles will become challenging! Are you ready? <br />
Super difficult puzzle - Only 0.1% of players can clear the level! Will you be one of them? Come and challenge yourself!<br />
New levels every day - A new level is released every day. The difficulty of the level is random, don't give up, the next Einstein is you!<br />
Compete with global users - the leaderboard will display the number of players who pass the level in each region, quickly pass the level to occupy the top of the leaderboard, and win the title of &quot;The King of all sheep&quot;!<br />
Various cute skins - Clear levels to win various skins! More cute free skins are waiting for you!<br />
<br />
Come and play, the next Einstein is you! Start your Keep Sheep  adventure now!

PositiveThis is a scam; ignore the positive reviews--they have nothing to do with this 'game' and are completely misleading.  

Where to begin?  The main menu has 2 options:  Play and exit.  No options.  No instructions.  No tutorial.  Once you start the game, its even worse.  No instructions, terrible graphics.  

Gameplay consists of pressing 3 possible buttons (Q, A, and Z) to summon a worker ant (Q) or some fighter ants (the others).  The works automatically (and with about the stupidest AI imaginable) collect a leaf while you 'control' the warrior ants by clicking on them and sending them to attach the enemy 'base' which is always to the right by clicking on it.  No strategy, no depth.  There's one resource (leaves).  You can't build anything except the 3 types of ants.  Can't build any buildings. 

Oh, and usually if you try to select your ants, it takes about a half dozen times before the game registers it.  Imagine a RTS where there's 1 resource, 3 units which have almost nonexistent AI, completely empty levels, asset flip graphics and--somehow--a completely buggy UI that doesn't register your clicks most of the time.  That's 'Ants of Duty'.  Thank goodness for Steam's refund policy.Interesting game where you can feel like a king ant, it's interesting and fun, I advise you this game, there is interesting gameplay, convenient controls, it is not expensive and worth it to try to play, I really liked it

<GameId>2202770</GameId>
<GameName>Crust Crusaders</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">INTRODUCTION</h2>Crust Crusaders is a shoot 'em up roguelike. You've been abandoned by the rest of your slices and it's your job to find them. Along the way, you'll be rewarded with toppings that offer skills to help you along this journey. The toppings you select effect your abilities. For example, pepperoni gives you a double blaster, while mushrooms give you a shield. Are you ready to find the best topping combination and defeat the evil fruits and veggies and save the planetary pie?<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2202770/extras/CC-01.gif?t=1669833575" /><h2 class="bb_tag">GAMEPLAY</h2>Crust Crusaders uses an auto-rotate feature that allows the player to enjoy the game by switching targeting groups without having to manually rotate. Enemies all have their own set of abilities and fall within three categories: Tank, Damage and Support. Tank has higher health and is usually first to engage. Damage has low health but does more damage with projectiles. Support usually hangs in the back and heals.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2202770/extras/banana-zoom.gif?t=1669833575" /><h2 class="bb_tag">TOPPINGS</h2>There are currently 15+ and 6+ sauces that all provide a unique ability to your slice. The sauces spawn a pet that follows you around.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2202770/extras/hot.gif?t=1669833575" /><h2 class="bb_tag">CONTENT OVERVIEW</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>15+ Toppings<br></li><li>6+ Sauces<br></li><li>Auto rotate controls<br></li><li>Endless gameplay<br></li><li>Unique playthroughs<br></li><li>20+ Enemies with unique abilities<br></li><li>Enemies fall within 3 categories: Tank, Damage and Support</li></ul>

<GameName>Shadow Lens</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Shadow Lens is a found-footage video game set in the 90s. The game was never finished, its release in 2000 was due to developer negligence. I obtained the original code for the game and ported it to PC for you to play. There is a lot of unused content in the game files that can only be accessed with cheats. <br />
<br />
The game case reads:<br />
--------------------------------------------------<br />
Monsters lurk across your uncle's farm.<br />
Collect tools to unlock new areas.<br />
Upgrade your camera to navigate the darkness.<br />
Find your missing daughter.<br />
Discover what happened to her.<br />
Solve puzzles to get items.<br />
Complete quests for the locals.<br />
Get slimed and try again!<br />
--------------------------------------------------<br />
<br />
The player is thrust into the role of a nameless protagonist tasked with investigating the strange happenings on an old farm. Discover the mystery of what happened to your daughter, Hantu. On the journey finding a plethora of tools and items to aid in her search. For example, your upgradable polaroid camera can be used to aluminate dark spaces. But be careful, because monsters often hide in these areas and are hard to see. To find Hantu, puzzles involving items must be solved. Most items can be interacted with, consumed, or picked up with your hand. Mastery of the tools and consumables is the key to finding Her. Hidden secrets from Cheat Codes to Unlockable areas litter the landscape. It is up to you to find them. Are you brave enough to look within the shadows and find Hantu?

<GameId>2203130</GameId>
<GameName>Levels</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This game is a Virtual Reality First Person target shooting experience. You go through each environment in your elevator and clear the targets. The faster you clear them, the more points you get. Its THAT simple! 3 user reviewsI just can't recommend this freebie. I don't think it works as an aim trainer because the gun model is so bad and I don't know of a single VR game that this would train you for. The "gun model" doesn't even have iron sights. 

Also, this free to play title needs better optimization. I was getting shaky gameplay on my RTX 3080. I literally felt like I was doing target practice in the middle of an LA earthquake. 

It has a few levels. I did the levels several times before the 5 minutes was up so that I could post a review. I just wanted to quit real quick and never play again. Good luck to the dev, with some polish, this may be a good target practice / aim trainer in the future, but it's not there currently.I just can't recommend this freebie. I don't think it works as an aim trainer because the gun model is so bad and I don't know of a single VR game that this would train you for. The "gun model" doesn't even have iron sights.

<GAME>
<GameId>2202370</GameId>
<GameName>折镜（prism.im）</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">关于“我”</h2>“我”是一个普通人，目前年纪不大，打工人一枚。从小因为各种原因，有用传统纸笔写日记的习惯。直到科技发展、电脑和互联网普及，偶然发现了这款集存储日记、标记日程表、兴趣聊天室及私信聊天等为一体的小众软件，使用起来简约而有质感，便被深深迷住，并成为忠实用户。每天都坚持在上面写日记。<br>深入了解发现，这款软件不仅好用，而且听说它与“棱镜计划”这个地下研究有关，即这款软件是连接平行宇宙的桥梁。我想和另一个自己对话，我想借助他分享的另一个世界在选择上的的分支，指引自己做出更加正确的决定。或者说，我想知道自己生活的另一种可能性。不过可惜，这只是听说的而已，没有事实依据，但我心存敬畏，我相信这种可能。<h2 class="bb_tag">关于“我”的世界</h2>“我”所处的世界和玩家所在的现实世界是一样的，只不过突然多了一款这样的软件，它充满惊喜和意外，导致形成了一个一定意义上的全新的世界。你是该软件的资深用户，使用多年。我们相信你很快就能熟悉并了解。<h2 class="bb_tag">“我”要做什么</h2>游玩过程中，玩家自行且绝对自由的探索这款软件，以更加了解“我”的故事和面对迎来的意外。玩家会经历各种与“我”所处的现实世界强连接的事件，通过聊天及软件里解锁的新功能等，熟悉并了解后，用玩家现实世界的方式自行代入并了解一个全新的世界。<h2 class="bb_tag">游戏特色</h2><strong>以软件方式呈现</strong><br>我们不会有任何游戏教程和玩家指引。我们希望你能保持探索的心，并代入那个“我”，成为以你意识和选择为主，塑造的全新的“我”。<br><br><strong>创新的对话系统</strong><br>游玩过程中根据你的情绪及主观意愿，发挥你的自由意志，谨慎选择你的每一个选项。分支众多，对话间反复拉扯。在软件里的人都是有血有肉的人，他们会帮助你，也许会给你了解更多的信息，但最好不要挑战他们的耐心。；不过也有可能背叛你，也许他们表里不一，软件中的他们和现实中又完全不一样。没有最好的结局，你甚至到不了你最想要的结局，只有最适合你的结局。<br><br><strong>时常乱序的时间线</strong><br>你需要快速代入到“我”这个角色中，快速整理自己过去、现在以及将来所遭遇的事。串在一起后，自己和身边的一切人与事都将鲜活起来。“我”究竟有怎样的故事，发生了什么，为什么和这款软件紧密连接在了一起。<br><br>总之，《折镜》的世界里你会体验到一个全新的现实世界。这款软件的强大之处在于，它是一个意识体，同时也是个日常生活中常用的软件。背后的故事很大，且细思恐极。整个过程重在体验，颠覆以往对声音、美术、画面等曾经对游戏的固有认知。 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

Feel the music and enjoy the unique shmup experience combining patterns and rhythms.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2202400/extras/howtoplay.png?t=1670089151" /><br><br>Bullets flash to the rythm of the music. Hit the bullets exactly on the beat to destroy them and make chain reactions. Soundstorm combines the intuitive gameplay of music games with the gameplay of tactical shooter games.<br><br>Every of the 6 stages is a well crafted unique piece of art. Each stage has it's own graphics, music and gameplay. No enemy, background or music is reused. Enemies patterns and backgrounds change every minute. The score mechanic keep you come back again and again. The combination of visual and auditory senses make Soundstorm an exciting experience of flow. Most people felt excited and cheerful after testing this shmup.<br><br>Keyboard, Gamepad, Mouse and Touch controls.<br><br>You will probably like SoundStorm if you also like:<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Maximum of excitement in a minimum of time. <br></li><li>Audiovisual perfectly crafted psychedelic experiences.<br></li><li>Interesting gameplay straight to the point: No repetitions, no story, no grinding... just pure gameplay.<br></li><li>Innovative unique gameplay mechanics<br></li><li>Music games<br></li><li>Bullet hell shoot em ups<br></li><li>Tactical shoot 'em ups<br></li><li>Games that Trigger all your senses.</li></ul><br>You probably won't like SoundStorm if you like the following<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Extensive stories and long campaign<br></li><li>Collectables and side quests<br></li><li>Open World with many objectives to kill your time</li></ul>

<GameName>ISO</GameName>

The pictures do not do it justice, this game is beautiful, my jaw dropped at one point. It's also very fun, i love exploring and looking in every corner so this game suits me perfectly. What i thought would entertain me for 10 minutes, i ended up playing for an hour and a half and i still haven't found everything. If you like exploring or collecting all the objectives i cannot recommend this enough.

Edit: I kind of missed this in my playthrough but you can take some really beautiful pictures in the game, check out the devs on twitter to see some of the bestNice and relaxing game you can spend time in and just explore and take pictures you like.00111110 00100000 01001111 01100010 01101010 01100101 01100011 01110100 00111010 00100000 01001110 01100101 01101101 00110000 00101101 00110001 00001101 00001010 00111110 00100000 01001111 01100010 01101010 01100101 01100011 01110100 01101001 01110110 01100101 00111010 00100000 01000011 01100001 01110000 01110100 01110101 01110010 01100101 00100000 01101100 01101001 01110110 01101001 01101110 01100111 00100000 01100010 01100101 01101001 01101110 01100111 01110011 00100000 01101001 01101110 00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101 00100000 01100001 01101110 01101111 01101101 01100001 01101100 01101111 01110101 01110011 00100000 01111010 01101111 01101110 01100101 00001101 00001010 00111110 00100000 01010011 01110100 01100001 01110100 01110101 01110011 00111010 00100000 01010010 01110101 01101110 01101110 01101001 01101110 01100111

[list][b]Liked:[/b]
[*]+ Availability: the game is free
[*]+ Beautiful graphics
[*]+ Professional camera
[*]+ Lots of living creatures to shoot
[*]+ Open world
[*]+ Pleasant nature sounds
[*]+ Unobtrusive soundtrack
[*]+ Simple controls
[*]+ Lots of filters and camera settings
[*]+ In-game encyclopedia
[*]+ To photograph some creatures, you will need endurance and patience

[b]Did not like:[/b]
[*]- Lack of settings
[*]- A small number of frames available for shooting
[*]- A bug at the beginning of the game: when using the prone position for the first time, the character could not stand up again. Until he fell off the cliff.
[*]- At times, when moving through the vines - the character's head begins to spin wildly.[/list]

[b]Conclusion:[/b]
A great little Indie-game in which the player simply has to explore a small map - and take photos of the animals they encounter. The more beautiful and "correct" the photo is taken, the better it will look in the encyclopedia.
An almost real camera is available to the player - in which he can not only use zoom, but also rotate, filters, and adjust the exposure / contrast of the photo. True, during all the manipulations - time does not stand still, therefore, having set the necessary parameters, the player will have to be patient - in order to catch an interesting frame again.
Not all living creatures in the world are harmless - and can sometimes fight back if the player gapes and gets too close. But do not worry - there is no concept of death in the game - after shutdown, the Robot will be restored at the last boot server.
The game is not big, but it's nice to spend time in it - having a rest from the industrial world in the bosom of nature.
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GAME>
<GameId>2202270</GameId>
<GameName>Hunting Life VR: Dove Season</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong><u>NOTE</u></strong>: This game requires a Meta / Oculus VR headset and controllers (Rift S or Quest 2 with Link). <br><br><strong><u>Bag your limit in a one-of-a-kind VR experience!</u></strong><br>From one of the designers of the best-selling Deer Hunter and Bird Hunter series of the past comes a thrilling new hunting game, designed and developed from the beginning to be played in VR! <br><br><br><br><u><strong>The Hunt</strong></u><br>Deep in the immersion of virtual reality, keep your eyes peeled for doves and your shotgun at the ready. But be sure that your target is a dove and not a crow or songbird or you’ll have to pay a fine for breaking the game laws! <br><br>Earn money for each dove that you bag and spend your earnings to buy new guns or “power ups” for a day (such as highlighting downed birds to make them easier to see). Choose your shotgun from a wide assortment of pump-action, semi-auto, side-by-side and over-under (in 12ga, 20ga, and .410). <br><br>Bag rare banded birds and see the location where they were banded and the age of the bird on special certificates in your farmhouse. Can you collect all of the 40+ band locations? Other, even more rare, birds await you in the field as well! <br><br><br><u><strong>Your Hunting Land</strong></u><br>Explore as you hunt your own private 550 acre hunting land. This area is dove heaven, containing sunflower fields, hay fields, wooded thickets and stock tanks. You hunt with a full 24 hour day-night cycle, so you can use your headlamp to get to your hunting spot before sunrise or find that bird that you downed just before shooting hours closed at sunset. <br><br>The realistic dove AI means that you are much more likely to find doves feeding in the early morning and evening, roosting through the midday, and sipping water and picking up some gravel in late mornings and early afternoons. <br><br>Doves can follow different patterns on different days, meaning that spot where you bagged your limit on a previous day may not be nearly as busy the next time you hunt. It is important to know where, and when, feeding and watering areas are…and where the birds roost, as you may kick some birds out of their roost by walking through! <br><br><br><u><strong>Hunt Your Way</strong></u><br>Hunting Life VR: Dove Season allows you customize your hunting experience to be what you want it to be. Do you want a realistic hunting experience with just a few doves that can spot you if you’re not in cover? Go for it! Or maybe you prefer tons of doves with no non-game birds? We’ve got you covered! Want to forget about game laws and just go out and have fun bagging birds with no limits? You can do that too!<br><br><br><u><strong>Action Challenge</strong></u><br>When you’ve gotten comfortable with hunting doves in Dove Season, be sure to try out the Action Challenge where you are set in the path of a never-ending flock of doves and you must down as many as you can before time runs out! Special silver and gold doves are worth more points and they add to your time. Stringing hits together will increase your score multiplier. Action Challenge takes it all: speed, accuracy, target recognition! <br><br>Hunting Life VR lets you enjoy the outdoors your way! <br><br><u><strong>Achievements</strong></u><br>Try to obtain 15 different Steam Achievements, including: <br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>Peas in a Pod</strong> - Down two doves that hit the ground within 3 yards of each other. <br></li><li><strong>Double Trouble</strong> - Down two doves within 2 seconds.<br></li><li><strong>Not a Lost Cause</strong> - Bag 100 doves in a row without losing a single bird.</li></ul><br>Achievements are displayed in-game (per save) in the &quot;farm house&quot;. Some special achievements unlock shotgun skins that can only be obtained through earning the achievement! <br><br><strong><u>Lama glama Game Company</u></strong><br>We are an indie game company and we have roots in the game industry, specifically with hunting games. Lama glama founder, Tom Shiflet, served as producer / game designer on the best selling hunting games from Sunstorm Interactive, including the <strong>Deer Hunter</strong>, <strong>Bird Hunter </strong>and <strong>Rocky Mountain Trophy Hunter</strong> series. Hunting Life VR is returning to our roots as game developers…and combining our passions: enjoying the outdoors and video games! We hope that Dove Season is just the first of many seasons that we can bring to you in Hunting Life VR! 1 user reviews[h1]Experienced on the Meta Quest 2[/h1]

You can view my initial impressions & gameplay here: https://youtu.be/8WVSDbPqN78

I think Hunting Life VR has a good concept. A semi-realistic hunting setup which has you specifically hunting for doves. While the concept is neat, the execution is not. I find it difficult to say anything else positive about the experience.

The biggest thing (maybe) is that the visuals are poor, but also the game is poorly optimized. The game also has arcade-like gun mechanic that has you holding the shotgun with one hand. The gun mechanics are poor overall & just not realistic, along with the reloading being very finnicky. The game also has poor sounds & ugly UI.

Game is running on the Unity Engine. On my RTX 3080, I was getting variable frame rates from 40 to 90 fps throughout, although I did have all the graphical options set to max. You do have full locomotion, along with smooth or snap turning. The VR interactions are very basic here. You hold the shotgun in one hand, you spawn a shell in the off hand. You press grab to open the shotgun chamber with your off-hand and holding down. I had to try multiple times to reload the shotgun.

Overall, this game is just too expensive given the lack of polish, visuals, sounds, presentation, etc. I cannot recommend it.

[b]Rate 4/10.[/b]

[quote]Please note: I received a free Steam key through the Steam Curator Connect program. You can join my Steam Curator group, Oculus Rift Reviews, here: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Oculus_WMR [/quote][h1]Experienced on the Meta Quest 2[/h1]

You can view my initial impressions & gameplay here: https://youtu.be/8WVSDbPqN78

I think Hunting Life VR has a good concept. A semi-realistic hunting setup which has you specifically hunting for doves. While the concept is neat, the execution is not. I find it difficult to say anything else positive about the experience.

The biggest thing (maybe) is that the visuals are poor, but also the game is poorly optimized. The game also has arcade-like gun mechanic that has you holding the shotgun with one hand. The gun mechanics are poor overall & just not realistic, along with the reloading being very finnicky. The game also has poor sounds & ugly UI.

Game is running on the Unity Engine. On my RTX 3080, I was getting variable frame rates from 40 to 90 fps throughout, although I did have all the graphical options set to max. You do have full locomotion, along with smooth or snap turning. The VR interactions are very basic here. You hold the shotgun in one hand, you spawn a shell in the off hand. You press grab to open the shotgun chamber with your off-hand and holding down. I had to try multiple times to reload the shotgun.

Overall, this game is just too expensive given the lack of polish, visuals, sounds, presentation, etc. I cannot recommend it.

[b]Rate 4/10.[/b]

[quote]Please note: I received a free Steam key through the Steam Curator Connect program. You can join my Steam Curator group, Oculus Rift Reviews, here: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Oculus_WMR [/quote][h1]Experienced on the Meta Quest 2[/h1]

You can view my initial impressions & gameplay here: https://youtu.be/8WVSDbPqN78

I think Hunting Life VR has a good concept. A semi-realistic hunting setup which has you specifically hunting for doves. While the concept is neat, the execution is not. I find it difficult to say anything else positive about the experience.

The biggest thing (maybe) is that the visuals are poor, but also the game is poorly optimized. The game also has arcade-like gun mechanic that has you holding the shotgun with one hand. The gun mechanics are poor overall & just not realistic, along with the reloading being very finnicky. The game also has poor sounds & ugly UI.

Game is running on the Unity Engine. On my RTX 3080, I was getting variable frame rates from 40 to 90 fps throughout, although I did have all the graphical options set to max. You do have full locomotion, along with smooth or snap turning. The VR interactions are very basic here. You hold the shotgun in one hand, you spawn a shell in the off hand. You press grab to open the shotgun chamber with your off-hand and holding down. I had to try multiple times to reload the shotgun.

Overall, this game is just too expensive given the lack of polish, visuals, sounds, presentation, etc. I cannot recommend it.

[b]Rate 4/10.[/b]

The water is scarce. You will have to find your own strategy to survive, manage the heat and gather food. <br><br>Who are you and how did you get here?<br><br>Why are you alone?<br><br>Why did people leave this place?<br><br>How do you get back to civilisation?<br><br>And finally, are you really alone...<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2201540/extras/Survival.png?t=1669718844" /><br>Australian wildlife isn't the friendliest in the world. You can either approach them directly with a weapon you crafted earlier, or you can build traps and prepare poisoned baits. <br><br>However, wildlife isn't your biggest problem. Extreme temperatures and dehydration is what usually kills people stranded in the Australian outback. You must find water. You must find shade. You may consider sleeping through the heat of the day and explore the outback at a night time. Or you can gather as much water as you can and continue exploring. You may carefully plan the trip so you stay shaded for most of it. <GameName>Rocket Escape</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Rocket Escape is an innovative 2D platformer about rocket jumping your way to the goal. Despite being around in gaming for a long time, rocket jumping is usually relegated to a side mechanic. However, we believed that rocket jumping could be so much more. Featuring mechanics such as slow motion/rocket time, speedrunning timers, black hole rockets, and more, Rocket Escape is an expansion on the time-tested concept of rocket jumping. We at Compact Square Studios have been working on Rocket Escape as a passion project over the last few years, and we are excited to be able to release the game on Steam and share it with the world.<br><br>We look forward to seeing how you approach and enjoy the game!<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2201680/extras/pickuplaunchersmol.png?t=1670204722" /> 6 user reviewsRocket Escape is a game that takes a lot from Portal.
It's short, it's fun, and it's not something that's really been done before.
For just a few bucks, I'd say it's a great buy.From its inception in 2020 to release in 2022 Rocket Escape has been a labor of love from the burgeoning studio Compact Square. With its simplistic yet detailed art style and portal-esque puzzle levels, Rocket Escape leaves the player not only wanting to finish the game, but also to reach perfection with its level clock. The easy mode makes the game accessible for those less game inclined. The level editor is sure to bring us a ton of fun for a long time to come. <GameName>Cluster Fly</GameName>
<CONTENT>
You control &quot;The Fly&quot;, a spaceship that collects radioactive cargo in a grid-based area.<br>Each cargo grants 10 base-points.<br>Collecting multiple cargo in a row will increase the multiplier and make each consecutive cargo more valuable. Every time the multiplier reaches a multitude of 10, the bar in the bottom-right corner gains a charge. When it's full, the remaining cargo will be automatically collected taking the multiplier into account.<br><br>Enemies interfere by shooting fireballs and lasers.<h2 class="bb_tag">Options</h2><br>Several options are available that change the gameplay.<br><br><strong><u>Cargo</u></strong><br>With the double/triple cargo setting, the cargo must be collected twice/thrice until it is completely collected, granting points each time.<br>However, the multiplier needed to charge the bar increases to a multitude of 20/30.<br><br><u><strong>Lasers</strong></u><br>Additionally lasers will appear at the sides.<br><br><u><strong>Asteroids</strong></u><br>Neither the player nor enemy fire can pass through asteroids.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2201830/extras/laser_asteroid.gif?t=1668788603" /><br><br><strong><u>Bombs</u></strong><br>Bombs explode after a short duration when touched and destroy everything in a 2-tile radius.<br>Chain reactions are possible.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2201830/extras/bomb_explosion-red.gif?t=1668788603" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Infinite number of procedurally generated levels<br></li><li>Difficulty increases infinitely - your skill determines how far you can get<br></li><li> Online Leaderboard<br></li><li>50 minutes electronic music</li></ul>

ABOUT THE GAME<br />
<br />
'Until She sings again' is a romance comedy coming of age visual novel.<br />
<br />
Be the protagonist who has to live his friend, who has become a girl from a guy.<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
SYNOPSIS<br />
<br />
I rented an apartment in Seoul for school.<br />
However, as my roommate suddenly leaves for his hometown, I immediately have to worry about the rent.<br />
At that time, I happened to meet a beautiful girl at the convenience store.<br />
It seemed like she recognized me... and she said that she was my college classmate? Strange, he was definitely a guy!<br />
So we started to Secretly live together.<br />
Will get along with this girl...?<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />

<br />
- The first mainstream gender-bender game in Korea<br />

Venture through beautiful and melancholic environments such as medieval city streets, eldritch forests, ancient dungeons, and unfathomable space dimensions. A world brimming with lore and mystery awaits you.

<GAME>
<GameId>2201040</GameId>
<GameName>IN CELL</GameName>
<CONTENT>
IN CELL is a kinetic visual novel (linear, no choices) about the epidemic of sexless, nationless, and friendless men.  Gender dynamics are currently not functional, sustainable, or beneficial to either men or women.  IN CELL is an uncensored conversation between the sexes.  Not that such a conversation will solve anything.<br />
<br />
There are no specific characters, just mostly nameless men, and women.  It is better to think of men and women as the characters rather than specific people.  There are themes of racism, violence, sex, porn, and pretty much anything you could think of that may bother you.  There's a healthy dose of memes too as the subject matter necessitates it.<br />
<br />
You'll enjoy the hot new dating app &quot;Let's **** Chad!&quot;  You'll consider violence a reasonable solution.  You'll hate, you'll love, and you'll be numb.  IN CELL while primarily written by me does include direct quotes of men from youtube, 4chan, reddit, and other corners of the internet.<br />
<br />
IN CELL does not come from a place of wanting to solve the problem.  It is merely a talking point in the form of a visual novel.  I wanted to write about the modern male experience.  I was inspired by innumerable sources that I won't name as they may not want to be associated with this work.  I've read books, watched hundreds of thousands of hours of youtube videos, browsed forums, and have gone outside.<br />
<br />
I, like many other men, do not like this world.  IN CELL is about our experience as men. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

You and your team enter haunted places to find a possessed item – make sure to stay alert, because the entity possessing it does not take your presence kindly and will try to stop you!<br>Use different tools to locate the possessed item and find out what kind of entity is possessing it – Can you see the item’s reflection in a mirror? Does it scream when you drop it? Does the entity write with the blood of its victims? Then use the right rituals to destroy the vessel before the entity finds you! Can you retain your sanity and finish the task at hand?<br><br>Early Access Features:<br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> <strong>3-step exorcism</strong>: Search, identify, destroy!<br></li><li> <strong>5 different locations</strong>: Explore a city apartment, an abandoned mansion, a haunted police station and more!<br></li><li> <strong>7 different tools</strong>: You’ll need ghost hunting equipment, like Geiger-counters, cameras, or notebooks, to locate the vessel, identify the ghost possessing it, and destroy it!<br></li><li> <strong>1-4 players</strong>: play alone or with your friends.<br></li><li> <strong>Unique entities</strong>: Stay alert and adjust your strategy to the situation, as every entity behaves differently.<br></li><li> <strong>Afterlife</strong>: You might die if you’re not careful, but you can still be helpful to your team!</li></ul>

<GameName>Bremen Hot Strings</GameName>
<CONTENT>
&quot;When the world is in danger, music will save the world&quot;. <br><br>Bremen Hot Strings is a graphic adventure that adapts the original Brothers Grimm fairy tale &quot;Town Musicians of Bremen&quot; within the context of 1930s Germany under the yoke of Nazism.<h2 class="bb_tag">SYNOPSIS</h2> In their dream, to give the concert of their lives and to make known the wonderful &quot;swing life.&quot; The Bremen band Hot Strings, at the opposite of the way of thinking and acting of the current government, will be persecuted by a ruthless SS detective. Especially after the disappearance of one of the beloved members of the group which the rest will work in detective work, in order to find their friend.<h2 class="bb_tag">FEATURES</h2>    • <strong>Visual novel</strong>: Go inside the world of Bremen Hot Strings in an old school point and click graphic adventure (Monkey Island, Hollywood Monsters, etc). Narrated with illustrations that mixes the concept art style with the European graphic novel (Blacksad, Paco Roca, etc). All of this without forgetting the inspiration coming from the wonderful 1993 movie, Swing Kids.<br><br>    • <strong>Gameplay</strong>: Control the four main characters of the Bremen Hot Strings group: Vittorio, Gustave, Klaus and Federico. Each one with a characteristic ability of the animal it represents.<br><br>    • <strong>Inmersive story</strong>: About twenty secondary characters will meet through the six chapters of the story, which will take place from the slums to the upper class mansions in the city of Bremen in the year 1938. Accompany our friends from BHS to overcome all their challenges and challenges, not only at a group level but also at a psychological-personal level, until they lead to different alternative endings.

<CONTENT>
<strong>You are a dice</strong>.<br><br>You can roll dice because you are dice, and<br>You can solve puzzles because you are a dice.<br><br>&quot;Suikoro&quot; is waiting for you to roll as your &quot;intuition&quot; tells you.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214480/extras/explanation_image_1.png?t=1668567575" /><br><br>Roll and step on the &quot;designated panel&quot; on the ground!<br>The &quot;designated panel&quot; on the ground is responsible for opening the goal. To roll to the designated panel, you need to make sure that the eyes on the panel are the same as the eyes on your top, but you change the eyes every time you roll. So, even if you roll honestly, it may not work. When that happens, I recommend that you start over, choose a different puzzle, or get away from &quot;Suikoro&quot; and play another game, or go outside and change your mind.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214480/extras/explanation_image_2.png?t=1668567575" /><br><br>■Change your colors and change your mood!<br>Are your colors white, black and red? If so, try to be a different you once in a while. “List: Game of Candles” is a single player first-person horror game that takes your character back to grandma’s house. As a requirement of your inheritance you must survive five nights in her home. She’s left you with a set of instructions to aid in your survival - but you have to choose your difficulty and make sure you keep up with all the tasks on her list - much more than once. List will get your adrenaline pumping by managing all of these horrible household tasks such as keeping candles lit, feeding the thing in the basement and making sure that baby doll doesn’t make it to the door - but be sure to never turn your back on an open window - or else. Packed full of jump scares and frightening sound and lighting effects List combines all of your worst childhood nightmares with fast-paced gameplay. <h2 class="bb_tag">General</h2><br><strong>Furry Glory</strong> is an <strong>addicting game</strong> in which you have to solve puzzles with <strong>Lovely FURRY Girls</strong><br><br><strong>Incredible Atmosphere</strong>, <strong>Great Music</strong>,<strong> lots of levels with furry girls art in HD quality.</strong><br>The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Several difficulty levels.<br></li><li><strong>Relaxing gameplay</strong><br></li><li><strong>7 HD quality art with beautiful girls</strong><br></li><li><strong>Pleasant atmosphere.</strong></li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Modes:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>EASY</strong> - 4x4<br></li><li><strong>MEDIUM</strong> - 4x6<br></li><li><strong>ADVANCED</strong> - 6x10<br></li><li><strong>HARD</strong> - 8x14<br></li><li><strong>EPIC</strong>- 10x16</li></ul> 1 user reviewsyou can go on Dall-E and recreate these images because they're AI generatedyou can go on Dall-E and recreate these images because they're AI generatedyou can go on Dall-E and recreate these images because they're AI generated
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameName>Furry Immersion</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">General</h2><br><strong>Furry Immersion</strong> is an <strong>addicting game</strong> in which you have to solve puzzles with <strong>Lovely FURRY Girls</strong><br><br><strong>Incredible Atmosphere</strong>, <strong>Great Music</strong>,<strong> lots of levels with furry girls art in HD quality.</strong><br>The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Several difficulty levels.<br></li><li><strong>Relaxing gameplay</strong><br></li><li><strong>7 HD quality art with beautiful girls</strong><br></li><li><strong>Pleasant atmosphere.</strong></li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Modes:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>EASY</strong> - 4x4<br></li><li><strong>MEDIUM</strong> - 4x6<br></li><li><strong>ADVANCED</strong> - 6x10<br></li><li><strong>HARD</strong> - 8x14<br></li><li><strong>EPIC</strong>- 10x16</li></ul> 1 user reviewsit's just AI generated garbageit's just AI generated garbageit's just AI generated garbage

<GAME>
<GameId>2214140</GameId>
<GameName>Tsubaki Hata</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">General</h2><br><strong>Tsubaki Hata</strong> is an <strong>addicting game</strong> in which you have to solve puzzles with <strong>Lovely Girls</strong><br><br><strong>Incredible Atmosphere</strong>, <strong>Great Music</strong>,<strong> lots of levels with girls art in HD quality.</strong><br>The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Several difficulty levels.<br></li><li><strong>Relaxing gameplay</strong><br></li><li><strong>5 HD quality art with beautiful girls</strong><br></li><li><strong>Pleasant atmosphere.</strong></li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Modes:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>EASY</strong> - 4x4<br></li><li><strong>MEDIUM</strong> - 4x6<br></li><li><strong>ADVANCED</strong> - 6x10<br></li><li><strong>HARD</strong> - 8x14<br></li><li><strong>EPIC</strong>- 10x16</li></ul> 1 user reviews[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Tsubaki Hata is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Unreal Quality Games/Rosa Special Studio, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

It gets worse... the Jigsaw Github template has been shamelessly dumped on Steam by Rosa Special Studio a whopping 64 times.  That's got to be a world record for the most asset flip scams from the same template.  Here's some of them so you can see for yourself:

[list]
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1891570]Sokonashi No Me[/url]"

Take a look... these are all [i]exactly the same game![/i]

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Unreal Quality Games/Rosa Special Studio.

<GameName>Pichi Girl</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">General</h2><br><strong>Pichi Girl</strong> is an <strong>addicting game</strong> in which you have to solve puzzles with <strong>Lovely Girls</strong><br><br><strong>Incredible Atmosphere</strong>, <strong>Great Music</strong>,<strong> lots of levels with girls art in HD quality.</strong><br>The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Several difficulty levels.<br></li><li><strong>Relaxing gameplay</strong><br></li><li><strong>5 HD quality art with beautiful girls</strong><br></li><li><strong>Pleasant atmosphere.</strong></li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Modes:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>EASY</strong> - 4x4<br></li><li><strong>MEDIUM</strong> - 4x6<br></li><li><strong>ADVANCED</strong> - 6x10<br></li><li><strong>HARD</strong> - 8x14<br></li><li><strong>EPIC</strong>- 10x16</li></ul> 2 user reviews[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Pichi Girl is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Rosa Special Studio/Unreal Quality Games, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

It gets worse... the Jigsaw Github template has been shamelessly dumped on Steam by Rosa Special Studio a whopping 64 times.  That's got to be a world record for the most asset flip scams from the same template.  Here's some of them so you can see for yourself:

    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1511500]Elven Truth[/url]"

Take a look... these are all [i]exactly the same game![/i]

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Rosa Special Studio/Unreal Quality Games.
This is a pretty good quality jigsaw puzzle game at a low price, but there are only five puzzles which is less than some of my other games. A couple of the pictures are really attractive. There are features like allowing you to separate the edge pieces from the other pieces.[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Pichi Girl is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Rosa Special Studio/Unreal Quality Games, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

It gets worse... the Jigsaw Github template has been shamelessly dumped on Steam by Rosa Special Studio a whopping 64 times.  That's got to be a world record for the most asset flip scams from the same template.  Here's some of them so you can see for yourself:

<GAME>
<GameId>2214160</GameId>
<GameName>Stream Runners: Heroes</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Stream Runners: Heroes is a retro style idle game for live streamers with Twitch Affiliate or Twitch Partner status. The host will start the game and go live on Twitch, letting their viewers (or chat) add Runners to the battle in one of three lanes using Twitch channel points.<br />
<br />
The game includes 6 themes with sprite designs to match the theme. You can choose a theme based on your personal style, or to match whichever game you are playing.<br />
<br />
Fantasy<br />
Cyberpunk<br />
Gothic<br />
Aqua<br />
Super<br />
Magical<br />
<br />
The game can be played by thousands of players, all streamed live on your screen. There are many ways to use this game with your community, it's all up to you and your chat. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2214170</GameId>
<GameName>Wyoming Winter</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214170/extras/t2.png?t=1668386050" /><br><br>In Wyoming Winter you and a group of fellow employees find yourselves snowed in to the Wyoming department of defence building as a blizzard covers the state. You'll soon find out your group is not the only thing trapped in the building. Find unique hiding spots, help your fellow employees, complete risky lockdown tasks and find a weapon to fight back.<br><br><i>Hide in. Hold out. Don't be found.</i><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214170/extras/Overview.png?t=1668386050" /><br>Wyoming Winter is a multiplayer game where one person in the lobby is chosen at random to be the Blight, an almost invincible, fast moving, dark creature that escaped from the lower levels of the Wyoming facility. The rest of the players are employees who's job it is to stop the Blight from escaping the facility. Employees need to either have at least one member alive after 10 minutes or kill the Blight using weapons that can be unlocked from weapon lockers after an employee finishes their list of tasks.<br><br>Wyoming Winter is best played with 3-8 players. Servers are available in Europe, America &amp; Asia.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214170/extras/Gameplay.png?t=1668386050" /><br>Employee's start with a notepad of tasks and a watch. The notebook contains a list of tasks to be completed before the employee is given a final task to locate a weapon. The watch shows how much time the Blight has left to escape. If the timer ends with at least one employee still alive, the employees will win. The Blight has heightened vision and can see well in dark places along with incredible strength that allows it to snap the neck of any employee in an instant. Both the Blight &amp; employees can climb and crouch into unique and crafty hiding places using the climbing system. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2214180</GameId>
<GameName>Grimfield Mystery</GameName>
<CONTENT>

<GameName>Turbo Fat</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2213410/extras/8-sec-teaser.gif?t=1669132890" /><br><br><i>Turbo Fat</i> was inspired by block-stacking games of the 90s, but builds on them with new pieces, new moves, new ways to score, and hilarious level gimmicks! Misdrop a piece? Use a squish move to fix it! Want higher scores? Build up a combo of 10 lines, 20 lines, 100 lines... there is no limit! Waiting for that crucial line piece? Don't wait long, we got rid of those! (Hey, nobody said it would be easy...)<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2213410/extras/spinning_u.gif?t=1669132890" /><strong> Fun and Forgiving for New Puzzlers </strong><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2213410/extras/spinning_u.gif?t=1669132890" /><br><br>Pieces in Turbo Fat can squish through tiny gaps, making it easier to recover from misdrops. Filling up your playfield is fine, too! You don't have to start over. And if you want more help, a set of in-game tutorials guides you through the basics.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2213410/extras/spinning_v.gif?t=1669132890" /><strong> Extreme Challenges for Puzzle Pros </strong><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2213410/extras/spinning_v.gif?t=1669132890" /><br><br>The toughest levels require both expert strategy and blinding finger speed! Arrange pieces into boxes to make high-scoring cakes. String together combos of cakes to keep customers in their seats, and really pack on those calories! The unique control scheme lets you move and lock pieces on the first frame they spawn, allowing for some ridiculous high speed shenanigans.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2213410/extras/spinning_p.gif?t=1669132890" /><strong> There's Something for Everyone </strong><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2213410/extras/spinning_p.gif?t=1669132890" /><br><br>Explore over 100 different levels, each with their own unique twists! Hone your strategies in practice mode, then carry your skills over to Career mode where you can unlock new areas, new levels, and meet a cavalcade of colorful creatures as you expand your restaurant empire.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><strong>Sprawling Story. </strong>The game's unique career mode gives you a new selection of levels each time you play. Progress though 7 regions each with their own cutscenes and characters.<br><br><strong>Clever Levels.</strong> Unlock over 100 different levels in career mode, each with their own clever gimmicks.<br><br><strong>Different ways to practice. </strong>Hone your basic skills in the game's Training Modes such as score attack and time attack. Or try Sandbox mode, a more casual mode where you can play forever without worrying about winning or losing.<br><br><strong>Climb the Ranks.</strong> Prove your skill an in an escalating set of rank challenges designed to test your limits.<br><br><strong>Cute creatures.</strong> Creatively combine over 80 creature parts to make your own unique monster. Or, introduce yourself to dozens of cute community-generated creatures and customers in the game's story and puzzles.<br><br><strong>Banging tunes.</strong> An original 19-song soundtrack composed by Pete Ellison of Diskowarp Records. Your toes will get some exercise as they tap along to these infectious beats.

<GameId>2213490</GameId>
<GameName>Mr.Wise</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Mr. Wise is an interactive visual novel with multiple endings. Story of this game is about two archaeology professors who are friends for long years and their weird discovery which they call &quot;The Tablet&quot;<br />
<br />
Two friends; Mavera and Selnan try to decide whether they should get help from a renowned figure called Mr. Wise to decipher The Tablet's elusive secrets, while trying to find their way when the things got out of hand in this adventure visual novel.<br />
<br />
While the professors try to protect The Tablet and themselves from the formidable schemes they face, the events will unfold ever unpredictably. Every secret they reveal will be endangering them, their loved ones and even the world itself.<br />
<br />
You will be playing as one of these two professors, Selnan or Mavera; who have no other expertise than their profession. You will try to survive the physical dangers by using your not very physical skill set.<br />
<br />
Or, if you could discover the real nature of The Tablet, there remains no danger that can reach you... Who knows? 
</CONTENT>

<GameId>2213650</GameId>
<GameName>PinCOL</GameName>
<CONTENT>
PinCOL is an addictive Action 2D Space Shooter, the Color Damage Mechanics will drive you Crazy !!!<br />
Destroy Enemies, collect Pins and use them to Upgrade Weapons and Ship. <br />
Get Experience in Roguelikemode to Unlock new Ships with Special Powers<br />
<br />
-Main Color Mechanics: The Player Ship can change Color between RED and BLUE, you can be damaged by enemy weapons only if opposite color, same thing with your weapons versus the enemies.<br />
-WEAPONS: Bullet, Missile, Laser, Mine, Flak<br />
-ITEMS: 8 Special Technology to obtain<br />
<br />
-Story Mode:<br />
A solar system fully explorable, defend Planets by destroying all Enemies spawned from Wormholes to get new Items and unlock the Planet's Base station, Mining Station and Refinery, build Mining Drones to get materials from Asteroids, refining into Pins. Other 3 Alien Stations are the second harder objective.<br />
<br />
-Roguelike Mode:<br />
A mode where you have initially one Ship to select at Start, destroy Waves of Enemies to obtain XP and get Upgrades Cards to improve Weapons and Ship Stats. Unlock New Ships gaining Experience every Run.<br />
<br />
NOTE:<br />
Story Mode: under Development, partially completed.<br />
Roguelike Mode: Completed with 5 Zones, planned new Zones and Upgrades in next Updates 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameId>2213680</GameId>
<GameName>Blocktiful</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Blocktiful is a relaxing puzzle/sandbox game.<br />
Combine resources and find recipes to create your own little world. Refine your created landscapes by changing the look of your recipes, whether on land or in the sea. <br />
Gradually unlock new resources or features that, for example, change your world to a certain season.<br />
Rebuild certain templates to make your world special.<br />
<br />
There is no specific goal. Let your creativity run wild and build a world the way you like it!<br />
<br />
Blocktiful is inspired by the great games Townscaper, Islanders and Dorfromantik. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

Can you feed them all in time?<br><br>MopGarden, a variety Twitch streamer, has decided to feed all the local bunnies in her town. As business begins to boom, she moves her veggie cart to other surrounding areas, where the vegetable orders get faster, and <strong>faster</strong>, and <strong><i>FASTER</i></strong>.<br><br><strong>Features</strong><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> <strong>Play through 4+ different worlds, each with varying difficulties.</strong> Bunnies are hungrier and more demanding at different times of day!<br></li><li> <strong>Test your visual skills and reaction time.</strong> As you progress through the game, it gets harder and harder to determine what the bunnies are ordering<br></li><li> <strong>Look out for other pesky animals!</strong> Other animals will drop in to throw a wrench into the vegetable orders.<br></li><li> <strong>No bad stuff!</strong> This game is completely free to play. Embark on an epic adventure across the continent of Pandora as you meet helpful companions along the way that will become lifelong friends. Discover the many secrets of this fully realized 16 bit world. Beautiful anime cutscenes bring the story to life with gorgeous hand drawn art. With a fast paced turn-based battle system Seed of Pandora feels like a game made in the golden era of RPG's, but with many modern day quality of life improvements and an emphasis on fun gameplay.<h2 class="bb_tag">The Story</h2>The Kingdom of Garda, in the southernmost continent of Pandora. Here lies the great Gaia Tree, the tree of life. The seeds of the Gaia Tree are said to have given rise to all life in the world.<br><br><br>The Gaia Sect, a group of monks originally tasked with protecting the Gaia Tree, banished to the endless southern seas by the first King of Garda. They stood accused of heresy and abusing the power they derived from the Gaia Tree's magical seeds. <br><br>Over a century has passed since the war against the Gaia Sect. The citizens of Garda enjoy a simple life of relative peace.<br><br>This is where our adventure begins...

Three strangers awake trapped inside a single body, with no recollection of how this came to be. Your quest is for them to permanently Asunder, Along the way you explore an Open world, Enter Dungeons, Slay Creatures, Collect Loot. All the major Hits in this fantasy Action RPG. <GameName>Boom 2020</GameName>
<CONTENT>
BOOM 2020 is a hardcore shooter which is a sequel to BOOM 2019.<br />
<br />
It continues the story of Boomer our hero as he takes on a mission to take down another corp which is producing robots used for war. Moving through the levels of this building you are being attacked by safety measures such as lighting being turn off, elevator doors being locked, but nothing can stand in your way as you came prepared. but are you ready for the truth, and reality of this mission.<br />
<br />
<br />
BOOM 2020 features a killer Shotgun with satisfying kills as enemies blow up with each of the Cannon like rounds shot.<br />
<br />
While Boom 2020 is a short game it features great fast paced levels which require mastery to come up with cool and awesome runs.<br />
<br />
Each level is unique and can be completed in multiple ways, there is no single straight path to each level, some paths can be easier than others.<br />
<br />
this game is ment to be played in one sitting, roughly 1-3 hours. 2 user reviewsTruly one of the games of our generation. This game is a combination of dungeon crawler, sokoban puzzles and card combat.<br><br><strong>DUNGEON CRAWLER</strong><br>In The Dungeon Rules you will have to explore and find the exit of each dungeon to access the next one. Along the way you will find all kinds of obstacles and enemies.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212690/extras/dungeon-crawler.gif?t=1670390165" /><br><br><strong>SOKOBAN PUZZLES</strong><br>You will have to activate mechanisms and levers to open doors, build bridges, lower spikes, move walls and unblock all kinds of obstacles to reach the exit.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212690/extras/sokoban-puzzles.gif?t=1670390165" /><br><br><strong>MAGIC</strong><br>Magic will help you in your adventure. You will have to avoid these traps. <GameId>2212740</GameId>
<GameName>DAB 12</GameName>
<CONTENT>
DAB 12 is the sequel to the eleven-game series 1trickPwnyta created in her teenage years, and is the first of the series to be published online. In this 2D platforming action-adventure game, you control Dab, the hero of the universe, as he traverses the various enemy-filled biomes of the planet Midhia, including the forest, the volcano, and the jungle island, to defeat the business suit-wielding Capitilizts. Collect powerups to increase your health and attack power, and use your trusty spear to vanquish The Capitilizts, skeletons, sentient mushrooms, massive rock golems, and more! 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2212750</GameId>
<GameName>The Asher Asylum</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Explore the abandoned Asher Asylum in an effort to find a missing cop.  Learn about the horrors plaguing the old asylum, and try to find a way to stop its cursed residents from leaving.  <br />
This indie horror FPS is designed as a throw-back to the late 2000s indie horror scene, complete with collectibles, pages of lore, inventory management, clunky combat, and multiple endings, all intended to capture the glory days of internet horror games, both the good parts and the bad parts. 1 user reviewsI played this game for about 2 hours today and I love it. The atmosphere is great, it has great jump scares, good mechanics and a good inventory system. Enemies will clip through doors sometimes but they're easy to run from and lose interest after you get a certain distance away. I would definitely recommend this game for anyone that loves horror games and can't wait to get back to it tomorrow.

*Edit*

<GAME>
<GameId>2212840</GameId>
<GameName>Prehistoric World: A New Beginning</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Prehistoric World: A New Beginning is a strategy game set in an open world. As a representative of a private company, you have been given the task of building a complete, functional dinosaur fauna on a newly discovered planet while maximizing your company's profits. You have more than 42 species of dinosaurs to choose from - herbivores, predators, pterosaurs, aquatic dinosaurs.  You have access to many locations on the planet where you can try to revive the Jurassic era. <br><br>You can organize expeditions and hunts for profit, or you can solve situations by landing on the planet yourself. Technology also allows you to control the brain of any dinosaur you have on the planet. You can also breed dinosaurs, sell their eggs, and perform a variety of tasks. There is also a native alien fauna on the planet that you must suppress.<br><br><br><br><strong>STORY</strong><br>66 million years ago, a 15-kilometre asteroid, Chicxulub, crashed into Earth.  The impact of the trillion-ton meteorite was enormously powerful and caused a worldwide ecological disaster. This catastrophe caused the last known mass extinction at the turn of the Mesozoic Era and ended the dominance of the dinosaurs. The impact created a crater 80 kilometres wide and 30 kilometres deep. The impact released enormous energy, resulting in fires, earthquakes and megatsunamis. The worst effects of the impact lasted 30 years. The impact winter that followed the impact lasted more than a century. The entire planet was affected. The disaster wiped out 75 percent of life on Earth.<br><br>By 2190, scientists had deciphered the dinosaurs' DNA and learned to reconstruct it. In 2220, the technology of traveling at the speed of light was discovered and successfully tested.  The exploration and settlement of planets beyond our solar system began.<br><br>In 2362, a private company, ACTAS, found a planet that is 85% similar to our earth from 66 million years ago. The planet was named Hope. The company decided to reconstruct the dinosaur fauna and use it for commercial purposes. The entire planet was declared a protected reserve. Only paying visitors are allowed on the planet. Some private companies have not recognised this move by ACTAS. The company expects huge profits from this unique attraction.<br><br>The first step was to build a space station in the orbit of Hope. Samples of several dozen dinosaurs were brought to the station. The entire planet has been fairly well mapped. Locations were selected for dinosaur settlement where there is less of an abundance of alien species inhabiting the planet. The company has appointed you director of the planetary colonization project. Your task is to build a functional and harmonious fauna on the planet and maximize the company's profits. And here begins your new adventure! 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameName>Robocoder - Dwarf Mountain</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Tested to work on the <strong>Steam Deck</strong>!, <u>Over 4 hours of playtime</u> using our <i>Extreme Battery Saver</i> setting!<br><br>Niko's job as a Robocoder is to operate his discovery droid through the levels by writing programs for Mar10.<br>Develop your logic skills and progress through a hand crafted story-driven world on a fantastic adventure.<br>Experience the joys and troubles of programming an <strong>open-loop robot</strong> with <strong>True sandbox simulations</strong> to keep you on the edge of your seat!<br>Training your logic has never been so much fun!<br><br>10 Amazing Handcrafted re-playable Levels (<i>More on the way, Check out the early access section for details</i>)<br><strong>Made in Unreal Engine 5!<br><strong></strong><br>Great Sound Track.</strong><br><br><br><strong>LiveLink Playground</strong> <i>Real-time programming</i><strong> sandbox with physics toys and puzzles</strong>! 1 user reviewsBrilliantly simple to understand game, but by level 2 I was addicted.  Have not completed entire game, but I am trying to make sure I find all the coins on each level before continuing on.  Levels grow in difficulty and length.  With the programmable robot having a slight difference in each run, your programming decisions become more and more important for the first several lines of codes as those make a huge change by the end of the level.  Not a game I thought I would enjoy, but have found myself playing it all the time when I'm just sitting at the desk.  I really enjoy the way the scenery changes as the levels progress.  Will update as I complete the remaining levels.

<GAME>
<GameId>2212940</GameId>
<GameName>Turn back the clock：Hsinchu</GameName>
<CONTENT>
&quot;Turn back the clock：Hsinchu&quot; takes the historical time and space of Hsinchu City, Taiwan as the background of the game. The story revolves around the common adventure between a contemporary historian and an agent of the Time and Space Security Bureau from the future. In the plot, the player needs to alternately play the two protagonists, using a dual-perspective method, to gradually explore the truth of the event in the process of rectifying and repairing historical events.<br />
<br />
The scene design of this game is based on real historical time and space, creating a very high sense of immersion in the age, allowing players to experience the historical time and space changes and cultural connotations of Hsinchu City while playing.<br />
<br />
Feature of the product:<br />
<br />
■Distinctive art style: The game art is realized in a simple Low Poly style, which simply but completely retains the architectural and humanistic characteristics of Hsinchu in various eras.<br />
<br />
■Through the plot based on historical facts: We invite professional film and television screenwriters Monica and Shaballe to write, and plan chapters in the mode of unit drama. The game plot is based on historical events, supplemented by a sci-fi time-space travel worldview, allowing players to have more magical imagination space for established historical events.<br />
<br />
■Double protagonist line: Players can choose the characters to play according to the progress of the plot, and experience the same script from different character perspectives as the starting point. The two protagonists will also experience conflict, cooperation, choice, and other plots, adding a touch to the script color.<br />
<br />
■Abundant action and puzzle-solving elements: The game is not limited to static observation and puzzle-solving, but also has dynamic action elements for players to complete when encountering emergencies.<br />
<br />
■360 Surround View Video Appreciation: Provides five scenic spots with 4K high-resolution stereo shooting in VR 180/360, players can see the current situation of Hsinchu scenic spots. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameId>2212390</GameId>
<GameName>AOI</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Introduction to the game:<br>AOI is a 2d horizontal board platform jumping game similar to the Galaxy Warrior Demon City. You will play the little girl AOI to explore a fantastic world,<br>AOI wakes up from sleep and loses her memory. As the game goes on, her memory will be gradually awakened and the truth of the world will emerge.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212390/extras/attac.png?t=1669951134" /><br><br>- This is a single player adventure game, requiring players to jump, fight, and a little decryption.<br><br>- The game process of this work has a certain degree of freedom, mainly in the following two aspects:<br>     *The game maps are connected, and players can select the attack sequence of the map area to a certain extent.<br>     *Players can pass through the game in the initial state, or win gold coins by defeating the enemy, and then go to the store to buy powerful weapons, energy stones and other ways to improve themselves, and then challenge the boss. Players can decide according to their own preferences.<br><br>- The game has challenging levels and Boss battles.<br><br>- Players can carry 3 kinds of weapons at the same time. The attack means of each weapon are completely different, and they can switch instantaneously, so that players can achieve their unique fighting style and freely combine their fighting skills.<br><br>- There is almost no mandatory plot animation in the game. Players who only like jumping and fighting can completely ignore the plot. Players who like the plot can also explore the plot of the game through NPC dialogues and scattered information.<br><br>The game supports the key modification of the handle and keyboard, and has made the corresponding UI prompt adaptation. Players can set according to their own habits. Players can simply use ordinary attack clearance games. You can also choose to match different weapons to achieve the combination of skills, or grasp the opportunity to fight with the enemy to make yourself invincible. In short, the game design concept is to give players enough freedom to choose their own way to experience this wonderful journey. 
</CONTENT>
