<GameName>Full Gear</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<i>Songs of steam and bright machines...</i><br><br><strong>Welcome to Full Gear! </strong>This steampunk-style traditional roguelike is all about information: learn new things, die from an unknown attack, repeat. Use goggles, guns and gadgets to get a gain on the gears, and find... whatever you're looking for down there. You keep forgetting your goal, don't you Devi? Eyes on the prize!<br>With more than 200 unique items to equip, throw, shoot, learn and lose, there's plenty of possibilities to crash your wrench into the drones patrolling the area. And sometimes your own drones as well. Featuring:<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>8 sprawling areas, all in one giant room, to traverse</li><li>48 unique enemies, completely animated in cute pixel art style</li><li>6 NPC's with their own hopes, dreams, aspirations, and make-shift shops</li><li>9 Boosts and 9 Challenges to make the game harder - or easier - at will</li><li>6 main bosses and 1 final boss</li><li>28 Steam achievements!</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Make Your Own Death Machines</h2>Ah, but using a weapon is never quite enough, is it? You need additional firepower! Gather Parts and combine them in any way you like using local Drone Stations, then let the crafted <strong>Drones </strong>roam near you, distracting and eliminating any threat. You can make a killer robot with three flamethrowers moving at lightning speed - or a cute companion with a taser called Randy. Nobody's safe from Randy. <br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212500/extras/gif4.gif?t=1669725842" /><h2 class="bb_tag">A Turn Of Events</h2>That cogwheel of yours isn't just for decoration, it's your essence. Whenever a <strong>Token </strong>reaches the top, it'll activate whatever it does - heal you, shield you, give a Crit, give Scrap, or allow a Drone to fire. Re-arrange these Wheel Tokens to whatever you see fit, and before you can say &quot;hey watch this&quot; you deal 40 damage in one attack.<br>Not enough slots for your tokens to fit? No big deal! Swap <strong>cogwheels </strong>to get more slots, stacked slots, special tokens or more regeneration to increase your active capacity. But beware - larger cogwheels may have more slots, but consequently, each slot activate less often.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212500/extras/gif1A.gif?t=1669725842" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Block And Unlock</h2>Many items are locked at first, but in-game <strong>Goals </strong>can be tracked to unlock them. How do you get 5 Curse? Deal 30 damage? Use a Reclaimer? The items you gain from completing goals interact with those mechanics heavily! Additionally, you can simply choose Traditional Mode, where all items are unlocked from the start and Goals are purely cosmetic. Excellent for those living the rogue-life.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212500/extras/gif2A.gif?t=1669725842" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Remembered History</h2>You aren't alone. Maybe that's for the best.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212500/extras/gif3.gif?t=1669725842" /><br><br>There's people down here. Actual people, Devi. Maybe they have some information. You'll need every bit of it.<br>They have stories to tell? About mechanics? Good. About the lore? Hm, is that interesting?<br>Are they of use? They clearly have things they can give you. Maybe it's worth your time after all.<br><br>Getting them out of this place?<br>What, are you insane?<br><br><strong><i>See you around.</i></strong>

<GameId>2212520</GameId>
<GameName>The Last Werewolf</GameName>
<CONTENT>
The Last Werewolf is a 2.5D supernatural mystery where you play as Lachie, a twenty-something lone werewolf, in search of more like her. As she looks for them, she investigates supernatural cases to get her one step closer to her heritage. <br><br>In this narrative-driven game, you will be able to chat with the people in the town, follow the clues, and fill out your journal along the way. Your decisions will impact the outcome of your case. If you rely on your Wolf Sense too much, or get grumpy with people, you'll shift into your wolf form, causing gossip in the town, and leaving the original case to go cold.<br><br>Inspiration for this narrative was taken from my first project which was a VR project for a University Master's degree.<br><br>This game will be in Early Access for about a year, with each case being released in stages. As I'm a solo dev who works on the side. If I'm able to hire some freelancers, I should be able to bring forward the official release date.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212520/extras/Cultural_Centre.gif?t=1668036023" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Current Features</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> Three cases are planned.<br></li><li>Investigate and learn about supernatural creatures.<br></li><li>Make decisions that impact the outcome of the cases.<br></li><li>Wolf Sense: get hints along the way, but too much, and your wolf takes over.<br></li><li>Interactive chats with townsfolk.<br></li><li>Light puzzles.</li></ul> 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2212580</GameId>
<GameName>Barbelé</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Barbelé is an Action and 3D Fighting, 3rd person game. It's a story driven adventure in a french prison which offers players dialogue choices.<br />
You will have to do your time in prison, survive in a penitentiary with a real in game timer that you can influence with your action. You can make it pass quicker if you can smuggle things like a phone or books in your cell, or you can even add more time if you get caught fighting or doing anything else illegal.<br />
<br />
Barbelé was born under the name “GS project” for “sacrificed generation”. This idea that young immigrants from the projects go through the same thing over and over again. Like a cycle that does not allow you to move forward. Barbelé wants to be an analysis of society, of the police, of justice, of young people in the projects.<br />
The main feature of Barbelé is combat. The goal of the game is to get out of jail. After being sentenced to 2 years in prison, the player will have to try to survive to get out. A system of &quot;timer&quot; present in the game makes it possible to &quot;do your time&quot; to arrive at the moment when you become free. With each fight that you will make in front of witnesses of the penitentiary administration, you will add time to your sentence, you can even be sent to the &quot;hole&quot; for a given time so that you reflect on your actions.<br />
Several ways will be accessible to &quot;do your time&quot; and finally get out of prison. Not making waves and letting yourself be eaten by ill-intentioned prisoners can get you out sooner with reduced sentences or with your feet first... Fighting intelligently will offer you some advantages without risking increasing your time, and on the other hand, constantly fighting will help to establish your position in the prison, make money and easily get a phone in your cell to prepare for the rest of your incarceration. But this can get you into serious trouble, additional penalties that will constantly delay your exit.<br />
The use of the cell phone will be a major component of the game and there too, it will be necessary to learn to identify the guards' rounds and the schedules to know when it is possible to use the phone without risking being caught, which will result in an additional time, the loss of the phone which is very difficult to recover, and a passage to the hole.<br />
There are other ways to get out of jail...

<GameName>Bounty</GameName>
<CONTENT>
A student project made in Unreal Engine 4 at SAE Expression College. A demo level from our game Bounty.<br />
<br />
Bounty is a first-person shooter bounty-hunting game. The player lands on a space station overrun with robotic bounty hunters. The player must locate and kill the bounty. The player is equipped with a six-shooter that shoots explosive rounds. The player fights through the robot bounty hunters to claim the ultimate prize, his reward. The game is a tactical first-person game. The robots are just as deadly as the six shooters the character wields. The player uses a cover system to avoid being shot. The cover system allows the player to return fire in a deadly firefight a little more safely. The game's plot is to create a mix of wild west gunslingers in a future period. The story behind this bounty hunter is that his father owes money to an intergalactic crime syndicate. This bounty is the “last” job for the crime family before he can free his father from his debt or so he thinks. 7 user reviewsReminds me of Dead Space, the cover system is a really cool idea, makes me think, what if Gears of War could move the cover the way Portal does? <GameId>2211960</GameId>
<GameName>Counterspell</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Counterspell is an endless runner game where you have to draw shapes to destroy hostile spells and jump over obstacles.<br>It is an easy to grasp but hard to master arcade game where the only goal is to survive as long as you can.<br><br>You use the mouse to draw the shapes which you see on the screen, there is also a spell you draw to jump over holes in the ground.<br>If you don't draw quickly enough, the glyphs will touch the wizard and result in a game over.<br>Some symbols are more complex than others and there are even large shapes which take two hits to kill, playing on an easier difficulty will reduce the frequency of challenging symbols appearing as well as the speed of the game.<br><br>There are currently 3 difficulty settings and 25 different patterns to learn as you try and get a high score.<br>There are also 6 unique powerups which will help you survive in different ways.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2211960/extras/wizard4.gif?t=1669310965" /> <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2211960/extras/wizard3.gif?t=1669310965" /> 2 user reviews#速度与激情9#

Monster Racing League is a multiplayer strategic racing game - with no driving!<br />

<GAME>
<GameId>2210810</GameId>
<GameName>Mining Factory</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This is a mining smelting idle game.<br>Minerals collected include coal mines, oil, natural gas, and uranium mines.<br>Ferrous metal iron ore, copper ore, manganese ore, chromium ore, vanadium ore, titanium ore,<br>Non-ferrous metals lead ore, zinc ore, aluminum ore, nickel ore, tungsten ore, magnesium ore, gold, silver, etc.<br>Non-metallic phosphate rock, boron rock, limestone, quartzite.<br>Rare metals Lithium ore, rubidium ore, cesium ore, niobium ore and many more. There are 40 kinds of minerals in total.<br>Smelting equipment includes furnaces, flotation machines, mining machines, etc. There are about 10 kinds of equipment. There are icons.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210810/extras/aa.jpg?t=1670496822" /><br>Each mine has its own smelting steps, try to transform it from real smelting.<br>Each smelting step requires raw materials and fuels to be crafted.<br><br>The resources of each mineral are limited and need to be explored to obtain resources. Heroes need to be made to explore and drop mineral sources. 2 user reviewsEDIT: I had to change this not NOT recommended.
Why? Not the game, although my thoughts have not changed, and about 4 hours is about all the "playing" there is.
It is because the dev has a very similar game, also at a cost that, is in the same state. If they had one game and were working on it? Sure, pay to get it. But this seems like a copy/paste cash grab, which is super sad, since the bones are there..

EDIT2: The devs response did not shine any light on why they released 2 games that are 20% complete, at the same time. My recommendation stays the same. Are you committed to making a good game, or making 2 games that are not really finished and make 2x as much cash? Pretty clear which the devs chose.

This is super beta material. The instructions (in English at least) are not that helpful and only 1 page saying not a lot.
Lots of stuff is not obvious, like only one of the "team" fights at once.
There is no scroll bar on the left, so it is VERY possible you will not notice there are more things to build (looking at you, Uranium!)
I would say I am half way through, and it has got to the point of my income being well high enough to just get each element, spam the buildings, get the next and repeat. Some balancing required.
There is very little in the way of decisions to make. Just make all the things until you need something (has happened twice in 4 hours...), go swap something over and you are done.

So why am I recommending it? Has good bones, I have enjoyed the 4 hours I have into it, and will probably "finish" it in another 4 or so. Tomorrow. :DGood idea for the game but the game is about 20% finished now. There are a lot of different resources but only few of them have specialized machinery, the rest are just copy-paste. Balance is non-existent, some things don't make sense. Why positive review then? Because I enjoyed playing it for 5 hours until it became obvious that it is not finished yet. So if you want to try it for few hours without expecting a full game, I recommend it.

I am not sure if it will be ever finished as their other game - Mining Copper was released two weeks before this one and also has reviews that say it is unfinished (I didn't play it myself) and instead of finishing one game dev released another.

So what is this game about? There are three parts in it: mining, making and exploration.

Mining:
You have several resources and each one has a machinery chain which basically starts from drilling holes, transforming them into tunnels, digging resources, transporting them, processing them into final product (either green/blue energy or just some resource which you store to use in other chains). Each stage in chain produces next resource and can also produce gold. You use gold to upgrade speed and yield of each stage. Some chains don't make sense, for example, you load impure coal into truck making truckload of coal, then unload truckload of coal into more impure coal at warehouse basically making impure coal out of nothing.

Making:
You use green energy to create 5 types of units. Each unit has rank and level. You produce rank 1 units. You can upgrade their level with gold and you can combine two of the same rank into one of the higher rank of the same type. So to create rank 9 unit you need to make 256 rank 1 units. After rank 9 it requires 4 units of the previous rank to make another, so 1024 rank 1 for rank 10, 4096 for rank 11, etc. After you upgrade a unit to a new level with cash you need to craft enough units to at least get it to the same rank before you can use it, luckily if you combine few units, one of which has higher level resulting level will be the highest of them.

Exploration:
You choose 3 unit types and the first unit of those types (usually the strongest unless you reordered them) goes into battle. Each level initially has 10 enemies, one of which is the boss (which increases by 20 each 5 levels). Rightmost unit attacks the enemy, then central unit attacks the enemy, leftmost unit attacks the enemy, and then finally enemy attacks your rightmost unit, so use tanky unit at the rightmost position. If enemy level is higher than your total level of three units then enemy attacks first otherwise you can just kill them before they get a move if your units are strong enough. You get sources of resources as a reward for exploration which are used to produce initial resource in Mining production chains. The further you get the more rare resource sources you find but because there is nothing special about those resources it is still better to just produce initial resources to convert them to green energy and gold. Yes you get more chains but because they cost more to upgrade they end up slower so increase is not very noticable.

And so that's it. Mine resources, produce green energy and gold, spend gold on upgrades, spend energy on crafting new units, combine units, fight.
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GAME>
<GameId>2211120</GameId>
<GameName>Grapple Whip</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This cowboy doesn't have legs so he uses his grappling whip to grapple from A to B. When the whip is attached to a grapple point the player will be pulled towards it. Collect all the gems in a level to progress while swinging. Move the crosshair over a grapple point to attach the whip and move forward. Different kinds of grapple points are scattered around the levels and can act differently based on their color. <br />
<br />
Some of the grapple points move to another place so the player can use them as transport and others give the player more velocity to reach more places. Sometimes it can be beneficial to detach from a point at the right moment to reach a gem or a new point. Watch out for rotating and moving spikes and dropping down in the abyss will make you start over but don’t worry you won’t have to collect all your gems again.<br />
<br />
Controls:<br />
<br />
Use the left mouse to attach your whip to a target.<br />
Use the right mouse to detach from a target.<br />
<br />
OR<br />
Use arrows/WASD and X to attach, Z to detach<br />
<br />
OR<br />
Use the left stick and button A to attach, B detach 3 user reviewsGrapple doesnt work
</CONTENT>

Manage your lims to fight through the ring and reach the king. A sci-fi robot management game. Position your lims around your lam to fight through groups of enemies. Research, craft, and manage to succeed.<br>You play as a lam. A lam controls lims to interact with the world. Lims will automatically do the job they were built for, such as this retriever lim that you start with.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210410/extras/Lim.PNG?t=1669033396" /><br>It will collect any items on the ground that are close by. You use those items to research and craft more lims. <br>Research is somewhat automatic with each item gathered ticking it up to completion. There are 18 lims to research and 20 to build.<br>Crafting is done by assigning factories to certain recipes. Once you have the proper supplies, the item will begin crafting and be placed in your inventory when built. This manufacturing process will continue unless you de-allocate the factories or tell that recipe to finish the current process.<br>You'll need to be prepared for the enemies lurking in the world, such as these Chompsos. They and many other machines will attack you on sight.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210410/extras/Chompsos.PNG?t=1669033396" /><br>You'll travel through many environments, such as this little village.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210410/extras/Villager.PNG?t=1669033396" /><br>Travel across all 9 sections of the ring to face the king and reclaim the ring!

<strong>Torecower</strong> is an arcade wave-based minimalist game where you build automatic turrets to shoot enemies. Each turret has an unique attack behaviour. <GameName>VR Archeology: Secrets of Kulikovo Field</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Fought on September 8, 1380, the Battle of Kulikovo is considered one of the biggest events of the 14th century that united Rus peoples. Scientists continue searching for traces of the battle. Now you can also join an archaeological expedition, find and restore artifacts to re-enact those historical events.<br />
 <br />
Swords and spears, armor and arrows, coins and bullets. Dig into the artifacts from different eras with the opportunities offered by a field laboratory. Game developers spent time in the Kulikovo Field Museum depository to recreate accurate copies of real archaeological finds collected over decades.<br />
 <br />
Learn about Russian warriors’ full armor and its actual weight, and archers’ medieval multitool. You can witness scenes from across the ages that the Kulikovo Field remembers.<br />
 <br />
Reconstruct a combat bow and test it at a shooting range. Pick an arrowhead to hit different types of armor. Practice your aiming skills and get promoted to the next military rank. 2 user reviewsVR Archeology: Secrets of Kulikovo Field is a free VR experience by a Russian dev about Russian ancient history. <h1>JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER</h1><p><a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://discord.com/invite/ZGzZXQXgGs" target="_blank" rel=" noopener"  ><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/Steam_BannerDiscord.png?t=1667887222" /></a></p><br><h1>About the Game</h1><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/DA_EN.png?t=1667887222" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Simple but complex gameplay</h2>Dragonium Adventure is a turn-based combat RPG that uses a few simple fundamental mechanics: Attack, Defense and Objects. During the course of your adventure you will clash with many enemies, one more powerful than the other: to face them, you will need to constantly change and improve your strategy, and to do so, you will have to make use of new fighting techniques and tools. Learn to master these elements and become Akinori's best fighter!<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/DRAGONIUM_ADVENTURE_FIGHT_GIF_AdobeExpress.gif?t=1667887222" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Story mode</h2>Akinori has been quiet for millennia since the last sighting of a monster, but apparently these mysterious creatures have made their appearance again - it's up to you to figure out what's happening and restore peace to the kingdom. Fight, improve and save Akinori: the three keywords to describe the story mode of Dragonium Adventure are these.<br><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> More than 8 zones to complete with 5 levels per zone, divided into 3 normal levels, 1 mini-boss and 1 boss!<br></li><li> Improve your character by acquiring more powerful fighting techniques!<br></li><li> Free Akinori from the malus and find out what's happening!</li></ul><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/DRAGONIUM_ADVENTURE_WORLDS_GIF_AdobeExpress.gif?t=1667887222" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Add spice to the fight!</h2>The fighting techniques are many: from those that only hit the enemy and inflict damage on him, to those that restore your health, guarantee you an advantage in battle and more. By defeating enemies, you will earn experience points which you will need to fill your experience bar. Once filled, you will get a Skill Point, which you can exchange to acquire new fighting techniques through the Tree of Knowledge. Master the fighting techniques and create a moveset suitable for the situation!<br>You will be able to use the fighting techniques learned in the story mode even in the online multiplayer mode!<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/DRAGONIUM_ADVENTURE_TECHNIQUES_GIF_AdobeExpress.gif?t=1667887222" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Rush mode</h2>Defeat many enemies, one after the other, and try to survive! The more enemies you defeat, the higher the final reward! Plan a winning strategy and you will prevail!<br>Rush mode is great for earning Skill Points and acquiring fighting techniques that are impossible to achieve in story mode. You will be able to expand your strategy and show it off in online multiplayer battles!<br><br><i>To unlock this mode, you need to finish the main campaign in order to familiarize yourself with the combat system and master basic combat techniques.</i><h2 class="bb_tag">Online multiplayer</h2>Battle against friends or strangers in online multiplayer mode - show what you are made of to the whole world!<br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> Play fast and carefree matches in Quick Match mode<br></li><li> Defeat co-op bosses with a teammate in Raid Mode<br></li><li> Take part in exciting strategy-packed battles in Competitive Mode to climb the world rankings</li></ul><br><i>To unlock this mode, you need to finish the main campaign in order to familiarize yourself with the combat system and master basic combat techniques.</i>

<GameName>A Matter of Principle</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Here is an interactive comics novel about one of the most high-profile events of the 20th century. There are many theories about what exactly happened on June 28, 1914 in Sarajevo. A deliberate attempt? A tragic accident? Masonic conspiracy?<br><br>The Bosnian Serb Gavrilo Princip killed the heir to the Austro-Hungarian throne, Franz Ferdinand, which became a formal reason to start the first world war of its kind ... But who was Princip and what led him to this act? Who was Franz Ferdinand and how did he meet that fateful day? What do they have in common and could war have been avoided?<br><br>Inside the game you will find answers to these questions, as well as the majestic interiors of Austria-Hungary and the nature of the Balkan Peninsula from the pen of Askold Akishin, one of the greatest comics artists.<h2 class="bb_tag">Game Features:</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li> The recognizable style of Askold Akishin - dynamic black and white expressive drawings made in a comics style panels,<br></li><li> Complete, gripping story,<br></li><li> Interactive polling system, <br></li><li> Quiz,<br></li><li> Luxurious gallery from different artists, </li></ul>and much more!<br><br>Embark on an exciting journey to the beginning of the 20th century and see the origins of the first World War of its kind.<br><br>If you are not familiar with the history of Gavrilo Princip and Franz Ferdinand, this will be the most fascinating history lesson of your life. If you are familiar, you will find a unique immersion in that era, you will be able to see the significant events of those years, as well as consider this amazing story from different angles, in detail.

<CONTENT>
Work your way through delivering food, groceries and more using <strong>Delivoo</strong> and save enough money to open up your restaurant!<br><br>The game idea revolves around simulating the role of a local item delivery person. You have a smartphone with an app installed that notifies you of active orders from all around <strong>Peytor Town</strong>. While you discover the city and earn money walking / running / driving / cycling / commuting / <i>etc</i> your backpack around, you will face a number of challenges.<h2 class="bb_tag">Keep An Eye On <strong>Temperatures</strong></h2>Depending on the type of items you carry in your backpack, you need to carefully arrange them in such way that frozen pizzas don't melt and nachos cheese sauce doesn't get cold. You can upgrade it to carry more items or even have better temperature insulation.<h2 class="bb_tag">Make Sure You've Got <strong>Change</strong></h2>Some customers will prefer to pay <i>cash</i>, so make sure to manage your wallet contents carefully and don't forget to visit the ATM every now and then. Even better: rush hour and weather conditions also influences your payment.<br>These perks are only available to Delivoo Partners only, so make sure to keep your rating up and customers happy in order to get <strong>bronze, silver, gold or even platinum</strong> Partner Level.<br><i>PS: There's no rating that many can't magically remove</i><h2 class="bb_tag"> Find your way through Peytor Town </h2>The city is large - so large, in fact, that it has a <strong>shore with a beach, a crowded old town, a busy office area, a picturesque mountain road leading to Holywood grade villas and more</strong>. Getting around the city can prove to be complicated, depending on the vehicle you pick:<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Your own two feet<br></li><li>Public transportation <i>(You'll need tickets or subscriptions)</i><br></li><li>Bicycle<br></li><li>E-Bike <i>(You'll need to charge it or spend twice the effort to pedal it)</i><br></li><li>Electric scooter<br></li><li>Car <i>(Gas, maintenance, taxes, parking passes, all that jazz)</i><br></li><li>Electric Car <i>(Pick a good one)!</i></li></ul>You can either <strong>rent</strong> or <strong>buy</strong> dozens of vehicles of this type and leave them around town so you can easily switch between them to beat the traffic and deliver that hotdog as it's still steaming hot!

<GameId>2209620</GameId>
<GameName>SCAN</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h1>Early Beta Access</h1><p>Currently seeking playtesters.  Join the Discord server for details.</p><br><h1>About the Game</h1>SCAN is a BR-style game with a brand new set of rules. Victory is not achieved through being the last person alive. Instead, the goal is to secure objectives while trying to prevent others from doing the same. Over the course of a match, players are able to collect valuable information by scanning the map, which is temporary and extremely limited. Careful use of this mechanic is essential to winning the game.<br><br>SCAN is a work in progress.  Most in-game elements will eventually be changed or replaced.  However, the game is currently playable and ready to be tested with larger player counts.  <strong>Participation in the tests is free.</strong> <br><br>Tests will be scheduled through Discord to ensure that matches are full.  The sooner we have enough players, the sooner we can get started..so tell your friends!<h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>A NEW WAY TO PLAY</strong></h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>There is no set match length, and no circle.  Several players may survive a match, but there can only be one winner.<br></li><li>The closer you are to winning a match, the bigger the target on your back will be.<br></li><li>There are plenty of opportunities to strategize.  Use every tool at your disposal to overpower or outsmart your opponents.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>GET DECKED OUT</strong></h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Players have inventory space and 14 slots to equip weapons, armor, and other gear.<br></li><li>Equipment and weapon attachments offer stat bonuses to give you the edge in combat.<br></li><li>Search the map for equipment - or better yet, take it from the enemy's cold, dead hands.<br></li><li>There are hundreds of unique pieces of equipment...with much more to come.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>KEEPING IT REAL</strong></h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Weapons, equipment, and environments are grounded in realism.  There are no futuristic or fantasy elements to the game.<br></li><li>Guns have unique recoil patterns, bullet velocity, bullet drop, and damage.  Controlling guns on full-auto can be difficult.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>LEAVE YOUR TENT AT HOME</strong></h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>A number of rules are in place to keep the action moving.<br></li><li>Camping for extended periods of time is not a winning strategy.  The game will just go on without you.</li></ul> 
</CONTENT>

Now you're here, you can listen to <strong>Finn's</strong> story!<br><br><strong>Finn,</strong> a high school student, lives in a town with his <strong>mother and friends.</strong><i>(She makes very nice pies.)</i><br>We remember him even as a child. <GAME>
<GameId>2209030</GameId>
<GameName>Scrapbox</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>HEY! This game is still a work in progress, and a LOT is being changed. Stick around for more info!</strong><br><br>Scrapbox is a frantic 2.5D fighter where a bunch of strange specimen beat each other up for little to no reason.<h2 class="bb_tag">ACCESSIBILITY FIRST</h2>Scrapbox was made with casual <i>and </i>competitive play in mind as opposed to leaning super heavily in either direction. The game has very easy inputs consisting of a direction, a button press, and your character's position (in air or grounded) instead of super difficult inputs that take 7.346 trillion years to learn. To make up for the game being easy to control, each character has a boat load of attacks - 8 Light Moves, 8 Mid Moves, 8 Strong Moves, 8 Special Moves and 3 Ultra Moves.<h2 class="bb_tag">SOME TECH, YES</h2>This game has a few ways to cancel moves. There's jump cancelling, which affects everything but Ultras, which is performed by inputting a jump during a small window as you attack. Land cancelling exists too - landing during an aerial cancels it immediately. On top of that, you can air dash in 4 directions, wave dash, dodge roll, and much more!<h2 class="bb_tag">ACHIEVEMENTS GALORE</h2>There are multiple achievements to snag for doing the most bizarre things possible. Every update brings new ones!<h2 class="bb_tag">MODES</h2>Just in case regular fighting gets old, there are a handful of other modes for you to enjoy!<br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>TRAINING MODE</strong> lets you, well, train. You can see every character's hitboxes, speed up or slow the game down and more to let you lab with your favourite character!<br></li><li><strong>CAMEO KICKER</strong> has you punting tons of flying discs imprinted with characters that didn't quite make the cut. Good old arcade fun!<br></li><li><strong>TOUR MODE</strong> is the game's platform fighter hybrid, with huge stages and plenty of enemies to smack. Speed through the level or take your time battering each enemy one by one!<br></li><li><strong>CHAOS MODE</strong> throws balancing out the window and randomises every character's attributes. Good luck, have fun!<br></li><li><strong>TAG TEAM MODE</strong> lets you choose up to three different fighters and tag them in and out mid-match. If all three get KO'd, you're out!<br></li><li><strong>STORY MODE</strong> tells the most bizarre story ever seen in a fighting game. 'Nuff said.</li></ul> 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameId>2209080</GameId>
<GameName>Polaris Outpost</GameName>
<CONTENT>
You find yourself alone on a remote research outpost in the Polaris system. Something has gone terribly wrong. Much of the base is lacking power and your co-workers are mysteriously missing. There is a deadly threat lurking in this outpost and it will take all of your cunning to keep from becoming another victim.<br><br>Your resources are dwindling, so you'll need to secure more food, water, and power, but this involves venturing away from the security of your home base. Equipped with various items to track, deter, and trick your adversary, there is a chance you can outwit your opponent. However, you'll need to keep a close eye on your stats, as it's all too easy to get dehydrated or lose your sanity to the extreme stress of these circumstances.<br><br>You will need to explore deep into your opponent's territory to find a way to escape this outpost. A distress signal may take too long, so maybe you can get the escape shuttle up and running instead. Or maybe there is a way to actually defeat this adversary. One thing is for certain, this won't be easy. Your adversary is becoming more intelligent by the minute, and it is adapting to resist your weapons. You'll need to move quickly and find more powerful equipment if you expect to stand a chance. Can you survive Polaris Outpost?<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209080/extras/Vertical_No_text.png?t=1668453444" /><br><br>Polaris Outpost is a blend of survival, horror, and minimalist base building. It involves both planning ahead and thinking on your feet in order to survive. You will be up against a single powerful adversary that evolves to become stronger and more intelligent throughout the game. You will secure resource production rooms and find ways to defend or repair them. The gameplay is often tense and frightening as you try to out maneuver and outsmart your deadly opponent in a variety of atmospheric sci-fi environments. The game becomes progressively more open-ended, giving you more of a chance to make your own decisions.

<h1>Join our Discord!</h1><p><a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://discord.gg/8tHNMdVhrr" target="_blank" rel=" noopener"  ><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Discord.png?t=1669149424" /></a></p><br><h1>About the Game</h1><h2 class="bb_tag">BUILD A NEW HOME</h2>Build your survivors a base where they can rest and trade stories between adventures. Farm crops, tame alien beasts, incorporate salvaged technology and fortify your home against hostile intruders<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Construction_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">ENGAGE IN DEEP TACTICAL COMBAT</h2>Prevailing in combat will require more than just point-and-click. A detailed hit simulation and health system will mean that even non-lethal hits can render a survivor unable to go on. Suppressive fire might pin an enemy in place, but the ammunition used up may leave you ill-equipped to fight the next encounter effectively<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Explosion_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">DRIVE RESTORED VEHICLES</h2>It's a big world out there. To get around you will need better transportation than your legs can provide. One of the things setting Ascent of Ashes apart from other games of this genre is the ability to restore and drive vehicles.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Vehicles_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">LEAD YOUR SURVIVORS</h2>Each survivor has their own unique personality and motivations. As colony leader it is up to you to find and recruit capable survivors to fill gaps in your roster against ever increasing challenges. Can you keep everyone happy, secure and motivated?<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Campfire_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">EXPLORE A STRANGE NEW WORLD</h2>You will find yourself in an expansive, procedurally generated world filled with different biomes and points of interest. To survive the post-apocalypse you'll have to brave the pre-collapse ruins and the many dangers that they hold.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Floaters_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">CHALLENGE A DYNAMIC AI</h2>It's not enough to just have an in-depth combat system with a variety of mechanics. You also need opponents capable of using those mechanics to challenge you. Enemies will possess varying degrees of intelligence. Taking on a disorganized band of raiders will play very differently from fighting a squad of well-trained Remnant soldiers.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Dynamic_AI_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">FROM THE ORGINAL CREATORS OF COMBAT EXTENDED</h2>Combining the deep simulation of classic post-apocalyptical survival titles with the tactical challenge of classic real time and turn-based gems, the original creators of RimWorld's heralded <strong>Combat Extended</strong> mod present a fresh take on the colony sim genre that emphasizes exploration, tight balance and strategic gameplay.<h2 class="bb_tag">MODDING SUPPORT</h2>Our team has its roots in mod-making and we've been fortunate to have been part of many great modding communities over the years. That's why with Ascent of Ashes, we want to give something back to those communities. We're building the game's engine from the ground up to be easily extendable, and thanks to our extensive experience in creating mods ourselves we know exactly what kind of support mod-makers need. Ascent of Ashes is a game developed by modders, for modders.

<h1>JOIN US ON</h1><p><a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://www.incetongames.com/" target="_blank" rel=" noopener"  ><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Web_logo.png?t=1670247112" /></a><a href="https://twitter.com/inceton" target="_blank" rel=""  ><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Twitter_logo.png?t=1670247112" /></a><a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://discord.com/invite/aD8dcdqmMt" target="_blank" rel=" noopener"  ><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Discord_logo.png?t=1670247112" /></a></p><br><h1>About the Game</h1>Unlike most people, Sky’s life was marked by tragedy at a young age. Suddenly forced to spend her waking hours overwhelmed with study and work, her days became a grey blur. After several years of painstaking efforts, Sky had finally finished college. Wanting to celebrate this joyous occasion, Margot - Sky's best friend - barely manages to drag Sky out of her hidey-hole and into a world of frivolous fun. Though, tragedy isn’t the same as lightning and it likes to strike the same person twice.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Explore.png?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Gif_2.gif?t=1670247112" /><br>Accompany Sky and experience the struggles and difficulties she'll have to face and overcome; the lessons she will have to learn, the things she'll have to risk and sacrifice on a  journey towards the end. <GameName>Geometric Hell</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Geometric Hell is an arcade bullet-hell shooter with minimalistic graphics. Survive waves of aggressive geometric shapes and upgrade to keep up with the progressive increase in difficulty. Defeating bosses rewards you with special upgrades. Many deaths are expected before you get a chance to fight the final boss. Between attempts, you should keep track of your achievements as they reward you with points used for permanent upgrades.<br><br><br><br><strong>Player</strong><br><br>The player can move around withing the play area and shoot enemies. The player can also dash, dashing makes the player temporarily invulnerable to most damage in the game, while also dealing massive damage to any enemies you collide with. Other ways of dealing damage is unlocked by defeating bosses.<br><br><br><br><strong>Enemies and Upgrades</strong><br><br>There is currently 6 different types of shapes, each shape has 4 variants: Normal, Elite, Miniboss and Boss. However, the final boss is unique. Defeating enemies rewards you with points used to upgrade at any time, while attempting the game. While upgrading you get 3 alternatives to spend your points on, or you could spend a small amount to refresh. Each unique upgrade can be upgraded 9 times and all prices increase every time you buy an upgrade.<br><br>Additionally, bosses awards special upgrades, which then will be added to the upgrade system where they can be upgraded further. They can also be upgraded if it's rewarded multiple times from defeating bosses.<br><br><br><br><strong>Achievements</strong><br><br>54 achievement points are currently available, and can be freely added to and removed from upgrades in the achievement menu. This progress is permanent and increases your chances of beating the game.

<GameId>2208960</GameId>
<GameName>Gravity</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This is a physics, logic puzzle game where the aim is to guide the ball to the exit within 20 seconds on each level. Each puzzle starts with all objects and the ball as static.<br />
You can move and rotate yellow and orange objects into different positions. When you are happy with there placement press play to turn gravity on. <br />
With gravity turned on The ball and all green and yellow objects will fall and be affected by physics. For example, you might need to move a yellow object out of the way so the ball can roll to the exit, or place a ramp under the ball so it rolls down it when it falls.<br />
There are 4 main object types;<br />
The Red Ball(s) - Can not be moved, affected by gravity. Level complete when the ball reaches the exit<br />
Yellow - Can be moved, affected by gravity.<br />
Green - Can not be moved, affected by gravity.<br />
Orange - Can be Moved, not affected by gravity.<br />
<br />
The game features<br />
- 75 levels!<br />
-Time Trials for every level<br />
-Unlockable balls, for completing challenges.<br />
-Level editor 
</CONTENT>

<GameName>Project Astra Dominium</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Project Astra Dominium is a Tower Defense game with Basebuilding and Automation elements.<br>Build up your base to become a supply hub for Earth's desperately needed materials, gather resources while defending against an unknown alien threat and improve your tower's and AI capabilities.<h2 class="bb_tag">Story</h2>It's the year 2249, most resources on earth are nearly depleted and have lead to many conflicts in the past. <br>Despite those crises, humanity made huge progress in the fields of AI, which in turn allowed for enormous advances in space travel.<br>Scientists were even able to create a new kind of engine, which made it possible to travel faster than light. But on the downside humans were not able to survive this way of transportation.<br>In a last desperate attempt and in search for new resources, the EIRO (European Interstellar Resource Organization) built a brand new ship which was only controlled by an AI named &quot;Athena&quot;.<br>Hoping that the AI can survive the jump and begin autonomous exploration and exploitation of resources, the ship is launched into an unknown future...<h2 class="bb_tag">Expand</h2>Make use of the latest Nanite technology to process and refine all resources you find into useful materials for earth or new equipment for your towers.<h2 class="bb_tag">Fight</h2>Explore different planets and defend against a mysterious alien race, that seem to reproduce endlessly and eat up whole planets.<h2 class="bb_tag">Grow</h2>As an AI you learn from everything you do and become stronger and better.<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Gain combat experience and skillpoints that you can use to improve your towers. Each tower has it's own skilltree with up to 250 points to spend!<br></li><li>Learn recipes to craft various materials, items and also equipment for your towers.<br></li><li>Improve your crafting abilities and effiency to use less resources while having <br>more/better/faster output.<br></li><li>Discover more about the aliens and learn to craft special beacons, that attract much stronger species that may also yield much better rewards!<br></li><li>Expand and improve your base to become a reliable resource hub for earth.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">DISCLAIMER</h2>Project Astra Dominium ist still in early access.<br><br>While most of the gameplay elements are already implemented, the visuals and UX are still work in progress and not finished yet.<br>We will update all screenshots/videos accordingly, whenever there is progress made in those areas! 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2228320</GameId>
<GameName>Feisty Festivities</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>What is Feisty Festivities?</strong><br>Feisty Festivities is a online multiplayer shooter-style snowball fight game. The goal is to join or create a match, and just eliminate other players. The base game-mode is free-for-all (FFA), meaning that you attack everything and everyone with no remorse.<br><br><strong>What features does it have?</strong><br>Currently, the game includes features such as:<br><ul class="bb_ul">- Double Jumping</ul><ul class="bb_ul">- Proximity Chat</ul><ul class="bb_ul">- Custom Matches</ul><ul class="bb_ul">- 2 maps to select from</ul><br><strong>Gameplay</strong><br>After creating a match yourself or joining one, you will get put into the map that was selected by the host. Leaving the spawn area, you can press <strong>E</strong> to pick a snowball while you're on the ground. <strong>Left-clicking</strong> throws the snowball, and if you hit the enemy, they die and they have to wait until they respawn. Jumping while airborne enables you to jump again, and <i>open</i> proximity chat allows the player to communicate with others. Be careful not to use up all your stamina, or you'll have to wait until it recharges!<br><br>Please note: when creating a match, you can choose the map you'd like. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameName>山海：传承</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<u><strong>国风重彩、江山如画</strong></u>（画风）<br>在特色国风画面之中，感受千年文化的底蕴。<br><br><u><strong>上承天命、下安黎民</strong></u>（天命、人口）<br>在外敌和天灾的威胁中维护帝国的统治、安抚民心，后世会认可您的功绩。您将经历数个朝代并达成统一、建设奇观、文化融合、使四方朝贡等朝代目标，最终打造一个盛世王朝。<br><br><u><strong>论道经邦、政由己出</strong></u>（国策、权力）<br>安国养民或是穷兵黩武，亲自推行您的国策，让这庞大的帝国根据您的意志运作。不过还请留意，民力有限，权衡轻重也是天子应当思虑之事。<br>天子的意志需要由人来执行，同时也会产生利益与派系，维持士族、宦官、外戚或党派之间的平衡也是帝王之术的一部分。<br><br><u><strong>诸子争鸣、博采众长</strong></u>（学说）<br>选择您所推行思想——儒、墨、道、法、阴阳、名、兵，或各取所长。提取各家理论的精华成为国策。使文化形成传承并让外敌同化于您帝国的强大文化影响之下。<br><br><u><strong>内平诸国、外御其辱</strong></u>（战争）<br>扫荡华夏大地上的其他诸侯、抵御各方外敌的入侵，在丰富的科技树中解锁强力的兵种、发展完备的军事制度。编制合理的部队，关注部队的士气和后勤，其他们成为您手中矛与盾。<br><br><u><strong>星宿闪耀、器具璀璨</strong></u>（星宿、文物）<br>天上有群星构建的天宫，地上有工匠打造的器具。建造观星台并向二十八星宿祈愿，收集各类名器，这都将为您的帝国带来强大的加成。<br><br><u><strong>千古逸闻、游历江湖</strong></u>（事件、江湖）<br>在您统治帝国的过程中，您将经历许多丰富的事件，如白泽到访、玄奘取经等，也有着江湖传闻、民生民情。这些事件将基于您的选择带来不同的发展，事件最终的结果不仅会影响您的天命，还会影响您的整个帝国。<br>您可以派遣一位您的心腹游历江湖体察民情，从而得知在您治下百姓的生活是否安稳富足、或对您心有不满。您也可以选择让这位心腹在各处除暴安良，稳定当地的民心，甚至于建立江湖帮派来执行各式各样的谋划。如何利用皆取决于您。<br><br>微博：@薮羽制作组<br>粉丝群：QQ707450152

<GameId>2227690</GameId>
<GameName>Vampiric Tower Remix</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Victoria the Vampire ascends the Vampiric Tower once more!<br><br>A brand-new game featuring rooms from both Vampiric Tower 1 &amp; 2, as well as plenty of new ones. Plus, it has all new graphics and music! And it's much easier than 2!<br><br>For the uninitiated, Vampiric Tower is a box-pushing puzzle game. The original game was made way back in 2000, when I was 16. Vampiric Tower Remix is the best &amp; definitive entry of the series!<br><br>Push the boxes around to block the spells from the Pumpkins and the Ghosts. Try to pick up all the vials in each room without getting zapped, and then get to the exit! If you do get zapped, do not fret! You have unlimited lives in this game, so just try again!<br><br>Turn into a bat to fly over spikes, water, pots, and other stuff in your way! Cast ice spells to turn the denizens of the tower into ice cubes that you can push around! Rock out to amazing chiptune remixes of Mozart classics!<br><br>Featuring 15 worlds with 8 rooms each, for 120 rooms total. The 15 worlds are divided into 5 episodes of 3 worlds each. The worlds in each episode can be tackled in any order.<br><br>Let’s check out those worlds!<br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>The Old Tower</strong>: Featuring classics from the original game! Get re-acquainted with the Pumpkins and Ghosts!<br></li><li><strong>Jiangshi Junction</strong>: The Jiangshis hop around and stop in place if they touch Victoria.<br></li><li><strong>Faerie Gardens</strong>: Faeries move back and forth to block Victoria’s progress. Nothing a well-placed ice spell can’t fix!<br></li><li><strong>Magick Library</strong>: Say hello to the Witches! They are intently reading their books, but when the last vial is collected, look out!<br></li><li><strong>Tomb of the Sun</strong>: The Mummies can be frozen, but they’ll fall apart afterward. Since you can only freeze them once, make it count!<br></li><li><strong>Bodacious Botany</strong>: These alien plants from Venus just won’t stop re-growing!<br></li><li><strong>Medusa’s Lair</strong>: Like the Witches, the Snakes wake up when all vials are collected. Their fireballs move pretty fast!<br></li><li><strong>Atlantean Shrine</strong>: The Shades cast ice spells, just like Victoria!<br></li><li><strong>Lil’ Bot Factory</strong>: The industrious Lil’ Bots walk back and forth, pushing boxes, pots, flasks, or anything else they find.<br></li><li><strong>Ethereal Palace</strong>: Imps like to bop back and forth and get in the way. Silly Imps!<br></li><li><strong>World Tree Roots</strong>: The Sorceresses have mastered a spell that can travel through pillars and pots, just like the Pumpkins and Ghosts! Luckily, it moves much slower than theirs.<br></li><li><strong>The Pearly Gates</strong>: The Doubles are perfect copies of Victoria. Whatever she does, they follow!<br></li><li><strong>Awesome Alchemy</strong>: Wisps move about and disintegrate when they touch Victoria. They have no resolve!<br></li><li><strong>All Hail Mars</strong>: The formidable Knights are invincible and immune to all magic.<br></li><li><strong>The Grand Finale</strong>: Put your skills to the test in the final world!</li></ul><br>Can Victoria make it through the 120 rooms of this new tower? Play the game and find out!

<GameId>2227700</GameId>
<GameName>AstroDrop</GameName>
<CONTENT>
AstroDrop is a 2D platformer about an astronaut, called Astro, who is lost in space and wants to drop all the way back to Earth. The platform layout is meant to challenge the player by testing their memory, skill and patience.<h2 class="bb_tag"> Gameplay</h2><br>-You can jump and air strafe.<br>-There is fall damage and when you die you go back to the beginning of the level.<br>-As you progress downwards, the gravity scale changes (fall damage becomes more punishing, you run faster and slide faster).<br>-There are flying objects that can end your attempts such as asteroids or birds.<br>-Additionally, there are parts of the terrain that can also kill you such as spikes, falling spikes and lava.<br>-There is only 1 checkpoint per level, and it is the start of that level.<br>-Every death and checkpoint are auto-saved.<br>-Overall, the gameplay is punishing but satisfying.<br>-This game is meant for gamers who want to challenge themselves.<br><br>AstroDrop was designed to be one of the hardest video games ever made. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameName>Space Haste 2</GameName>
<CONTENT>
SPACE HASTE II is an adrenaline pumping, futuristic racing game that puts players in the driver’s seat of the hottest hovercrafts on the planet. The game continually analyzes the player’s skills and times, building up their hovercraft’s speed throughout the race according to their abilities. But there is no limit to how much speed they can accumulate and the fastest rides through the breathtaking missions and backdrops will undoubtedly be the best ones!<br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> 4 hovercrafts to choose from<br></li><li> Each hovercraft has 8 levels of enhancement<br></li><li> The better you are at driving, the quicker your hovercraft will enhance<br></li><li> Depending on your driving skills, the game keeps adding to the maximum speed of the hovercraft throughout the race<br></li><li> Hovercrafts actually have no speed limits<br></li><li> 11 pickups: Energy, Cloak, Bounce, Pilot, Blast, Boost, Flash, Stun, Drain, Shield and Haste<br></li><li> 3 race modes: Normal Race, Time Race and Shadow Racer</li></ul> 1 user reviewsI never imagined for the life of me that one of my favorite little bargain bin games growing up would ever make it on Steam. Literally like 10 people knew this game existed, and I was one of them.

A huge thank you to Dreams Interactive and Strategy First for giving this game a chance to to be discovered again, it's an amazing little hidden gem that's just as addictively fun to play as it was when I played it as a kid. Though relatively simple nowadays, this very grungy cyberpunk/industrial Wipeout clone captivated me growing up.

My only complaint is that they seem to have not implemented the music for the game, possibly due to licensing issues (though the music label still appears on billboards in game and the music track selector still has the names of the songs). Growing up, I know that the game wouldn't play the music unless you had the CD in the drive, but you could still play the game without the music if you didn't have the disc. It could be that they just didn't implement the features that were on disc. If you want, go ahead and buy this version, but if you can find a copy on disc, get that too so you can experience the game with the music as originally intended by the original developers.I never imagined for the life of me that one of my favorite little bargain bin games growing up would ever make it on Steam. Literally like 10 people knew this game existed, and I was one of them.

A huge thank you to Dreams Interactive and Strategy First for giving this game a chance to to be discovered again, it's an amazing little hidden gem that's just as addictively fun to play as it was when I played it as a kid. Though relatively simple nowadays, this very grungy cyberpunk/industrial Wipeout clone captivated me growing up.

My only complaint is that they seem to have not implemented the music for the game, possibly due to licensing issues (though the music label still appears on billboards in game and the music track selector still has the names of the songs). <h2 class="bb_tag">A Quest in Kindara</h2><br>When resource depletion leaves the human race on the brink of extinction, an exceptionally large source of iron is detected in a distance star system. As a last effort to save humanity, they send you, an Iron Extractor, to the planet where the target is located. <GameName>Ready, Steady, Ship!</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Oh no! The factory is swarming with orders to be shipped, so you and your colleagues are on a tight schedule! Each assignment is a ticking time bomb ready to explode and only the finest, most skillful shipping clerks will complete them. Space Draw is a VR creation tool with 3D painting as the main playing method. Users can easily draw a fantastic virtual world.<br />
<br />

<br />

<br />
Space Draw transforms the painting from a 2D plane to a 3D three-dimensional effect. It has clear visual hierarchy and more visual impact, enabling players to create as they wish.

<CONTENT>
Ansoku is a relaxing, fun, simple, and yet challenging puzzle game with a high replay value. <br />
<br />
The concept of the game is simple, use the given blocks to create rows, once a row is created it will be cleared and you receive the sum of its points and charge your rotate points. If however, you can no longer place any of the blocks you are given, the game will be over. <br />
<br />
Now also available on desktop, its main intent is to be a game that can be played when you just want to relax. It can run in its own smaller window so you can do things on the side if you wish. No time pressure, play at your own pace and you can stop the game at any time to return where you left off later.<br />

<strong>Greenlander</strong> is a brutal top-down action game set in Greenland during the mid-1500's. You play as a Norse settler who takes up the mantle of his Viking ancestors and embarks on a grim quest for revenge against the Sea Pirates that destroyed his home. <GameId>2204430</GameId>
<GameName>Ruler of the Waves 1916</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<i>Broadside thunder,<br>steel plate sundered,<br>munitions ablaze,<br>once triumphant -<br>sinking to a watery grave,<br>Ruler of the Waves.<br>- Inscriptus</i><br><br><br>Man the turrets of mighty Dreadnought battleships and battlecruisers and blow your enemy out of the water to secure your position as... the Ruler of the Waves!<br><br>Ruler of the Waves 1916 is a naval combat game and turret-based shooter. The main gameplay involves aiming and firing the turrets. Since turrets take 30 seconds to reload, the player must utilize multiple turrets on multiple ships to maximize their firepower. Things are made more difficult due to the movement of the ships and the sea, and consistent accuracy will be a challenge to all but the most experienced gunner. Sink all the enemy boats to achieve victory - with bonus points earned for quickness.<br><br>The game follows, in a fictional sense, the major battlecruiser engagements in WWI such as the Battles of Heligoland Bight and Jutland, which would be the last time ships of this kind reigned supreme before improvements to high-flying aircraft and deep-diving submarines made them all but obsolete. <br><br>Dreadnought-era battleships and battlecruisers are similar in size and firepower, but differ in terms of armor thickness, turret layout, and speed. Battleships are more heavily armored, whereas battlecruisers have the advantage in mobility. <br><br>The player will have an opportunity to board both types of ship and unleash mighty salvos upon the opposing fleet. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

Help Mr. Ball have a safe and comfortable trip 1 user reviewsI appreciate it's smooth controls. The game is just as described, every jump requires precision and patience for the right moments. I'm glad I wasn't able to save on my own and load the save if I fell, I feel like the challenge of the game would be reduced too much. Having to start from wherever you land is demoralizing, but I found it to be a part of the fun. Something I wasn't aware of at the start is how much your jump is charged, I was able to figure this out by seeing the light beneath Mr. Ball growing brighter.

<GameId>2204540</GameId>
<GameName>GrandStrategy</GameName>
<CONTENT>
It's a modern war that simulates a real battle, a conflict that might have happened.<br />
<br />
There are more than 200 kinds of tanks, armored vehicles, and aircraft in this movie.<br />
From the most advanced weapons to those that flourished during the Cold War!<br />
Some weapons are buried in history!<br />
A selection of UAVs and UGVs for modern warfare!<br />
The units are also free to buy equipment, or you can hire a dedicated PMC to dump them.<br />
<br />
The highlight is the Third World War! Over 100 powers, over 400 territories! Waiting time is so long!<br />
You can play freely! In the great power play, it is a pleasure to let money talk about things, gather nuclear weapons and shoot them in unison!<br />
It is also good to have a hard fight by tying up various things with small forces! You may lay down a small country with a large army!<br />
<br />
It also comes with a small storytelling scenario that covers all but major battles!<br />
In addition to that, it also includes small-scale conflicts such as the &quot;Battle of Malawi&quot; and IF's wars such as the &quot;Second Korean War&quot;!<br />
You can enjoy various big and small battles with this one piece!<br />
<br />
Also, this work was created in 2021, so it does not reflect the times.<br />
Please understand. 
</CONTENT>

<GameName>Field Tactics</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Field Tactics is a Turn-Based Tactical War Simulator inspired by ancient warfare. Set up your formations, utilise a variety of tactics and lead your army to victory.<br><br>There are 2 ways to win, either by capturing your opponents Commander, or by capturing every other piece.<h2 class="bb_tag">Pieces</h2><strong>Foot Soldier</strong><br>The most common piece at your disposal, they are hard workers who would give it their all for victory.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2204570/extras/fs_gif.gif?t=1669834027" /><br><br><br><strong>Archer</strong><br>A vital piece in the army, they watch over the front lines and pray on those that would dare to step too close.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2204570/extras/ar_gif.gif?t=1669834027" /><br><br><br><strong>Chariot</strong><br>Probably the most devastating weapons you can use, as they will mow down everything in their path.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2204570/extras/cht_gif.gif?t=1669834027" /><br><br><br><strong>Lieutenant</strong><br>The most loyal subordinates to the Commander, they are best at controlling the flow of the battle and creating sparks that can turn into a great blaze.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2204570/extras/lt_gif.gif?t=1669834027" /><br><br><br><strong>Commander</strong><br>The Commander can fly across the battlefield, turning the tide at any given moment. But be careful, as diving too deep could land you in the enemies trap.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2204570/extras/cdr_gif.gif?t=1669834027" />

<GameName>Crispy Puppy</GameName>
<CONTENT>

In one of the abandoned camps, among the forests and old buildings, a creature called Crispy Puppy roams, no one has ever heard of such a camp, and those who have been there do not say anything about it, and only fear is read in their eyes. <br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2203660/extras/1.gif?t=1669739625" /><br>According to legend, under the camp itself there is a huge factory in which terrible human fears are created. <CONTENT>
DICE GAME is a 2D game in which you have to fight in a deadly dice game. Activate the cubes, dodge the DICE deity, complete this game to the end. Get bonuses to improve your abilities. But remember, no one has won this game yet.<br />
<br />
Functions:<br />
music from bolinsoid<br />
-pixel graphics from 8BIT<br />
-character upgrade 8 user reviewsThis game will take your money and time. It won't give you anything in return. Be careful. Don't buy it.

Hunted: Kalevala is made by 3rd year game production students at JAMK, Business Information Technology. Jyväskylä Finland.<br />
Game was made over approximately 4 months, with a lot of hiccups and problems on the way. With no Unreal Engine experience before this project.<br />

Well this game is not what I expected. A single small environment where you fight a single monster. No explanation of what the point of the story for this game is. No clear instructions on buttons. The only way to get out of the middle of the game is a hard exit or you die. The monster and you can glitch on invisible walls or rocks.The game is pretty and the monster looks cool but that is where the positives end. 

Firstly, the game is using 100% of my GPU. Performance aside, it is not clear at all what you're supposed to do. You can't even look up the controls in the options. You are just dropped into the forest with no weapon or any idea of how to make one, while the OST of the Witcher 3 if it was composed and performed by a drunkard blares in the background.

It has potential, but it needs some more work.

Edit:
The good news is that I found the weapons, the bad is the combat is just terrible.

There is a thread in which the creator mentions that they did reach out to the other team asking for permission to borrow the concept which is to clear out several floors that are full of cats.

These levels have their own theme, colour and music. There is one scrollable screen on each floor and a bathroom you have to enter. Now, of the two games this appears to be the lesser one (there are no animations when changing floors) but I enjoyed it just the same. Looking for secret cats that require interaction with objects on our part is just pure fun!

Is it similar to A Building Full of Cats? Indeed it is since the dev was inspired to make this game due to the other game. <CONTENT>
The newest popular match 3 game Keep Sheep is coming! Compete with players from all over the world! Challenge super difficult puzzle!<br />
<br />
Only 0.1% of the players can solve the puzzle and clear the level! It is said that the IQ of those who clear the level is as high as that of Einstein! Come and challenge yourself!<br />
<br />
How to play Keep Sheep:<br />
There is a groove below, a total of 7 blocks can be placed in the groove.<br />
Match three tiles with the same pattern. Clicking on tiles automatically places them in the groove below. When there are 3 tiles of the same pattern in the groove, they will be automatically eliminated.<br />
*Note: Up to 7 moves can be used to remove three tiles with the same pattern in each round! If the groove is full of tiles, it means you fail. Every step matters!<br />
Tiles will have many layers. Only after the tiles on the upper layer are eliminated, the blocks on the lower layer can be eliminated.<br />
When there are no tiles on the grass, you have successfully cleared the level!<br />
<br />

Easy match - Challenge your brain through thousands of mahjong puzzles. classic elimination gameplay. The low difficulty level at the beginning will help you quickly get started, and then puzzles will become challenging! Are you ready? <br />

<strong>Cardiac Powder</strong> is a twin-stick shooter where you have a bomb in you, if you can’t maintain a certain BPM, it will explode… So one thing to do is keep you in action by fighting your opponents! You are a paid assassin, who wakes up with a clear message: “Be fast… or explode!” This threat will be stopped as soon as you accomplish the assigned mission… until the next one…<br><br>So, each assigned mission will force you to clean in a fast way every area that you will have to go to. <br><br><strong>During missions, you will experiment</strong>:<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Frenetic action: you will be able to shoot, move fast and dodge bullets, but you won’t be able to stay too calm otherwise you will finish in tiny pieces…<br></li><li>Bullet time: if you play extremely well, your BPM will go very high, which will allow you to surpass human capabilities by going faster than ordinary mortals<br></li><li>Find items to get you through your journey: items like adrenaline syringe will help you to keep your BPM high</li></ul>

</GAME>

<GameId>2203610</GameId>
<GameName>Ants of Duty</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2203610/extras/Follow.gif?t=1669738693" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2203610/extras/ant.gif?t=1669738693" /><br>Ants of Duty is a strategy game about managing a small colony of ants that find themselves in an unknown territory. You have to help them cope with the huge dangers on their way, such as red ants, wasps and crabs, so that the ants find their way back to their home. Get resources, build an army and defeat enemies.Особенности: a game for the speed of development of the colony, many different opponents, a game with a choice of consequences. PositiveThis is a scam; ignore the positive reviews--they have nothing to do with this 'game' and are completely misleading.  

Where to begin?  The main menu has 2 options:  Play and exit.  No options.  No instructions.  No tutorial.  Once you start the game, its even worse.  No instructions, terrible graphics.  

Gameplay consists of pressing 3 possible buttons (Q, A, and Z) to summon a worker ant (Q) or some fighter ants (the others).  The works automatically (and with about the stupidest AI imaginable) collect a leaf while you 'control' the warrior ants by clicking on them and sending them to attach the enemy 'base' which is always to the right by clicking on it.  No strategy, no depth.  There's one resource (leaves).  You can't build anything except the 3 types of ants.  Can't build any buildings. 

Oh, and usually if you try to select your ants, it takes about a half dozen times before the game registers it.  Imagine a RTS where there's 1 resource, 3 units which have almost nonexistent AI, completely empty levels, asset flip graphics and--somehow--a completely buggy UI that doesn't register your clicks most of the time.  That's 'Ants of Duty'.  Thank goodness for Steam's refund policy.Interesting game where you can feel like a king ant, it's interesting and fun, I advise you this game, there is interesting gameplay, convenient controls, it is not expensive and worth it to try to play, I really liked it
</CONTENT>

<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">INTRODUCTION</h2>Crust Crusaders is a shoot 'em up roguelike. You've been abandoned by the rest of your slices and it's your job to find them. Along the way, you'll be rewarded with toppings that offer skills to help you along this journey. The toppings you select effect your abilities. For example, pepperoni gives you a double blaster, while mushrooms give you a shield. Are you ready to find the best topping combination and defeat the evil fruits and veggies and save the planetary pie?<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2202770/extras/CC-01.gif?t=1669833575" /><h2 class="bb_tag">GAMEPLAY</h2>Crust Crusaders uses an auto-rotate feature that allows the player to enjoy the game by switching targeting groups without having to manually rotate. Enemies all have their own set of abilities and fall within three categories: Tank, Damage and Support. Tank has higher health and is usually first to engage. Damage has low health but does more damage with projectiles. Support usually hangs in the back and heals.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2202770/extras/banana-zoom.gif?t=1669833575" /><h2 class="bb_tag">TOPPINGS</h2>There are currently 15+ and 6+ sauces that all provide a unique ability to your slice. <GameName>Out of the ground</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Strange things happen on a mysterious island, whence out of nowhere, evil spirits begin to crawl out of the ground and you, the greedy pirate &quot;Redbeard&quot;, are sent to this island to figure out what's wrong. Dark filth is growing in the depths of the island, threatening to turn the entire island into a decaying cemetery of the dead! You have to eradicate all evil spirits, otherwise the island and you will fall.<br />
<br />
The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Find yourself on the island, travel around the location, destroy enemies, use all available weapons and get to the pirate ship to go further. The game world is divided into different levels, which will open as you progress through the story.<br />
<br />
In Out of the ground, find a way to stop the spread of corruption on the island by fighting hordes of undead, thugs and feel the effects of corruption on yourself.<br />
<br />
Game Features:<br />
- Nice pixel graphics<br />
- Huge game world<br />
- Interesting tasks 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameId>2202910</GameId>
<GameName>Shadow Lens</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Shadow Lens is a found-footage video game set in the 90s. The game was never finished, its release in 2000 was due to developer negligence. I obtained the original code for the game and ported it to PC for you to play. There is a lot of unused content in the game files that can only be accessed with cheats. <br />
<br />
The game case reads:<br />
--------------------------------------------------<br />
Monsters lurk across your uncle's farm.<br />
Collect tools to unlock new areas.<br />
Upgrade your camera to navigate the darkness.<br />
Find your missing daughter.<br />
Discover what happened to her.<br />
Solve puzzles to get items.<br />
Complete quests for the locals.<br />
Get slimed and try again!<br />
--------------------------------------------------<br />
<br />
The player is thrust into the role of a nameless protagonist tasked with investigating the strange happenings on an old farm. Discover the mystery of what happened to your daughter, Hantu. On the journey finding a plethora of tools and items to aid in her search. For example, your upgradable polaroid camera can be used to aluminate dark spaces. But be careful, because monsters often hide in these areas and are hard to see. To find Hantu, puzzles involving items must be solved. Most items can be interacted with, consumed, or picked up with your hand. Mastery of the tools and consumables is the key to finding Her. Hidden secrets from Cheat Codes to Unlockable areas litter the landscape. It is up to you to find them. Are you brave enough to look within the shadows and find Hantu? 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameId>2203130</GameId>
<GameName>Levels</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This game is a Virtual Reality First Person target shooting experience. You go through each environment in your elevator and clear the targets. The faster you clear them, the more points you get. Its THAT simple! 3 user reviewsI just can't recommend this freebie. I don't think it works as an aim trainer because the gun model is so bad and I don't know of a single VR game that this would train you for. The "gun model" doesn't even have iron sights. 

Also, this free to play title needs better optimization. I was getting shaky gameplay on my RTX 3080. I literally felt like I was doing target practice in the middle of an LA earthquake. 

It has a few levels. I did the levels several times before the 5 minutes was up so that I could post a review. I just wanted to quit real quick and never play again. Good luck to the dev, with some polish, this may be a good target practice / aim trainer in the future, but it's not there currently.I just can't recommend this freebie. <GameId>2202370</GameId>
<GameName>折镜（prism.im）</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">关于“我”</h2>“我”是一个普通人，目前年纪不大，打工人一枚。从小因为各种原因，有用传统纸笔写日记的习惯。直到科技发展、电脑和互联网普及，偶然发现了这款集存储日记、标记日程表、兴趣聊天室及私信聊天等为一体的小众软件，使用起来简约而有质感，便被深深迷住，并成为忠实用户。每天都坚持在上面写日记。<br>深入了解发现，这款软件不仅好用，而且听说它与“棱镜计划”这个地下研究有关，即这款软件是连接平行宇宙的桥梁。我想和另一个自己对话，我想借助他分享的另一个世界在选择上的的分支，指引自己做出更加正确的决定。或者说，我想知道自己生活的另一种可能性。不过可惜，这只是听说的而已，没有事实依据，但我心存敬畏，我相信这种可能。<h2 class="bb_tag">关于“我”的世界</h2>“我”所处的世界和玩家所在的现实世界是一样的，只不过突然多了一款这样的软件，它充满惊喜和意外，导致形成了一个一定意义上的全新的世界。你是该软件的资深用户，使用多年。我们相信你很快就能熟悉并了解。<h2 class="bb_tag">“我”要做什么</h2>游玩过程中，玩家自行且绝对自由的探索这款软件，以更加了解“我”的故事和面对迎来的意外。玩家会经历各种与“我”所处的现实世界强连接的事件，通过聊天及软件里解锁的新功能等，熟悉并了解后，用玩家现实世界的方式自行代入并了解一个全新的世界。<h2 class="bb_tag">游戏特色</h2><strong>以软件方式呈现</strong><br>我们不会有任何游戏教程和玩家指引。我们希望你能保持探索的心，并代入那个“我”，成为以你意识和选择为主，塑造的全新的“我”。<br><br><strong>创新的对话系统</strong><br>游玩过程中根据你的情绪及主观意愿，发挥你的自由意志，谨慎选择你的每一个选项。分支众多，对话间反复拉扯。在软件里的人都是有血有肉的人，他们会帮助你，也许会给你了解更多的信息，但最好不要挑战他们的耐心。；不过也有可能背叛你，也许他们表里不一，软件中的他们和现实中又完全不一样。没有最好的结局，你甚至到不了你最想要的结局，只有最适合你的结局。<br><br><strong>时常乱序的时间线</strong><br>你需要快速代入到“我”这个角色中，快速整理自己过去、现在以及将来所遭遇的事。串在一起后，自己和身边的一切人与事都将鲜活起来。“我”究竟有怎样的故事，发生了什么，为什么和这款软件紧密连接在了一起。<br><br>总之，《折镜》的世界里你会体验到一个全新的现实世界。这款软件的强大之处在于，它是一个意识体，同时也是个日常生活中常用的软件。背后的故事很大，且细思恐极。整个过程重在体验，颠覆以往对声音、美术、画面等曾经对游戏的固有认知。 
</CONTENT>
