<GameName>Anime City</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>Anime City</strong> reinvents classic visual novel mechanics by transferring them into full 3D environment. You start the game with entrance ceremony of your high school, and will have to engage in school and after school activities, while also trying to win love of one of unique characters you meet throughout the game.<h2 class="bb_tag">ANIME SIMULATOR</h2>The game has a strong focus on anime culture, carefully and authentically recreating various details of Japanese architecture, cuisine, fashion, and traditions.<h2 class="bb_tag">SCHOOL AND CLUBS</h2>In addition to attending regular school classes (history, physical education, Japanese language, cooking) you can choose to join one of after school clubs and perform tasks assigned by club leaders.<h2 class="bb_tag">DATING</h2>Throughout the game, you can meet several dateable characters, and ask them out on dates. Your success will depend on whether your stats meet their minimum expectations. You can pursue both girls and boys as your love interests. Depending on your choice of playable character, boy x girl, girl x girl, and boy x boy dates are possible.<h2 class="bb_tag">SKILLS</h2>Your character has a number of skills, affecting your personal stats, and your success on dates: fashion, cooking, science, sports, social, gardening, gaming, arts. Improving any of these skills will require engaging in specific school activities or after-school clubs.<h2 class="bb_tag">CHARACTER AND CLOTHES CUSTOMIZATION</h2>You can start to play as either girl or boy, with a range of parameters to customize, and a number of clothes and accessories to use.<h2 class="bb_tag">SURVIVAL SIMULATOR</h2>Your character has health, hunger, thirst, energy, and comfort stats. During the game, you'll have to balance limited resources and take care of your character's needs. If you neglect those, you can end up getting sick and will be taken to school infirmary to recover.<h2 class="bb_tag">TIME OF YEAR</h2>The game world is dynamic and will change according to current time of year. Some events and opportunities will be available only during specific periods.

<GameId>2214860</GameId>
<GameName>Look for connecting stars</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">Story Background</h2>We travel through the universe to collect precious treasures. During our journey we enjoy the magnificent scenery of the universe, we will also encounter different enemies, we will create black holes and devour our enemies.<h2 class="bb_tag">Gameplay</h2>It is a relaxing game where when you choose two targets of the same color, they are connected by lightning and then destroyed by a black hole. When you destroy 100 targets, you win. <br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/GIFyanshi.gif?t=1669270258" /><br>Of course, you have to finish within the allotted time to win, each game is limited to 5 minutes, and the shorter the time, the higher the rating you get. As I said, it's a simple little game to decompress.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/GIF11.11.gif?t=1669270258" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Features</h2>To make the game more interesting, I made the game into 3D graphics. Unlike traditional 2D graphics, you can control your character to fly freely in the universe without being restricted. You'll need to keep connecting more targets during your flight, and you'll soon find it fun.<h2 class="bb_tag">More Game Modes</h2>Obstacle Mode: Add a random number of objects that are the same size and color as the target, but selecting them will not react in any way.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/11.21GIF.gif?t=1669270258" /><br>Gem Mode: Eliminate 100 targets while collecting a randomly specified number of gems to win.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/11.21GIF_1_.gif?t=1669270258" /><br>Vanishing Mode: Targets disappear randomly, making it difficult to lock onto them when there are fewer and fewer targets.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/11.21GIF_2_.gif?t=1669270258" /><br>These game modes interfere with quick target selection, and it's not easy to beat a perfect score.<h2 class="bb_tag">More Fun</h2>As you win more and more, new maps are unlocked for you. In the new map, bosses will be spawned with different skills that will attack you at any time. You'll need to dodge boss skills in time, because if you get hit, your character will die instantly and you'll need to challenge again.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/GIF.gif?t=1669270258" /><br><br>There are currently 4 maps in the game and 800 levels waiting for you to unlock.<h2 class="bb_tag">The Developers Want to Say</h2>This is my first indie game and I hope to make it even better. So I hope that players will be able to comment on this game after the experience, and I will do my best to improve it.<h2 class="bb_tag">You Can Contact Me</h2><h2 class="bb_tag">QQ：690845098</h2>

<GAME>
<GameId>2214870</GameId>
<GameName>Southern Legends - The Temple Defenders</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h1>Feature List</h1><p>- Several playable classes
- Numerous Subclasses to specialize 
- Hundreds of Skills/perks to build your unique character
- Different maps, with each map having its own special unlocks and unique features.  
- Hundreds of unique enemies
- Collect materials to gain experience 
- Purchase different items from in game shops.
- Craft items and Equipment
- Master the rune craft</p><br><h1>About the Game</h1>There is a war on-going, unbeknown to the rest of the world in distant lands. Every night the hoard descends from the depths of darkness to seek the power of the ancient scrolls hidden inside the forgotten temples, and every night they are faced with the guardians of the temples. Brave warriors from various origins who dedicated their lives to protect the ancient scrolls. The battle rages on, numerous guardians have sacrificed their lives to protect the scrolls and each time a guardian falls, a new one takes his place, for if the darkness ever gets to the scrolls the world as we now know it will end. 

Temple Defenders is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.

The night has fallen, the hoard is here to desecrate your temple grounds. As the protector of the temple your task is to make sure non enters the sacred grounds. Defend the treasures inside the temple with your life or die trying. They are many, you are one, all you can do is to try to hold them off till the dawn.

All rooms in Level 0 share the same superficial features, such as worn mono-yellow wallpaper, old moist carpet, scattered electrical outlets, and inconsistently-placed fluorescent lighting. Aside from these common features, no two rooms within the level are identical.<br><strong>It's almost as if the level existed to spite one's sense of reality.</strong><br><br>The fluorescent lighting present in Level 0 hums at a constant frequency. This buzzing is notably louder and more obtrusive than ordinary fluorescent lights, and examination of the fixtures to determine the source has been inconclusive thus far. Secondly, the substance lightly saturating the carpet cannot be consistently identified; it is not water, nor is it safe to consume.

<br />
*** IMPORTANT : You must have a Constant, Fast &amp; Stable Internet Connection in order for the Global Content Data System to Work ! *** <br />
<br />
You can Fly Out into Space to see the whole Earth at once.<br />
<br />
SPEED UP = Gamepad Right Shoulder / Mouse Wheel UP<br />
SLOW DOWN = Gamepad Left Shoulder / Mouse Wheel Down<br />
<br />
You can only 'See' on the Sunny Side of the Earth, some Cities are set at different Times of Day.<br />
<br />
Trying to Find Your House or another Place of Interest ?<br />
Try going to Philadelphia (It has Street Markers) and then Zoom/Fly out to Space and Zoom back into Your Location.<br />
<br />
If the Location You are Looking for is on the Dark Side of the Earth, then try ' FAST Travel ' to another City to see if it is Near Your Area.<br />

Some levels were good to play and then there were some levels where I just wanted to punch this game back into unity asset store.

Levels with obstacles (especially those Karate Kid practice things) are annoying as hell. In one level they just push you off (at least for me) but you have to use them to platform and reach the next stage. Wasn't fun at all and kinda destroyed my positive opinion from the first few levels.

Fall damage is kinda  random as well (it seems). I sometimes died by falling a small distance while other times I could fall for ages and survive.

Wall-Jumping, oh man. I don't know, it also felt like random. Often times the character would stop jumping from the wall and just fall/slide down. Its really not that hard to press the jump button, so I certainly won't take the blame for having issues with it.. :D

<GameId>2222420</GameId>
<GameName>The Curse of Eclipse</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This is a relaxing adventure and puzzle game created by a solo developer.<br><br>A strange phenomena named eclipse occurred in an abandoned house. The house is affected by the curse of eclipse where as ghosts become visible, objects are moving and doors are opening and closing.<br>You as the main character had a strange dream related to the abandoned house. It looks like the dream was indirect message from a super natural power which tells you to visit the house. Then, your story began when your curiosity led you to find the secret of the house.<br>This game is inspired by Atic Atac from ZX Spectrum.<h2 class="bb_tag">How to play</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Avoid enemies. Enemies are moving in patterns which make it predictable but difficult puzzle to solve.<br></li><li>Find keys. Different keys open different doors. Your inventory has only three slots. Therefore, choose wisely which keys to take.<br></li><li>Collect magical scrolls. Magical scrolls are used in the late game to open the gate to the heaven.<br></li><li>Read notes. There are notes in the house which tell you about the story of the game and guide you through the game.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Vector like graphics. All 3D objects and animations of the game are drawn as vectors or lines.<br></li><li>Different camera views. The game is playable with three camera views; third person, first person and top down.<br></li><li>Save and load. The complete walk through of the game may take up to three hours. Therefore, save and load options were added so that the player can take a rest.</li></ul> 
</CONTENT>

The player controls the protagonist fighter to fight the enemy in the air.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2237820/extras/p1.jpg?t=1670035824" /><br>[Game Control]<br>Players can control the game through keyboard, keyboard+mouse or joystick.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2237820/extras/p2.jpg?t=1670035824" /><br>[Game Features]<br>Players can get diamonds by destroying enemy planes, and diamonds can be used to upgrade the protagonist's fighter planes in the supply station. The types that can be upgraded include the number of bullets, the power of bullets, lasers, protective shields, large-scale attack weapons and so on.<br>Players can gain experience when they hit enemy planes. After the experience is full, the main gun and secondary gun of the fighter will be upgraded. After the level reaches the maximum, the protagonist fighter will enter the state of blood.

<GameName>Bremen Hot Strings</GameName>
<CONTENT>
&quot;When the world is in danger, music will save the world&quot;. <br><br>Bremen Hot Strings is a graphic adventure that adapts the original Brothers Grimm fairy tale &quot;Town Musicians of Bremen&quot; within the context of 1930s Germany under the yoke of Nazism.<h2 class="bb_tag">SYNOPSIS</h2> In their dream, to give the concert of their lives and to make known the wonderful &quot;swing life.&quot; The Bremen band Hot Strings, at the opposite of the way of thinking and acting of the current government, will be persecuted by a ruthless SS detective. Especially after the disappearance of one of the beloved members of the group which the rest will work in detective work, in order to find their friend.<h2 class="bb_tag">FEATURES</h2>    • <strong>Visual novel</strong>: Go inside the world of Bremen Hot Strings in an old school point and click graphic adventure (Monkey Island, Hollywood Monsters, etc). Narrated with illustrations that mixes the concept art style with the European graphic novel (Blacksad, Paco Roca, etc). All of this without forgetting the inspiration coming from the wonderful 1993 movie, Swing Kids.<br><br>    • <strong>Gameplay</strong>: Control the four main characters of the Bremen Hot Strings group: Vittorio, Gustave, Klaus and Federico. Each one with a characteristic ability of the animal it represents.<br><br>    • <strong>Inmersive story</strong>: About twenty secondary characters will meet through the six chapters of the story, which will take place from the slums to the upper class mansions in the city of Bremen in the year 1938. Accompany our friends from BHS to overcome all their challenges and challenges, not only at a group level but also at a psychological-personal level, until they lead to different alternative endings.

<CONTENT>
<strong>You are a dice</strong>.<br><br>You can roll dice because you are dice, and<br>You can solve puzzles because you are a dice.<br><br>&quot;Suikoro&quot; is waiting for you to roll as your &quot;intuition&quot; tells you.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214480/extras/explanation_image_1.png?t=1668567575" /><br><br>Roll and step on the &quot;designated panel&quot; on the ground!<br>The &quot;designated panel&quot; on the ground is responsible for opening the goal. To roll to the designated panel, you need to make sure that the eyes on the panel are the same as the eyes on your top, but you change the eyes every time you roll. So, even if you roll honestly, it may not work. When that happens, I recommend that you start over, choose a different puzzle, or get away from &quot;Suikoro&quot; and play another game, or go outside and change your mind.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214480/extras/explanation_image_2.png?t=1668567575" /><br><br>■Change your colors and change your mood!<br>Are your colors white, black and red? If so, try to be a different you once in a while. Choose something close to your favorite color or a color you don't normally wear and dress up in your own way, then relax and watch you roll.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214480/extras/explanation_image.png?t=1668567575" /><br><br>■The sum of the front and back of a six-sided dice is always seven!<br>Did you know that? Can't recommend it at the moment.

https://youtu.be/lwcoKH5d2ZQThe level design is the coolest thing about this game. While the enemies are cool to look at, the combat is a boring, staid affair. This is the sort of thing that I would be excited to see MUCH later in the development cycle. Take it off steam, develop it more, get through the alpha phase and THEN once it is polished, put it back on steam.
Can't recommend it at the moment.

https://youtu.be/lwcoKH5d2ZQ
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2214060</GameId>
<GameName>Shifted Heart</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Shifted Heart is a 2D Sidescrolling Metroidvania. Progression will be tied to clever use of abilities learned through exploration. How will you scale this cliff? Navigate past these obstacles? Clear that huge chasm? Take down this tough boss? If you can find a clever way to use your known spells, you will craft your own answer to these questions, and many more! <br><br><br><i>With the last of my strength... I send you</i><br><br>A great darkness has fallen over the world, and yet, the area around Shutterweld seems to have been spared for a time. You awaken deep underground with no memory, and a voice requesting the world be returned to how it should be.<br><br>You play as a creature called a Shifter by the locals. Capable of transforming your body into any shape to achieve your goals. Take heed, the forces of nature don't seem to be too friendly to your kind. Luckily, and quite conveniently, all of the abilities you learn have combat applications!<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214060/extras/storepagegif2.gif?t=1668907964" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li> 8 distinct areas to explore<br></li><li> 15 spells to mix and match to your liking<br></li><li> Over 30 enemy types to destroy<br></li><li> 7(?) bosses to conquer<br></li><li> Some lore for the curious types</li></ul><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214060/extras/storepagegif.gif?t=1668907964" />

<GameName>Die in the Dungeon: PROLOGUE</GameName>

<h1>Wishlist the full version coming in 2023!</h1><p><a href="https://store.steampowered.com/app/2026820/Die_in_the_Dungeon/" target="_blank" rel=""  id="dynamiclink_0" >https://store.steampowered.com/app/2026820/Die_in_the_Dungeon/</a></p><br><h1>About the Game</h1><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214080/extras/ditd_dice.gif?t=1670351482" /><br><br>This is the free version of Die in the Dungeon, a <strong>deck-building, turn-based roguelite</strong> where your deck is not made out of cards, but <strong>DICE</strong>!<br><br>In Die in the Dungeon, <strong>each dice represents a different action</strong>, from basic ones like attacking or healing, to boosting other dice or copying their abilities. <strong>Place dice on your board to unlock their powers</strong>, but be careful... not any place will do! The way you arrange your dice on the board will affect how good your turn is. Try to <strong>find the best combination</strong> while you upgrade your deck and collect new, stronger dice with unique abilities.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214080/extras/ditd_explanation_rewards.gif?t=1670351482" /><h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>Prologue Features</strong></h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li> <strong>Fight your way through 20+ floors with increasingly difficult encounters.</strong> With more than 10 different enemies, 2 bosses and multiple special events, you're getting a massive amount of content completely for free!<br></li><li> <strong>Collect dice, make them stronger with special properties and craft the ultimate deck.</strong> All dice have base effects, which in turn can be combined with powerful modifiers to reduce their cost (Hollow) or make them stay longer on the board (Heavy), among many others!<br></li><li> <strong>Replay and refine your strategy until you reach the final floor.</strong> Who is waiting for you at the end of the dungeon? Face familiar foes, learn the truth about this endless cycle and dare stepping even farther with the brand new Endless Mode!</li></ul><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214080/extras/_Enemies_final_version.gif?t=1670351482" />

<GAME>
<GameId>2214140</GameId>
<GameName>Tsubaki Hata</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">General</h2><br><strong>Tsubaki Hata</strong> is an <strong>addicting game</strong> in which you have to solve puzzles with <strong>Lovely Girls</strong><br><br><strong>Incredible Atmosphere</strong>, <strong>Great Music</strong>,<strong> lots of levels with girls art in HD quality.</strong><br>The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Several difficulty levels.<br></li><li><strong>Relaxing gameplay</strong><br></li><li><strong>5 HD quality art with beautiful girls</strong><br></li><li><strong>Pleasant atmosphere.</strong></li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Modes:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>EASY</strong> - 4x4<br></li><li><strong>MEDIUM</strong> - 4x6<br></li><li><strong>ADVANCED</strong> - 6x10<br></li><li><strong>HARD</strong> - 8x14<br></li><li><strong>EPIC</strong>- 10x16</li></ul> 1 user reviews[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Tsubaki Hata is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Unreal Quality Games/Rosa Special Studio, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

It gets worse... the Jigsaw Github template has been shamelessly dumped on Steam by Rosa Special Studio a whopping 64 times.  That's got to be a world record for the most asset flip scams from the same template.  Here's some of them so you can see for yourself:

    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1891570]Sokonashi No Me[/url]"

Take a look... these are all [i]exactly the same game![/i]

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Unreal Quality Games/Rosa Special Studio.
[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Take a look... these are all [i]exactly the same game![/i]

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Unreal Quality Games/Rosa Special Studio.

</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2214150</GameId>
<GameName>Pichi Girl</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">General</h2><br><strong>Pichi Girl</strong> is an <strong>addicting game</strong> in which you have to solve puzzles with <strong>Lovely Girls</strong><br><br><strong>Incredible Atmosphere</strong>, <strong>Great Music</strong>,<strong> lots of levels with girls art in HD quality.</strong><br>The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Several difficulty levels.<br></li><li><strong>Relaxing gameplay</strong><br></li><li><strong>5 HD quality art with beautiful girls</strong><br></li><li><strong>Pleasant atmosphere.</strong></li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Modes:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>EASY</strong> - 4x4<br></li><li><strong>MEDIUM</strong> - 4x6<br></li><li><strong>ADVANCED</strong> - 6x10<br></li><li><strong>HARD</strong> - 8x14<br></li><li><strong>EPIC</strong>- 10x16</li></ul> 2 user reviews[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Pichi Girl is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Rosa Special Studio/Unreal Quality Games, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

It gets worse... the Jigsaw Github template has been shamelessly dumped on Steam by Rosa Special Studio a whopping 64 times.  That's got to be a world record for the most asset flip scams from the same template.  Here's some of them so you can see for yourself:

This is a pretty good quality jigsaw puzzle game at a low price, but there are only five puzzles which is less than some of my other games. A couple of the pictures are really attractive. There are features like allowing you to separate the edge pieces from the other pieces.[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1467130]White Dandelion[/url]"
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1607570]Cute Girls Love Books[/url]"
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1668810]Midsummer Madness[/url]"
[/list]

Take a look... these are all [i]exactly the same game![/i]

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Rosa Special Studio/Unreal Quality Games.
This is a pretty good quality jigsaw puzzle game at a low price, but there are only five puzzles which is less than some of my other games. A couple of the pictures are really attractive. There are features like allowing you to separate the edge pieces from the other pieces.
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameName>Stream Runners: Heroes</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Stream Runners: Heroes is a retro style idle game for live streamers with Twitch Affiliate or Twitch Partner status. The host will start the game and go live on Twitch, letting their viewers (or chat) add Runners to the battle in one of three lanes using Twitch channel points.<br />
<br />
The game includes 6 themes with sprite designs to match the theme. You can choose a theme based on your personal style, or to match whichever game you are playing.<br />
<br />
Fantasy<br />
Cyberpunk<br />
Gothic<br />
Aqua<br />
Super<br />
Magical<br />
<br />
The game can be played by thousands of players, all streamed live on your screen. There are many ways to use this game with your community, it's all up to you and your chat.

<img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214170/extras/t2.png?t=1668386050" /><br><br>In Wyoming Winter you and a group of fellow employees find yourselves snowed in to the Wyoming department of defence building as a blizzard covers the state. You'll soon find out your group is not the only thing trapped in the building. Don't be found.</i><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214170/extras/Overview.png?t=1668386050" /><br>Wyoming Winter is a multiplayer game where one person in the lobby is chosen at random to be the Blight, an almost invincible, fast moving, dark creature that escaped from the lower levels of the Wyoming facility. The rest of the players are employees who's job it is to stop the Blight from escaping the facility. Employees need to either have at least one member alive after 10 minutes or kill the Blight using weapons that can be unlocked from weapon lockers after an employee finishes their list of tasks.<br><br>Wyoming Winter is best played with 3-8 players. Servers are available in Europe, America &amp; Asia.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214170/extras/Gameplay.png?t=1668386050" /><br>Employee's start with a notepad of tasks and a watch. The notebook contains a list of tasks to be completed before the employee is given a final task to locate a weapon. The watch shows how much time the Blight has left to escape. If the timer ends with at least one employee still alive, the employees will win. The Blight has heightened vision and can see well in dark places along with incredible strength that allows it to snap the neck of any employee in an instant. Both the Blight &amp; employees can climb and crouch into unique and crafty hiding places using the climbing system.

Mr. Wise is an interactive visual novel with multiple endings. Story of this game is about two archaeology professors who are friends for long years and their weird discovery which they call &quot;The Tablet&quot;<br />
<br />
Two friends; Mavera and Selnan try to decide whether they should get help from a renowned figure called Mr. Wise to decipher The Tablet's elusive secrets, while trying to find their way when the things got out of hand in this adventure visual novel.<br />
<br />
While the professors try to protect The Tablet and themselves from the formidable schemes they face, the events will unfold ever unpredictably. Every secret they reveal will be endangering them, their loved ones and even the world itself.<br />
<br />
You will be playing as one of these two professors, Selnan or Mavera; who have no other expertise than their profession. You will try to survive the physical dangers by using your not very physical skill set.<br />

<CONTENT>
PinCOL is an addictive Action 2D Space Shooter, the Color Damage Mechanics will drive you Crazy !!!<br />
Destroy Enemies, collect Pins and use them to Upgrade Weapons and Ship. <br />
Get Experience in Roguelikemode to Unlock new Ships with Special Powers<br />
<br />
-Main Color Mechanics: The Player Ship can change Color between RED and BLUE, you can be damaged by enemy weapons only if opposite color, same thing with your weapons versus the enemies.<br />
-WEAPONS: Bullet, Missile, Laser, Mine, Flak<br />
-ITEMS: 8 Special Technology to obtain<br />
<br />
-Story Mode:<br />
A solar system fully explorable, defend Planets by destroying all Enemies spawned from Wormholes to get new Items and unlock the Planet's Base station, Mining Station and Refinery, build Mining Drones to get materials from Asteroids, refining into Pins. Other 3 Alien Stations are the second harder objective.<br />
<br />
-Roguelike Mode:<br />
A mode where you have initially one Ship to select at Start, destroy Waves of Enemies to obtain XP and get Upgrades Cards to improve Weapons and Ship Stats. Unlock New Ships gaining Experience every Run.<br />
<br />
NOTE:<br />
Story Mode: under Development, partially completed.<br />
Roguelike Mode: Completed with 5 Zones, planned new Zones and Upgrades in next Updates

The Dungeon Rules is the most challenging puzzle game you can currently face. This game is a combination of dungeon crawler, sokoban puzzles and card combat.<br><br><strong>DUNGEON CRAWLER</strong><br>In The Dungeon Rules you will have to explore and find the exit of each dungeon to access the next one. Along the way you will find all kinds of obstacles and enemies.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212690/extras/dungeon-crawler.gif?t=1670390165" /><br><br><strong>SOKOBAN PUZZLES</strong><br>You will have to activate mechanisms and levers to open doors, build bridges, lower spikes, move walls and unblock all kinds of obstacles to reach the exit.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212690/extras/sokoban-puzzles.gif?t=1670390165" /><br><br><strong>MAGIC</strong><br>Magic will help you in your adventure. Explore the abandoned Asher Asylum in an effort to find a missing cop.  Learn about the horrors plaguing the old asylum, and try to find a way to stop its cursed residents from leaving.  <br />
This indie horror FPS is designed as a throw-back to the late 2000s indie horror scene, complete with collectibles, pages of lore, inventory management, clunky combat, and multiple endings, all intended to capture the glory days of internet horror games, both the good parts and the bad parts. 1 user reviewsI played this game for about 2 hours today and I love it. I would definitely recommend this game for anyone that loves horror games and can't wait to get back to it tomorrow.

<GameName>Prehistoric World: A New Beginning</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Prehistoric World: A New Beginning is a strategy game set in an open world. As a representative of a private company, you have been given the task of building a complete, functional dinosaur fauna on a newly discovered planet while maximizing your company's profits. You have more than 42 species of dinosaurs to choose from - herbivores, predators, pterosaurs, aquatic dinosaurs.  You have access to many locations on the planet where you can try to revive the Jurassic era. <br><br>You can organize expeditions and hunts for profit, or you can solve situations by landing on the planet yourself. Technology also allows you to control the brain of any dinosaur you have on the planet. You can also breed dinosaurs, sell their eggs, and perform a variety of tasks. There is also a native alien fauna on the planet that you must suppress.<br><br><br><br><strong>STORY</strong><br>66 million years ago, a 15-kilometre asteroid, Chicxulub, crashed into Earth.  The impact of the trillion-ton meteorite was enormously powerful and caused a worldwide ecological disaster. This catastrophe caused the last known mass extinction at the turn of the Mesozoic Era and ended the dominance of the dinosaurs. The impact created a crater 80 kilometres wide and 30 kilometres deep. The impact released enormous energy, resulting in fires, earthquakes and megatsunamis. The worst effects of the impact lasted 30 years. The impact winter that followed the impact lasted more than a century. The entire planet was affected. The disaster wiped out 75 percent of life on Earth.<br><br>By 2190, scientists had deciphered the dinosaurs' DNA and learned to reconstruct it. In 2220, the technology of traveling at the speed of light was discovered and successfully tested.  The exploration and settlement of planets beyond our solar system began.<br><br>In 2362, a private company, ACTAS, found a planet that is 85% similar to our earth from 66 million years ago. The planet was named Hope. The company decided to reconstruct the dinosaur fauna and use it for commercial purposes. The entire planet was declared a protected reserve. Only paying visitors are allowed on the planet. Some private companies have not recognised this move by ACTAS. The company expects huge profits from this unique attraction.<br><br>The first step was to build a space station in the orbit of Hope. Samples of several dozen dinosaurs were brought to the station. The entire planet has been fairly well mapped. Locations were selected for dinosaur settlement where there is less of an abundance of alien species inhabiting the planet. The company has appointed you director of the planetary colonization project. Your task is to build a functional and harmonious fauna on the planet and maximize the company's profits. And here begins your new adventure!

<GameId>2212940</GameId>
<GameName>Turn back the clock：Hsinchu</GameName>
<CONTENT>
&quot;Turn back the clock：Hsinchu&quot; takes the historical time and space of Hsinchu City, Taiwan as the background of the game. The story revolves around the common adventure between a contemporary historian and an agent of the Time and Space Security Bureau from the future. In the plot, the player needs to alternately play the two protagonists, using a dual-perspective method, to gradually explore the truth of the event in the process of rectifying and repairing historical events.<br />
<br />
The scene design of this game is based on real historical time and space, creating a very high sense of immersion in the age, allowing players to experience the historical time and space changes and cultural connotations of Hsinchu City while playing.<br />
<br />
Feature of the product:<br />
<br />
■Distinctive art style: The game art is realized in a simple Low Poly style, which simply but completely retains the architectural and humanistic characteristics of Hsinchu in various eras.<br />
<br />
■Through the plot based on historical facts: We invite professional film and television screenwriters Monica and Shaballe to write, and plan chapters in the mode of unit drama. The game plot is based on historical events, supplemented by a sci-fi time-space travel worldview, allowing players to have more magical imagination space for established historical events.<br />
<br />
■Double protagonist line: Players can choose the characters to play according to the progress of the plot, and experience the same script from different character perspectives as the starting point. The two protagonists will also experience conflict, cooperation, choice, and other plots, adding a touch to the script color.<br />
<br />
■Abundant action and puzzle-solving elements: The game is not limited to static observation and puzzle-solving, but also has dynamic action elements for players to complete when encountering emergencies.<br />
<br />
■360 Surround View Video Appreciation: Provides five scenic spots with 4K high-resolution stereo shooting in VR 180/360, players can see the current situation of Hsinchu scenic spots.

Introduction to the game:<br>AOI is a 2d horizontal board platform jumping game similar to the Galaxy Warrior Demon City. Players can decide according to their own preferences.<br><br>- The game has challenging levels and Boss battles.<br><br>- Players can carry 3 kinds of weapons at the same time. The attack means of each weapon are completely different, and they can switch instantaneously, so that players can achieve their unique fighting style and freely combine their fighting skills.<br><br>- There is almost no mandatory plot animation in the game. Players who only like jumping and fighting can completely ignore the plot. Players who like the plot can also explore the plot of the game through NPC dialogues and scattered information.<br><br>The game supports the key modification of the handle and keyboard, and has made the corresponding UI prompt adaptation. Players can set according to their own habits. Players can simply use ordinary attack clearance games. You can also choose to match different weapons to achieve the combination of skills, or grasp the opportunity to fight with the enemy to make yourself invincible. In short, the game design concept is to give players enough freedom to choose their own way to experience this wonderful journey.

Whenever a <strong>Token </strong>reaches the top, it'll activate whatever it does - heal you, shield you, give a Crit, give Scrap, or allow a Drone to fire. Re-arrange these Wheel Tokens to whatever you see fit, and before you can say &quot;hey watch this&quot; you deal 40 damage in one attack.<br>Not enough slots for your tokens to fit? No big deal! Swap <strong>cogwheels </strong>to get more slots, stacked slots, special tokens or more regeneration to increase your active capacity. But beware - larger cogwheels may have more slots, but consequently, each slot activate less often.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212500/extras/gif1A.gif?t=1669725842" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Block And Unlock</h2>Many items are locked at first, but in-game <strong>Goals </strong>can be tracked to unlock them. How do you get 5 Curse? Deal 30 damage? Use a Reclaimer? The items you gain from completing goals interact with those mechanics heavily! Additionally, you can simply choose Traditional Mode, where all items are unlocked from the start and Goals are purely cosmetic. <GameId>2212520</GameId>
<GameName>The Last Werewolf</GameName>
<CONTENT>
The Last Werewolf is a 2.5D supernatural mystery where you play as Lachie, a twenty-something lone werewolf, in search of more like her. As she looks for them, she investigates supernatural cases to get her one step closer to her heritage. <br><br>In this narrative-driven game, you will be able to chat with the people in the town, follow the clues, and fill out your journal along the way. Your decisions will impact the outcome of your case. If you rely on your Wolf Sense too much, or get grumpy with people, you'll shift into your wolf form, causing gossip in the town, and leaving the original case to go cold.<br><br>Inspiration for this narrative was taken from my first project which was a VR project for a University Master's degree.<br><br>This game will be in Early Access for about a year, with each case being released in stages. As I'm a solo dev who works on the side. If I'm able to hire some freelancers, I should be able to bring forward the official release date.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2212520/extras/Cultural_Centre.gif?t=1668036023" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Current Features</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> Three cases are planned.<br></li><li>Investigate and learn about supernatural creatures.<br></li><li>Make decisions that impact the outcome of the cases.<br></li><li>Wolf Sense: get hints along the way, but too much, and your wolf takes over.<br></li><li>Interactive chats with townsfolk.<br></li><li>Light puzzles.</li></ul>

<GAME>
<GameId>2212580</GameId>
<GameName>Barbelé</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Barbelé is an Action and 3D Fighting, 3rd person game. It's a story driven adventure in a french prison which offers players dialogue choices.<br />
You will have to do your time in prison, survive in a penitentiary with a real in game timer that you can influence with your action. You can make it pass quicker if you can smuggle things like a phone or books in your cell, or you can even add more time if you get caught fighting or doing anything else illegal.<br />
<br />
Barbelé was born under the name “GS project” for “sacrificed generation”. This idea that young immigrants from the projects go through the same thing over and over again. Like a cycle that does not allow you to move forward. Barbelé wants to be an analysis of society, of the police, of justice, of young people in the projects.<br />
The main feature of Barbelé is combat. The goal of the game is to get out of jail. After being sentenced to 2 years in prison, the player will have to try to survive to get out. A system of &quot;timer&quot; present in the game makes it possible to &quot;do your time&quot; to arrive at the moment when you become free. With each fight that you will make in front of witnesses of the penitentiary administration, you will add time to your sentence, you can even be sent to the &quot;hole&quot; for a given time so that you reflect on your actions.<br />
Several ways will be accessible to &quot;do your time&quot; and finally get out of prison. Not making waves and letting yourself be eaten by ill-intentioned prisoners can get you out sooner with reduced sentences or with your feet first... Fighting intelligently will offer you some advantages without risking increasing your time, and on the other hand, constantly fighting will help to establish your position in the prison, make money and easily get a phone in your cell to prepare for the rest of your incarceration. But this can get you into serious trouble, additional penalties that will constantly delay your exit.<br />
The use of the cell phone will be a major component of the game and there too, it will be necessary to learn to identify the guards' rounds and the schedules to know when it is possible to use the phone without risking being caught, which will result in an additional time, the loss of the phone which is very difficult to recover, and a passage to the hole.<br />
There are other ways to get out of jail... 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameId>2211750</GameId>
<GameName>Bounty</GameName>
<CONTENT>
A student project made in Unreal Engine 4 at SAE Expression College. A demo level from our game Bounty.<br />
<br />
Bounty is a first-person shooter bounty-hunting game. The player lands on a space station overrun with robotic bounty hunters. The player must locate and kill the bounty. The player is equipped with a six-shooter that shoots explosive rounds. The player fights through the robot bounty hunters to claim the ultimate prize, his reward. The game is a tactical first-person game. The robots are just as deadly as the six shooters the character wields. The player uses a cover system to avoid being shot. The cover system allows the player to return fire in a deadly firefight a little more safely. The game's plot is to create a mix of wild west gunslingers in a future period. The story behind this bounty hunter is that his father owes money to an intergalactic crime syndicate. This bounty is the “last” job for the crime family before he can free his father from his debt or so he thinks. 7 user reviewsReminds me of Dead Space, the cover system is a really cool idea, makes me think, what if Gears of War could move the cover the way Portal does? <GameId>2211960</GameId>
<GameName>Counterspell</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Counterspell is an endless runner game where you have to draw shapes to destroy hostile spells and jump over obstacles.<br>It is an easy to grasp but hard to master arcade game where the only goal is to survive as long as you can.<br><br>You use the mouse to draw the shapes which you see on the screen, there is also a spell you draw to jump over holes in the ground.<br>If you don't draw quickly enough, the glyphs will touch the wizard and result in a game over.<br>Some symbols are more complex than others and there are even large shapes which take two hits to kill, playing on an easier difficulty will reduce the frequency of challenging symbols appearing as well as the speed of the game.<br><br>There are currently 3 difficulty settings and 25 different patterns to learn as you try and get a high score.<br>There are also 6 unique powerups which will help you survive in different ways.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2211960/extras/wizard4.gif?t=1669310965" /> <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2211960/extras/wizard3.gif?t=1669310965" /> 2 user reviews#速度与激情9#

<GAME>
<GameId>2210810</GameId>
<GameName>Mining Factory</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This is a mining smelting idle game.<br>Minerals collected include coal mines, oil, natural gas, and uranium mines.<br>Ferrous metal iron ore, copper ore, manganese ore, chromium ore, vanadium ore, titanium ore,<br>Non-ferrous metals lead ore, zinc ore, aluminum ore, nickel ore, tungsten ore, magnesium ore, gold, silver, etc.<br>Non-metallic phosphate rock, boron rock, limestone, quartzite.<br>Rare metals Lithium ore, rubidium ore, cesium ore, niobium ore and many more. There are 40 kinds of minerals in total.<br>Smelting equipment includes furnaces, flotation machines, mining machines, etc. There are about 10 kinds of equipment. There are icons.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210810/extras/aa.jpg?t=1670496822" /><br>Each mine has its own smelting steps, try to transform it from real smelting.<br>Each smelting step requires raw materials and fuels to be crafted.<br><br>The resources of each mineral are limited and need to be explored to obtain resources. Heroes need to be made to explore and drop mineral sources. 2 user reviewsEDIT: I had to change this not NOT recommended.
Why? Not the game, although my thoughts have not changed, and about 4 hours is about all the "playing" there is.
It is because the dev has a very similar game, also at a cost that, is in the same state. If they had one game and were working on it? Sure, pay to get it. But this seems like a copy/paste cash grab, which is super sad, since the bones are there..

EDIT2: The devs response did not shine any light on why they released 2 games that are 20% complete, at the same time. My recommendation stays the same. Are you committed to making a good game, or making 2 games that are not really finished and make 2x as much cash? Pretty clear which the devs chose.

This is super beta material. The instructions (in English at least) are not that helpful and only 1 page saying not a lot.
Lots of stuff is not obvious, like only one of the "team" fights at once.
There is no scroll bar on the left, so it is VERY possible you will not notice there are more things to build (looking at you, Uranium!)
I would say I am half way through, and it has got to the point of my income being well high enough to just get each element, spam the buildings, get the next and repeat. Some balancing required.
There is very little in the way of decisions to make. Just make all the things until you need something (has happened twice in 4 hours...), go swap something over and you are done.

So why am I recommending it? Has good bones, I have enjoyed the 4 hours I have into it, and will probably "finish" it in another 4 or so. Tomorrow. :DGood idea for the game but the game is about 20% finished now. There are a lot of different resources but only few of them have specialized machinery, the rest are just copy-paste. Balance is non-existent, some things don't make sense. Why positive review then? Because I enjoyed playing it for 5 hours until it became obvious that it is not finished yet. So if you want to try it for few hours without expecting a full game, I recommend it.

I am not sure if it will be ever finished as their other game - Mining Copper was released two weeks before this one and also has reviews that say it is unfinished (I didn't play it myself) and instead of finishing one game dev released another.

So what is this game about? There are three parts in it: mining, making and exploration.

Mining:
You have several resources and each one has a machinery chain which basically starts from drilling holes, transforming them into tunnels, digging resources, transporting them, processing them into final product (either green/blue energy or just some resource which you store to use in other chains). Each stage in chain produces next resource and can also produce gold. You use gold to upgrade speed and yield of each stage. Some chains don't make sense, for example, you load impure coal into truck making truckload of coal, then unload truckload of coal into more impure coal at warehouse basically making impure coal out of nothing.

Making:
You use green energy to create 5 types of units. Each unit has rank and level. You produce rank 1 units. You can upgrade their level with gold and you can combine two of the same rank into one of the higher rank of the same type. So to create rank 9 unit you need to make 256 rank 1 units. After rank 9 it requires 4 units of the previous rank to make another, so 1024 rank 1 for rank 10, 4096 for rank 11, etc. After you upgrade a unit to a new level with cash you need to craft enough units to at least get it to the same rank before you can use it, luckily if you combine few units, one of which has higher level resulting level will be the highest of them.

Exploration:
You choose 3 unit types and the first unit of those types (usually the strongest unless you reordered them) goes into battle. Each level initially has 10 enemies, one of which is the boss (which increases by 20 each 5 levels). Rightmost unit attacks the enemy, then central unit attacks the enemy, leftmost unit attacks the enemy, and then finally enemy attacks your rightmost unit, so use tanky unit at the rightmost position. If enemy level is higher than your total level of three units then enemy attacks first otherwise you can just kill them before they get a move if your units are strong enough. You get sources of resources as a reward for exploration which are used to produce initial resource in Mining production chains. The further you get the more rare resource sources you find but because there is nothing special about those resources it is still better to just produce initial resources to convert them to green energy and gold. Yes you get more chains but because they cost more to upgrade they end up slower so increase is not very noticable.

And so that's it. Mine resources, produce green energy and gold, spend gold on upgrades, spend energy on crafting new units, combine units, fight.
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>

Kaiju, you can handle it!<h2 class="bb_tag">It‘s Kaiju？to clean！</h2><br>The game has a wide variety of creatures waiting for you to clean them out. From small animals, to huge Kaiju. Each animal has its own personality, temperament and preferences. Smaller animals may not require much preparation on your part to complete clean smoothly, using your existing experience to handle them easily and finish your work leisurely.<br><br>But when faced with a huge monster, your past experience is not enough. Understanding the monster's characteristics and temperament, preparing enough tools, and using your unique skills will enable you to successfully complete this huge job. And of course the payoff is huge too. Do your homework before you go. You don't want to lose your life because of your job.<h2 class="bb_tag">Get your tools ready</h2><br>Water guns, cleaners, different sprinklers and extension accessories. Using the right tools for different kinds of dirt is a basic skill of a professional. Believe that with the right tools, you will be able to handle it. When facing with a huge Kaiju, there may be some unexpected tools that can help you get more done with less effort.<br><br>Use the money you earn to expand your toolbox. You must sharpen your tools to do a good job.

<GAME>
<GameId>2211120</GameId>
<GameName>Grapple Whip</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This cowboy doesn't have legs so he uses his grappling whip to grapple from A to B. When the whip is attached to a grapple point the player will be pulled towards it. Collect all the gems in a level to progress while swinging. Move the crosshair over a grapple point to attach the whip and move forward. Different kinds of grapple points are scattered around the levels and can act differently based on their color. <br />
<br />
Some of the grapple points move to another place so the player can use them as transport and others give the player more velocity to reach more places. Sometimes it can be beneficial to detach from a point at the right moment to reach a gem or a new point. Watch out for rotating and moving spikes and dropping down in the abyss will make you start over but don’t worry you won’t have to collect all your gems again.<br />
<br />
Controls:<br />
<br />
Use the left mouse to attach your whip to a target.<br />
Use the right mouse to detach from a target.<br />
<br />
OR<br />
Use arrows/WASD and X to attach, Z to detach<br />
<br />
OR<br />
Use the left stick and button A to attach, B detach 3 user reviewsGrapple doesnt work
</CONTENT>

<GameName>Lims</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Manage your lims to fight through the ring and reach the king. A sci-fi robot management game. Position your lims around your lam to fight through groups of enemies. Research, craft, and manage to succeed.<br>You play as a lam. A lam controls lims to interact with the world. Lims will automatically do the job they were built for, such as this retriever lim that you start with.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210410/extras/Lim.PNG?t=1669033396" /><br>It will collect any items on the ground that are close by. You use those items to research and craft more lims. <br>Research is somewhat automatic with each item gathered ticking it up to completion. There are 18 lims to research and 20 to build.<br>Crafting is done by assigning factories to certain recipes. Once you have the proper supplies, the item will begin crafting and be placed in your inventory when built. This manufacturing process will continue unless you de-allocate the factories or tell that recipe to finish the current process.<br>You'll need to be prepared for the enemies lurking in the world, such as these Chompsos. They and many other machines will attack you on sight.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210410/extras/Chompsos.PNG?t=1669033396" /><br>You'll travel through many environments, such as this little village.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210410/extras/Villager.PNG?t=1669033396" /><br>Travel across all 9 sections of the ring to face the king and reclaim the ring!

<GameId>2210670</GameId>
<GameName>Torecower</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>Torecower</strong> is an arcade wave-based minimalist game where you build automatic turrets to shoot enemies. Each turret has an unique attack behaviour. After finishing a wave, you can get an upgrade on the skill tree. Choose wisely to make your turrets stronger.<br><br><u><strong>Turrets 🏰</strong></u><br>Each turret have unique behaviors based on it's color: Shooters <i>shoots</i> faster and it's bullets may pierce enemies; Arcanes are focused on casting magic-bolts and thunders.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210670/extras/about_gif_0.gif?t=1670252117" /><br><br><u><strong>Upgrades ✨</strong></u><br>After finishing a wave, you may pick an upgrade to buff your turrets, choose wisely! Going for the <strong>Shooter</strong> path blocks you from following the <strong>Arcane</strong> one.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210670/extras/about_gif_1.gif?t=1670252117" /><br><br><strong><u>Features 😎</u></strong><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> 12+ turrets, each with unique attacks<br></li><li> 4+ classes, each with unique effects and behaviours<br></li><li> 20 waves, making the game harder on the late-game<br></li><li> 4+ enemies, each with unique attributes</li></ul>

<GameName>VR Archeology: Secrets of Kulikovo Field</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Fought on September 8, 1380, the Battle of Kulikovo is considered one of the biggest events of the 14th century that united Rus peoples. Scientists continue searching for traces of the battle. Now you can also join an archaeological expedition, find and restore artifacts to re-enact those historical events.<br />
 <br />
Swords and spears, armor and arrows, coins and bullets. Dig into the artifacts from different eras with the opportunities offered by a field laboratory. Game developers spent time in the Kulikovo Field Museum depository to recreate accurate copies of real archaeological finds collected over decades.<br />
 <br />
Learn about Russian warriors’ full armor and its actual weight, and archers’ medieval multitool. You can witness scenes from across the ages that the Kulikovo Field remembers.<br />
 <br />
Reconstruct a combat bow and test it at a shooting range. Pick an arrowhead to hit different types of armor. <h1>JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER</h1><p><a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://discord.com/invite/ZGzZXQXgGs" target="_blank" rel=" noopener"  ><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/Steam_BannerDiscord.png?t=1667887222" /></a></p><br><h1>About the Game</h1><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/DA_EN.png?t=1667887222" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Simple but complex gameplay</h2>Dragonium Adventure is a turn-based combat RPG that uses a few simple fundamental mechanics: Attack, Defense and Objects. During the course of your adventure you will clash with many enemies, one more powerful than the other: to face them, you will need to constantly change and improve your strategy, and to do so, you will have to make use of new fighting techniques and tools. Learn to master these elements and become Akinori's best fighter!<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/DRAGONIUM_ADVENTURE_FIGHT_GIF_AdobeExpress.gif?t=1667887222" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Story mode</h2>Akinori has been quiet for millennia since the last sighting of a monster, but apparently these mysterious creatures have made their appearance again - it's up to you to figure out what's happening and restore peace to the kingdom. Fight, improve and save Akinori: the three keywords to describe the story mode of Dragonium Adventure are these.<br><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> More than 8 zones to complete with 5 levels per zone, divided into 3 normal levels, 1 mini-boss and 1 boss!<br></li><li> Improve your character by acquiring more powerful fighting techniques!<br></li><li> Free Akinori from the malus and find out what's happening!</li></ul><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/DRAGONIUM_ADVENTURE_WORLDS_GIF_AdobeExpress.gif?t=1667887222" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Add spice to the fight!</h2>The fighting techniques are many: from those that only hit the enemy and inflict damage on him, to those that restore your health, guarantee you an advantage in battle and more. By defeating enemies, you will earn experience points which you will need to fill your experience bar. Once filled, you will get a Skill Point, which you can exchange to acquire new fighting techniques through the Tree of Knowledge. Master the fighting techniques and create a moveset suitable for the situation!<br>You will be able to use the fighting techniques learned in the story mode even in the online multiplayer mode!<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2210050/extras/DRAGONIUM_ADVENTURE_TECHNIQUES_GIF_AdobeExpress.gif?t=1667887222" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Rush mode</h2>Defeat many enemies, one after the other, and try to survive! The more enemies you defeat, the higher the final reward! Plan a winning strategy and you will prevail!<br>Rush mode is great for earning Skill Points and acquiring fighting techniques that are impossible to achieve in story mode. You will be able to expand your strategy and show it off in online multiplayer battles!<br><br><i>To unlock this mode, you need to finish the main campaign in order to familiarize yourself with the combat system and master basic combat techniques.</i><h2 class="bb_tag">Online multiplayer</h2>Battle against friends or strangers in online multiplayer mode - show what you are made of to the whole world!<br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> Play fast and carefree matches in Quick Match mode<br></li><li> Defeat co-op bosses with a teammate in Raid Mode<br></li><li> Take part in exciting strategy-packed battles in Competitive Mode to climb the world rankings</li></ul><br><i>To unlock this mode, you need to finish the main campaign in order to familiarize yourself with the combat system and master basic combat techniques.</i>

<GameName>A Matter of Principle</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Here is an interactive comics novel about one of the most high-profile events of the 20th century. There are many theories about what exactly happened on June 28, 1914 in Sarajevo. A deliberate attempt? A tragic accident? Masonic conspiracy?<br><br>The Bosnian Serb Gavrilo Princip killed the heir to the Austro-Hungarian throne, Franz Ferdinand, which became a formal reason to start the first world war of its kind ... But who was Princip and what led him to this act? Who was Franz Ferdinand and how did he meet that fateful day? What do they have in common and could war have been avoided?<br><br>Inside the game you will find answers to these questions, as well as the majestic interiors of Austria-Hungary and the nature of the Balkan Peninsula from the pen of Askold Akishin, one of the greatest comics artists.<h2 class="bb_tag">Game Features:</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li> The recognizable style of Askold Akishin - dynamic black and white expressive drawings made in a comics style panels,<br></li><li> Complete, gripping story,<br></li><li> Interactive polling system, <br></li><li> Quiz,<br></li><li> Luxurious gallery from different artists, </li></ul>and much more!<br><br>Embark on an exciting journey to the beginning of the 20th century and see the origins of the first World War of its kind.<br><br>If you are not familiar with the history of Gavrilo Princip and Franz Ferdinand, this will be the most fascinating history lesson of your life. If you are familiar, you will find a unique immersion in that era, you will be able to see the significant events of those years, as well as consider this amazing story from different angles, in detail.

Work your way through delivering food, groceries and more using <strong>Delivoo</strong> and save enough money to open up your restaurant!<br><br>The game idea revolves around simulating the role of a local item delivery person. <GameName>SCAN</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h1>Early Beta Access</h1><p>Currently seeking playtesters.  Join the Discord server for details.</p><br><h1>About the Game</h1>SCAN is a BR-style game with a brand new set of rules. Victory is not achieved through being the last person alive. Instead, the goal is to secure objectives while trying to prevent others from doing the same. Over the course of a match, players are able to collect valuable information by scanning the map, which is temporary and extremely limited. Careful use of this mechanic is essential to winning the game.<br><br>SCAN is a work in progress.  Most in-game elements will eventually be changed or replaced.  However, the game is currently playable and ready to be tested with larger player counts.  <strong>Participation in the tests is free.</strong> <br><br>Tests will be scheduled through Discord to ensure that matches are full.  The sooner we have enough players, the sooner we can get started..so tell your friends!<h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>A NEW WAY TO PLAY</strong></h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>There is no set match length, and no circle.  Several players may survive a match, but there can only be one winner.<br></li><li>The closer you are to winning a match, the bigger the target on your back will be.<br></li><li>There are plenty of opportunities to strategize.  Use every tool at your disposal to overpower or outsmart your opponents.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>GET DECKED OUT</strong></h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Players have inventory space and 14 slots to equip weapons, armor, and other gear.<br></li><li>Equipment and weapon attachments offer stat bonuses to give you the edge in combat.<br></li><li>Search the map for equipment - or better yet, take it from the enemy's cold, dead hands.<br></li><li>There are hundreds of unique pieces of equipment...with much more to come.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>KEEPING IT REAL</strong></h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Weapons, equipment, and environments are grounded in realism.  There are no futuristic or fantasy elements to the game.<br></li><li>Guns have unique recoil patterns, bullet velocity, bullet drop, and damage.  Controlling guns on full-auto can be difficult.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag"><strong>LEAVE YOUR TENT AT HOME</strong></h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>A number of rules are in place to keep the action moving.<br></li><li>Camping for extended periods of time is not a winning strategy.  The game will just go on without you.</li></ul>

<GameName>SAIVO</GameName>

SAIVO is a linear story-driven first-person horror experience. Desmond Holeman has never met his family. His family disappeared in Finland 41 years ago. <GAME>
<GameId>2209030</GameId>
<GameName>Scrapbox</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>HEY! This game is still a work in progress, and a LOT is being changed. Stick around for more info!</strong><br><br>Scrapbox is a frantic 2.5D fighter where a bunch of strange specimen beat each other up for little to no reason.<h2 class="bb_tag">ACCESSIBILITY FIRST</h2>Scrapbox was made with casual <i>and </i>competitive play in mind as opposed to leaning super heavily in either direction. The game has very easy inputs consisting of a direction, a button press, and your character's position (in air or grounded) instead of super difficult inputs that take 7.346 trillion years to learn. To make up for the game being easy to control, each character has a boat load of attacks - 8 Light Moves, 8 Mid Moves, 8 Strong Moves, 8 Special Moves and 3 Ultra Moves.<h2 class="bb_tag">SOME TECH, YES</h2>This game has a few ways to cancel moves. There's jump cancelling, which affects everything but Ultras, which is performed by inputting a jump during a small window as you attack. Land cancelling exists too - landing during an aerial cancels it immediately. On top of that, you can air dash in 4 directions, wave dash, dodge roll, and much more!<h2 class="bb_tag">ACHIEVEMENTS GALORE</h2>There are multiple achievements to snag for doing the most bizarre things possible. Every update brings new ones!<h2 class="bb_tag">MODES</h2>Just in case regular fighting gets old, there are a handful of other modes for you to enjoy!<br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>TRAINING MODE</strong> lets you, well, train. You can see every character's hitboxes, speed up or slow the game down and more to let you lab with your favourite character!<br></li><li><strong>CAMEO KICKER</strong> has you punting tons of flying discs imprinted with characters that didn't quite make the cut. Good old arcade fun!<br></li><li><strong>TOUR MODE</strong> is the game's platform fighter hybrid, with huge stages and plenty of enemies to smack. Speed through the level or take your time battering each enemy one by one!<br></li><li><strong>CHAOS MODE</strong> throws balancing out the window and randomises every character's attributes. Good luck, have fun!<br></li><li><strong>TAG TEAM MODE</strong> lets you choose up to three different fighters and tag them in and out mid-match. If all three get KO'd, you're out!<br></li><li><strong>STORY MODE</strong> tells the most bizarre story ever seen in a fighting game. 'Nuff said.</li></ul> 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2209080</GameId>
<GameName>Polaris Outpost</GameName>
<CONTENT>
You find yourself alone on a remote research outpost in the Polaris system. Something has gone terribly wrong. Much of the base is lacking power and your co-workers are mysteriously missing. There is a deadly threat lurking in this outpost and it will take all of your cunning to keep from becoming another victim.<br><br>Your resources are dwindling, so you'll need to secure more food, water, and power, but this involves venturing away from the security of your home base. Equipped with various items to track, deter, and trick your adversary, there is a chance you can outwit your opponent. However, you'll need to keep a close eye on your stats, as it's all too easy to get dehydrated or lose your sanity to the extreme stress of these circumstances.<br><br>You will need to explore deep into your opponent's territory to find a way to escape this outpost. A distress signal may take too long, so maybe you can get the escape shuttle up and running instead. Or maybe there is a way to actually defeat this adversary. One thing is for certain, this won't be easy. Your adversary is becoming more intelligent by the minute, and it is adapting to resist your weapons. You'll need to move quickly and find more powerful equipment if you expect to stand a chance. Can you survive Polaris Outpost?<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209080/extras/Vertical_No_text.png?t=1668453444" /><br><br>Polaris Outpost is a blend of survival, horror, and minimalist base building. It involves both planning ahead and thinking on your feet in order to survive. You will be up against a single powerful adversary that evolves to become stronger and more intelligent throughout the game. You will secure resource production rooms and find ways to defend or repair them. The gameplay is often tense and frightening as you try to out maneuver and outsmart your deadly opponent in a variety of atmospheric sci-fi environments. The game becomes progressively more open-ended, giving you more of a chance to make your own decisions. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameName>Ascent of Ashes</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h1>Join our Discord!</h1><p><a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://discord.gg/8tHNMdVhrr" target="_blank" rel=" noopener"  ><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Discord.png?t=1669149424" /></a></p><br><h1>About the Game</h1><h2 class="bb_tag">BUILD A NEW HOME</h2>Build your survivors a base where they can rest and trade stories between adventures. Farm crops, tame alien beasts, incorporate salvaged technology and fortify your home against hostile intruders<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Construction_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">ENGAGE IN DEEP TACTICAL COMBAT</h2>Prevailing in combat will require more than just point-and-click. A detailed hit simulation and health system will mean that even non-lethal hits can render a survivor unable to go on. Suppressive fire might pin an enemy in place, but the ammunition used up may leave you ill-equipped to fight the next encounter effectively<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Explosion_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">DRIVE RESTORED VEHICLES</h2>It's a big world out there. To get around you will need better transportation than your legs can provide. One of the things setting Ascent of Ashes apart from other games of this genre is the ability to restore and drive vehicles.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Vehicles_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">LEAD YOUR SURVIVORS</h2>Each survivor has their own unique personality and motivations. As colony leader it is up to you to find and recruit capable survivors to fill gaps in your roster against ever increasing challenges. Can you keep everyone happy, secure and motivated?<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Campfire_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">EXPLORE A STRANGE NEW WORLD</h2>You will find yourself in an expansive, procedurally generated world filled with different biomes and points of interest. To survive the post-apocalypse you'll have to brave the pre-collapse ruins and the many dangers that they hold.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Floaters_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">CHALLENGE A DYNAMIC AI</h2>It's not enough to just have an in-depth combat system with a variety of mechanics. You also need opponents capable of using those mechanics to challenge you. Enemies will possess varying degrees of intelligence. Taking on a disorganized band of raiders will play very differently from fighting a squad of well-trained Remnant soldiers.<br><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2209140/extras/Dynamic_AI_-_Resized.gif?t=1669149424" /><h2 class="bb_tag">FROM THE ORGINAL CREATORS OF COMBAT EXTENDED</h2>Combining the deep simulation of classic post-apocalyptical survival titles with the tactical challenge of classic real time and turn-based gems, the original creators of RimWorld's heralded <strong>Combat Extended</strong> mod present a fresh take on the colony sim genre that emphasizes exploration, tight balance and strategic gameplay.<h2 class="bb_tag">MODDING SUPPORT</h2>Our team has its roots in mod-making and we've been fortunate to have been part of many great modding communities over the years. That's why with Ascent of Ashes, we want to give something back to those communities. We're building the game's engine from the ground up to be easily extendable, and thanks to our extensive experience in creating mods ourselves we know exactly what kind of support mod-makers need. Ascent of Ashes is a game developed by modders, for modders.

Instead, generate it yourself by placing isometric tile world pieces! Start your journey in the small lumberjack settlement of Hunter's Rest and begin crafting the world around you!<h2 class="bb_tag">World Pieces</h2>After completing your tasks at Hunter's Rest, explore the world however you see fit! Determine the landscape of this world inspired by the Old West and dictate how it will unfold before you. You have the power to decide what’s next.<h2 class="bb_tag">Base Building</h2>Invest your resources into your very own cabin and establish a base for defense and shelter.<h2 class="bb_tag">Craft and Cook</h2>To help the people of Hunter's Rest, you can craft necessary tools from newly discovered resources. Suddenly forced to spend her waking hours overwhelmed with study and work, her days became a grey blur. After several years of painstaking efforts, Sky had finally finished college. Wanting to celebrate this joyous occasion, Margot - Sky's best friend - barely manages to drag Sky out of her hidey-hole and into a world of frivolous fun. Though, tragedy isn’t the same as lightning and it likes to strike the same person twice.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Explore.png?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Gif_2.gif?t=1670247112" /><br>Accompany Sky and experience the struggles and difficulties she'll have to face and overcome; the lessons she will have to learn, the things she'll have to risk and sacrifice on a  journey towards the end. Witness just how bright a dying candle can shine.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Divider.png?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Gif_4.gif?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Divider.png?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Gif_6.gif?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Divider.png?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Gif_5.gif?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Divider.png?t=1670247112" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2208610/extras/Gif_3.gif?t=1670247112" /><br><br><strong>Game Content:</strong><br>- 10.000+ IMAGES<br>- 1.000+ ANIMATIONS<br><br><strong>Gameplay:</strong><br>- Dialogue choices<br>- Branching Story<br>- Free roam<br>- Time Cycle<br>- In-game Hint system<br>- Define the relationships within the game<br>- Change angle<br>- Lust time<br>- And much more<br><br><br><strong>WARNING!</strong><br>WARNING!<br>This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content, drug abuse and controversial sexual content (incest) that some viewers may find offensive.
