<GAME>
<GameId>2219390</GameId>
<GameName>Imperial Ambitions</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h1>JOIN US ON DISCORD!</h1><p><a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://discord.gg/NU963utpEb" target="_blank" rel=" noopener"  ><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/Join_Discord_Banner.png?t=1670527388" /></a></p><br><h1>KEY FEATURES</h1><p><ul class="bb_ul"><li> Unique unit classes such as; <strong>Gentleman</strong>, <strong>Man of Shadows</strong>,<br></li><li> Novel movement mechanics ie. <strong>Military Column</strong> movements and <strong>Boat </strong>mechanics,<br></li><li> Black market and corruption mechanics,<br></li><li> <strong>40 </strong>unique resources and goods <br></li><li> <strong>5 </strong>Social classes and a <strong>dynamic</strong> social ladder,<br></li><li> Agent-driven gameplay,<br></li><li> <strong>Controversial choices</strong> such as slave raiding, crime syndicates and more...</li></ul></p><br><h1>About the Game</h1><h2 class="bb_tag">Explore Colonize Industrialize Sabotage And Battle!</h2><strong>Imperial Ambitions is a 4X strategy game where the players will take over one of the European superpowers that existed during the age of discovery and renaissance and lead them to imperialism.</strong><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/explorer.png?t=1670527388" />Discover and colonize the world,<br></li><li><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/artisan.png?t=1670527388" />Allocate your labor force,<br></li><li><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/merchant.png?t=1670527388" />Monopolize markets,<br></li><li><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/granedier.png?t=1670527388" />Fight tactical battles,<br></li><li><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/diplomat.png?t=1670527388" />Survive the age of imperialism.</li></ul><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/columnMovement_in_IA_01.gif?t=1670527388" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Tactical Wars With Completely New Mechanics</h2><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/granedier.png?t=1670527388" />Imperial Ambitions has a completely new strategy game design. Anyone who enjoys the Napoleonic wars will find the tactical thinking required for Imperial Ambitions to be much more rewarding. As you forge an empire, the battlefields will become more challenging. We've redesigned the way that armies move on a campaign map, so they act more like real-world military units. Large armies move in column formation, making it harder to move and requires more tactical thinking to prepare for the battle. The regiments can be split from the main army for small tactical excursions, or sneak into enemy lines for crossfire. For the same reason, attention is required to avoid leaving gaps on your frontline.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/UIs.png?t=1670527388" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Production Chains</h2><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/engineer.png?t=1670527388" />Your Empire will grow beyond the mountains and the seas. As it grows you will have access to more and endemic resources. The more you invest into your roads and docks, the more resources that produced around the corners of your empire will be transported into your capital. With abundance in your capital, you can allocate your laborers to produce to higher quality goods. Imperial Ambitions has more than 40 different resources that can be extracted, produced or imported. Your population will demand products depending on their level of education. You must manage your resources and customize your production chains, while ensuring the wellbeing of your population. Some key resources may just not be accessible to you. You can resolve either by leasing the land from the natives, military invasion, trading with superpowers, or exploiting black market.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/Industry_in_IA_01-2-2.gif?t=1670527388" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Black Market And Trade</h2><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/merchant.png?t=1670527388" />For the savvy entrepreneur and economist, the black market is a huge opportunity to boost your own empire. No longer do you have to go through the tedious and sometimes costly process of building a colony and maintain an industry. the game will include a black market besides the regular market. In regular trade, a player can initiate a bid for something they need and, if another player sells it to them, everyone is happy! Though, this trade is also taxed by any country that has lands en route. Black market, however works completely different. The resources in the black market is pulled from towns with high corruption. And players can bid for these resources, even if they belong to their enemies. The cost, however, is often higher than normal, yet no one can tax. This can be a boon for some players in need of certain products that are capitalised by their enemies and for everyone that prefers not to pay taxes. Instead, however, corruption and criminal activity will become more prevalent among the towns along the route. e careful not to get caught in a cycle of corruption and crime! To promote corruption player can send man of shadows to start a crime syndicate. It however requires opium to initiate (also only available at black market) However, the player is not defenseless. Players can use the man of shadow to start intelligence mission, to eradicate crime syndicates.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/social_classes_states.png?t=1670527388" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Social Classes</h2><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/artisan.png?t=1670527388" />The society in the game is divided into classes, slaves, peasants, apprentices, artisans and masters. Besides slaves, the citizens will be allowed to progress through four tiers of classes, with each step providing increased capabilities, but also requiring different resources from you. The education is the key for most of your citizens to climb this social ladder. Higher classes will provide exponentially more labor, but will also require unique luxury resources. The citizens may stop working for several reasons, such as training, hunger, epidemic, strike, accidents, criminal activities, exhaustion, rebellion or retirement. While higher classes are often preferable, they are also harder to maintain due to requirement of luxury. The units and agents are also required to be trained from respective classes. For that reason, the players need to find the optimal balance between these classes.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/boats_in_IA_02.gif?t=1670527388" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Undisclosed Tech Tree</h2><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/spy.png?t=1670527388" />In our opinion, it is unrealistic for the players to be able to view the tech tree. In Imperial Ambitions, the player will only be shown the available techs they can fund without disclosing the whole tree. It makes the game more challenging and exciting. This is also part of the discovery experience in Imperial Ambitions - you learn by doing! Funding a tech is not enough for research. The player must have one of their gentlemen agent perform an action related to that technology to be able to discover it. This action is also not revealed to the player. Thus player has to make a guess to what actions would help discover that tech. For example, a gentlemen has to sail the ocean to be able to discover the &quot;Sextant&quot;, a navigation tool for sailors. Or, to discover &quot;Abolishment of slavery&quot; the player need to actually working slaves.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/eventReportButtons.gif?t=1670527388" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Diplomacy</h2><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/diplomat.png?t=1670527388" />We envision a simple diplomacy for Imperial Ambitions. The difference in IA from most 4X, is that an agent has to be sent to the opponent's capital or party in an effort to ceasefire, establish trade relations, embassies, defensive pacts and alliances. Once an embassy or trade consulate is established the agent is dismissed. On the other hand, cancelling an existing agreement can simply be performed from the diplomacy window. It takes days to build bridges but seconds to destroy them.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/gampley.png?t=1670527388" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Pixel Art Design</h2><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2219390/extras/janissary.png?t=1670527388" />We chose a pixelated art style for the game since it’s a fun and approachable way to communicate controversial events of our recent history such as post-colonial subversion. We also wanted a retro aesthetic design to assist players in imagining this alternate universe, mixing pop culture with classic cartoon representations of imperialism. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameName>Festive Finds: Happy Holidays Calendar</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Step into a snowy scene where a rustic house hides 24 ‘spot the difference’ puzzles behind numbered doors – open each door in order, and get spotting! You’ll need a keen eye, because some of those festive finds are fabulously fiendish!<br><br>You might like to open one door per day from the start of December, or ‘sleigh’ them all in one short, sweet spotting session. The choice is yours!<br><br><strong><u>Features:</u></strong><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Warm and gentle festive vibes<br></li><li>24 relaxing ‘spot the difference’ puzzles – no time limits, and no stress!<br></li><li>Hand-drawn art with smiling snowmen, cozy carollers and other winter wonders<br></li><li>Chill soundtrack of joyful lo-fi beatz, including some instrumentals of traditional tunes and an original song!<br></li><li>Just right for playing daily, or all in one go if that’s your jam<br></li><li>Perfect to play together with friends and family!</li></ul> 1 user reviews[b]Festive Finds: Happy Holiday Calendar[/b] is a delightfully jolly new game from Imaginary Freinds Games, the creators of Shindig. Much like a traditional advent calendar, it features a festive house with 24 windows to open every day leading up to Christmas, with each one containing a new spot-the-difference puzzle to complete!

Overall, it is a small but fun game. It will take you anywhere from 30 mins to 24 days to play and it is sure to raise some holiday spirits. It soon had me feeling very chilled out and festive and I highly recommend it. Another wholesome and mood-boosting gem from Imaginary Friends Games!

<GameName>Interregnum Chronicles: False Prophet</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Interregnum Chronicles: False Prophet is a tactical, turn-based strategy game about survival in a post-apocalyptic world of eternal winter.<br><br>An extraterrestrial mind-virus has struck the Earth, killing 95% of humanity while the poles have shifted and the world is plunged into a new ice age. Lead a group of survivors as the titular False Prophet to a promised land - a lie manufactured in a desperate bid to save your lost child. Find out if goals do justify the means, and what a desperate parent is willing to do to save their child.<br><br>This is the second entry in a series of games which tell the story of the Interregnum and its aftermath, based on the world created by Przemysław Karda.<h2 class="bb_tag">Gameplay</h2><strong>Fight</strong> for your life in turn-based tactical battles against desperate survivors like you. Use suppression and flanking to outsmart and outmaneuver your enemies. Experience a realistic depiction of a firefight in which suppression plays a key role.<br><br><strong>Survive</strong> the biting cold and ever-present hunger. Scavenge resources while trudging through frozen wastes of California. Loot, craft, and make the best of what you find. <br><br><strong>Explore</strong> alien anomalies and extraterrestrial phenomena that transcend human understanding. Alien civilizations fight over Earth with no regards to its human inhabitants. Their struggle is completely beyond human understanding as it warps the very structure of reality. <br><br><strong>Recruit</strong> survivors to your cause. The people you meet often have their own quests - how far will you go to convert them to your cause? The sick and the children are unable to work - will you leave them to die or make them part of your pilgrimage? <br><br><strong>Manage</strong> your caravan and the people that follow you. Their survival is in your hands, but if they lose faith they might just replace you. Launch expeditions to gather resources, divide the workforce, and guide your flock. The survival of the group will require sacrifices.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><strong>Tactical Combat</strong><br>Turn-based tactical combat with emphasis on realistic depiction of firefights. Suppression plays a key role as every shot drains the Action Points of its target and those nearby. Defeating enemies requires smart use of the fire and maneuver tactic. Your characters can have an array of special abilities that allow them to manipulate the battlefield - change turn order, transfer Action Points or mitigate the effects of suppression.<br><br><strong>Deep Survival Mechanics</strong><br>Managing warmth, hunger, and fatigue of your characters is as important as winning battles. Rationing food and deciding when and how to establish a campsite will be crucial to survival in the harsh environment of a post-apocalyptic winter. Choosing what your characters wear affects how fast they lose warmth, and must be balanced with gear that protects them in combat.<br><br><strong>Original Story</strong><br>The world of Interregnum is an original setting in which extraterrestrial beings are completely beyond any human. In this post-apocalyptic world, ordinary people are fighting for survival while the very structure of reality is being torn apart by a struggle beyond their understanding.

It inflicts freezing damage to enemies caught in it. Enemies who stay in it for too long are frozen. However, the frigid temperature is enough to made them extremely uncomfortable.<br><br>-Spell Chain<br>You will be caught off guard if you think chanting is the only way to release your magic.  there are many other ways to release your magic. One example is the battle cry uttered by warriors.<br>The rhythmic spell releasing will give her pleasure. The more she combos them, the more their power leaps.<br>A gauge will appear for a moment in the middle of the screen after she releases the instant spell. Release the next spell at the right time in the center of the gauge.<br><br><br><strong>Adventurous Companions</strong><br><br>- Ride her beloved unicorn horse and play with your enemies.<br>- The more powerful the magic, the longer it takes to concentrate, so summon your trusty golem to act as your shield. <GameName>The Children's Friend</GameName>
<CONTENT>
The Children's Friendは、ポイント＆クリック形式の自動生成アドベンチャーです。<br />
新人サンタクロースとなった貴方は、上司ニコラウスの指示でクリスマスの配達に出発します。<br />
トナカイ「ヴァンデアッグ」の導きで精神のトンネルをくぐり、落っこちた先は「子供の夢の中」。<br />
寝ている子供の魂を探し、プレゼントを枕元に置いて去れば、お仕事は達成。<br />
ニコラウスからサラリーを貰えるでしょう。<br />
<br />
でも、貴方も、きっと迷ったことありますよね？<br />
プレゼントって、何をあげるのがいいのでしょうか？<br />
<br />
ニコラウスから受け取った、「シン・ニコラウスの書」によれば……<br />
良い子なら嬉しいものを、悪い子にはチェーンソー（の刃のできるだけ先端の尖っている部分を、できるだけ速度が出ている状態で）をプレゼントしなければならないとあります。<br />
<br />
子供の夢の中を見て回り、その子が世の中にとって役に立つ良い子なのか、調和と信仰を乱す悪い子なのか、きちんと大人の判断をしてあげることが大切です。<br />
夢の中に入っていられる時間は、PM 11:00 から、AM 00:00 までの 1 時間。<br />
夢の中を徘徊する家畜やペット、父親や母親といった、邪魔で汚れたニコラウス的にあまり良くない存在も、注意しなければいけません。<br />
時にはそれらがヒントになることもあるかもしれませんが……。<br />

ニコラウスから与えられたノルマは 5 人への配送。<br />
これを達成して来年からは高級サンタとして活躍するか、<br />
はたまた、きついことで有名なニコラウスのお仕置きを食らってしまうのか、<br />
<br />
すべては貴方次第です。

<h2 class="bb_tag">Derision</h2><br>You awake to the bars of your prison cell sliding open. Or not...<br><br><strong>Even if you make it out, will anyone believe you? Or will your stories be met with Derision?</strong><br>These are questions you can provide the answers to with multiple endings based on your decisions.<br><br>Gameplay Features:<br>   - First-person adventure set in an underground prison full of Liches. <GameId>2218090</GameId>
<GameName>For Goodness Sake</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Every early December another kid from your school goes missing, and rumors on the playground have circulated that it's related to Krampusnacht- the night that a half-goat half-demon named Krampus comes and steals away naughty children and spares the good. But what is it that determines if people are taken by Krampus?<br><br>For Goodness Sake is a very <strong>short horror text heavy game</strong>, focusing on several trolley problem situations. While completing the chores around the house, you find yourself reflecting on situations involving the neighborhood kids that have gone missing &amp; ultimately deciding what you think might have been the right thing to do. <strong>Will you be taken by Krampus at the end of the night like the others, or will you be spared?</strong><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> Playtime: 15-20 minutes.<br></li><li> 3D first person navigation<br></li><li> Ending depends on your answers given<br></li><li> Rich audio design and atmosphere</li></ul><br><br><br>Created in one month, for the HauntedPS1 community's Madvent Calendar 2022 project.<br><br>This was created as a small mental break from DEAD LETTER DEPT, an atmospheric typing horror game currently in development.<br><a href="https://store.steampowered.com/app/1627350/Dead_Letter_Dept/?utm_source=ForGoodnessSakeSteamPage" target="_blank" rel=""  id="dynamiclink_0" >https://store.steampowered.com/app/1627350/Dead_Letter_Dept/?utm_source=ForGoodnessSakeSteamPage</a> 8 user reviewsAs Christmas is just 2 weeks away [i]For Goodness Sake[/i] is the perfect game to play now. You control a kid who decides to do some household chores before going to sleep while other family members are asleep. The order of completion doesn't matter - the objective is to make a decision every time he completes a chore as he remembers something. Something that happened at school be it bullying or stealing or lying. The stories are all connected with children disappearing.
 
As we remember we have the opportunity to reflect and assess the situation. What happened, who was at fault and what should have been done. These decisions will eventually determine our fate with Krampus. Are we naughty or we do not deserve to be punished?

This is one of those games with simplistic graphics that one may consider too simplistic - outright ugly, actually. The filter used here is meant to hide this and instead there is greater focus on the atmospheric gameplay with particular emphasis on the sound design. Due to it being dark I had issues with the filter but I appreciated the well-placed light sources. This is a surprisingly fun, short game I can only recommend!https://youtu.be/KhDhPtx6V-o
This is a fantastic short horror game. Awesome creepy atmosphere the whole time that keeps you on edge. I would for so recommend trying it out especially since it's free. <GameName>Colorway Adventures</GameName>
<CONTENT>
With wild imaginations, follow Wiremu and Jessica as they embark on a series of creative adventures. From the depths of space to the confines of caves they explore. Or join them as they visit a secret hide-away amongst the tall trees or while they quietly snack on pizza after a big day of adventuring. Match their imagination, with your own, by splashing about your colours and enhancing their activities.<br />
<br />
‘Colorway Adventures’ is a 3D coloring experience. You’ll fly around unique 3D worlds, applying all sorts of colour – using a range of tools – to bring their worlds to life.<br />
<br />
From messy paintballs to fine brushes, a long-handled roller and a sticker wand, ‘Colorway Adventures’ offers a range of painting tools to let your creativity run rampant.

<GameName>HereWith</GameName>
<CONTENT>
It can be played by 1 person or up to 4 people.<br />
<br />
Hide and escape from demonic dolls in an abandoned hospital building.<br />
Demon dolls will seek out and chase the player. The only way to escape is to complete the ritual successfully.<br />
<br />
A small doll wanders around the hospital. Catch them and offer them to your ritual.<br />
The demon puppet hates the act and tries to capture the player. It is necessary to deal with it by running around, sometimes hiding, and releasing gimmicks.<br />
<br />
When the siren sounds, it is a signal that the demon doll is angry.<br />
It is best not to do anything active while the siren is sounding.<br />
However, you need to press the release button placed on the map to release the siren.<br />
You'll have to find the unlock button while hiding from the demon doll.

&quot;The paladin &amp; The succubi servant&quot; is an RPG game produced by sugar*plum and published by Hanabi games.<br />
<br />
-Game Plot<br />
Yuri, a genius from the Louis family, becomes a national paladin, leads his seravant, Koderia, who was rescued from the slave market, start a long journey to the capital to meet the Queen.<br />
Will Yuri, who has never successfully challenged a long-distance travel before, be able to become a qualified paladin?<br />
<br />
-Game Content<br />
This game is a role-playing type of game.  Player controls the main character, Yuri, and his servant, Koderia, as they travel to the royal capital. They will encounter various challenges along the way. Will they are able to overcome all unknown adventures and successfully get the final destination <br />

<h2 class="bb_tag">2-4 Player Action</h2><strong>Play locally or online in Vector Wave and send your friends flying far into the distance with a barrage of bullets, projectiles, and explosions. <GAME>
<GameId>2218510</GameId>
<GameName>DepthViewer</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Creates 3D VR scenes from 2D input using depth estimation machine learning model.<br />
<br />
Takes any images or videos, estimates the depth using MiDaS model, and draws it in the 3D space for your VR HMD! <br />
You can save the depthmap output to use it later, record a 3D VR video to upload on Youtube. This program also can fetch the screen of your desktop and show the depth. 3 user reviews[h1]Experienced on the Meta Quest 2[/h1]

You can view my review & gameplay here: https://youtu.be/3-XrHTP2KxQ

This app is not perfect. It will not render every single 2D / pancake photo or video into perfect 3D for viewing in VR. However, when it works well, it works really well. Sometimes it looked like the photo or video was native stereoscopic 3D of high quality. Other times, not so much.

I think the key thing is that the photo needs to have some natural depth to it, even if it's in 2D. The photo or video also should be of high quality (4k or higher resolution recommended) and the lighting and sharpness should be good overall. The part you want in 3D should be in focus on the photo or video. 

Anyways, you can check out my video where I test several different photos and videos using the app. Overall, I was impressed by how good the quality was, although you'll also see several times where it didn't work so well. This app is free to play so I can easily recommend it. Please note though: motion controllers are not currently supported. You'll have to use mouse and keyboard. Also note: it initially renders to your desktop only. From there, you'll have to choose a source of where the supported video / photo formats are located. I used mostly mp4s and jpgs and they worked fine.

[b]Rate 7/10.[/b]

[quote]If you enjoyed my review, please consider joining my Steam Curator Group. You can join here: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Oculus_WMR [/quote][h1]Experienced on the Meta Quest 2[/h1]

I think the key thing is that the photo needs to have some natural depth to it, even if it's in 2D. You can view my review & gameplay here: https://youtu.be/3-XrHTP2KxQ

This app is not perfect. It will not render every single 2D / pancake photo or video into perfect 3D for viewing in VR. However, when it works well, it works really well. Sometimes it looked like the photo or video was native stereoscopic 3D of high quality. Other times, not so much.

I think the key thing is that the photo needs to have some natural depth to it, even if it's in 2D. The photo or video also should be of high quality (4k or higher resolution recommended) and the lighting and sharpness should be good overall. The part you want in 3D should be in focus on the photo or video. 

Anyways, you can check out my video where I test several different photos and videos using the app. Overall, I was impressed by how good the quality was, although you'll also see several times where it didn't work so well. This app is free to play so I can easily recommend it. Please note though: motion controllers are not currently supported. You'll have to use mouse and keyboard. Also note: it initially renders to your desktop only. From there, you'll have to choose a source of where the supported video / photo formats are located. I used mostly mp4s and jpgs and they worked fine.

<GameId>2217740</GameId>
<GameName>Kittyverse of Madness</GameName>
<CONTENT>
On Kittyverse of Madness you play as a cat, fighting off hordes of cursed creatures in a land of magic, explosions and of course… KITTENS! Try to survive long enough to find yourself face to face with your greatest enemy, the great Dr. Walter Spray.<h2 class="bb_tag">Be whoever you want to be</h2>You can be a wizard, an archer or a fighter wielding a whip or a spear. It all depends on the weapon you choose. Depending on the weapon you take, you will have different perks to choose from.<h2 class="bb_tag">The Forge</h2>A wooden trunk, a dwarf beard and a muscular chinchilla, what do those things have in common? They can be used to craft a unique weapon! Combine weapon parts by placing them in the appropriate craft slot in order to create your own weapons. Find the right match for you, a combination of perks, combat power and a unique name.<h2 class="bb_tag">The Incubator</h2>If you get lucky, you will find an egg in one of your runs. Place it in the incubator to unlock a new pet! Pets have passive abilities and can assist you in the battlefield.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Manual aiming option<br></li><li>Casual 20 minutes runs<br></li><li>Unique builds every run<br></li><li>Pets with unique traits<br></li><li>Weapon crafting using different, and sometimes funny, materials<br></li><li>Four types of weapons: Spear, Whip, Bow, Staff<br></li><li>Unique and funny perks<br></li><li>Multiple characters with passive abilities<br></li><li>Egg incubator system<br></li><li>Bosses<br></li><li>Permanent upgrades</li></ul><br>Thanks for reaching this far! [h1]Synopsis[/h1]
Sex Adventures - Cuckold Gym is a railroad visual novel.

[h1]Story[/h1]
Daniel is a trainer at a gym and Amber is one of his favorite clients. She is one of the hottest girls he's ever had the pleasure of training. She's hot, confident and always flirting with him. The problem is she has a boyfriend. One night Amber comes in for her session and it is just Daniel and her in the gym. Things take a turn as Amber's boyfriend Travis walks in while Amber is working her glutes as Daniel supervises.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
The story is told from an omnipotent point of view, you know the thoughts of all of the characters. The text in general isn't bad, there are a few typos and poor word selections, using bread instead of bead for instance.

The "chapters" are basically different scenes or location changes. After each chapter you have the option of replaying the scene or continuing the story. As you advance in the story you are given the option to watch the movie of the scene.

The title is a bit misleading as I wouldn't call this a cuckold story. Yes, Daniel does do the girl, but under Travis' supervision and only after Travis humiliates Daniel making him watch.

[h1]The Gallery[/h1]
There are two Galleries, an image gallery with 55 images, basically every image in the game, and a video gallery that is unlocked by finishing the game. In order to access the video gallery you will need to save the game at the end, it cannot be accessed from the main menu.

[h1]Final Verdict[/h1]
I don't consider it to be a Cuckold story. The images are fine. There are some issues with the text, mostly the wrong word used. If you enjoy other Erotic Games Club games you'll probably like this one.

[h1]System Specs[/h1]
Intel i7-8086K Coffee Lake 6-Core 4.00GHz CPU
Crucial Ballistix Sport AT 2666 MHz DDR4 RAM (16GB x 2)
ASUS GeForce RTX 2080 Overclocked 8G GDDR6

[h1]Synopsis[/h1]
Hentai Nurse is a Unity is a swapper puzzle game. You pick a piece and drag it where you want it and when you drop it, the piece that was there moves to where the piece came from.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
The game starts off easy with a six piece puzzle and the puzzles increase in complexity as you progress. There is no real logic behind the number of pieces, as they will increase and decrease as you progress. When the puzzle appears you get a brief glimpse of what the finished puzzle is supposed to look like. There are only a couple of the later puzzles that have similar color pieces that you may need to swap to complete. There are 24 images in total that increase in lewdness as the puzzles progress.

[h1]The Gallery[/h1]
There is no Gallery, however you can cycle through the puzzles you have completed to see the images again.

[h1]Final Verdict[/h1]
Hentai Nurse, like the other Hentai works games on Steam, is an inexpensive puzzle game with good art.

[h1]System Specs[/h1]
Intel i7-8086K Coffee Lake 6-Core 4.00GHz CPU
Crucial Ballistix Sport AT 2666 MHz DDR4 RAM (16GB x 2)
ASUS GeForce RTX 2080 Overclocked 8G GDDR6

<GameId>2217270</GameId>
<GameName>王子斗恶龙3 绝望</GameName>
<CONTENT>
超级好的游戏，杨君朝的第三作，王子斗恶龙3 绝望！！引用了全新的Cocos2d-x3.9引擎，全新的画面，全新的内容，全新的玩法。本游戏为未来一直手游端做准备，引用了触摸事件，为全鼠标点击游戏。用鼠标移动，鼠标点击。故事背景，终于到了节目的最后，王子只要再击倒龙，就能达到登上皇位的境界，加油吧！<br />
玩法：全鼠标触摸点击，用鼠标移动，点击空旷处即可移动，系统会辨别您的点击位置来横向或纵向行走。右上角是菜单点击出现菜单栏，和勇者斗恶龙很像。<br />
特点：可以保存，学DQ，固定地点保存，也就是教堂，这里是城下町的某处。菜单栏有道具，点击能查看装备，草药等。属性，可以看能力值，能力值有HP，MP，攻击力，防御力，金钱。攻击力防御力会被装备加成，咒文是恢复咒文，但在地图上不可使用。可以在城下町购买装备和道具，道具就是草药，可以恢复生命到战斗前。<br />
场景：这是在大陆上，一开始是在王城，一开始是在王座之间，就是国王的位置，会有侍从-小兵，再往下走是王城大厅，这里有不少人了，每个人都有文本。出去是城下町，冒险就开始了，是全彩世界。<br />
战斗系统：回合制战斗系统，有普通攻击，咒文，道具（草药），和逃跑，完全DQ模式，让你沉浸在勇者斗恶龙模拟世界，，攻击先后是随机的，攻击防御都和购买的装备有关联。咒文有攻击咒文和恢复咒文，运用了战斗特效和粒子系统，使得很漂亮，和NDS勇者斗恶龙匹敌一下可以。<br />
音乐：成本很大，游戏不大，音乐媲美勇者我觉得。<br />
细节：为了使玩家玩得流畅，我取消了升级打怪，简化金钱，使得玩家能顺利过关，要有很多耐心游玩。

Let the record desensitized and reprocessed.<h2 class="bb_tag">How to Play</h2>There are 4 types of buttons to click.<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li> <strong>Time</strong> on TOP | Move to the next scene when it's unlocked.<br></li><li> <strong>Puzzle</strong> on MIDDLE | Reorganize the boxes on your own SYMMETRICAL SYMBOLS.<br></li><li> <strong>Guide</strong> on LEFT and RIGHT | Words must be reorganized by your play and belief.<br></li><li> <strong>Cinema Mode</strong> by RIGHT-CLICK anywhere | You can have a whole view without UI buttons. Left-click anywhere to come back. </li></ul><br>Press <strong>F12</strong> to collect a screenshot while playing or press <strong>esc</strong> to quit the game.<h2 class="bb_tag">Running Time</h2>Between 3 and 21 minutes. [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/40330370-Kilroy%2527s/]Follow me on my curator page[/url]

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Rkilroy]Join my group[/url]

[h1]Synopsis[/h1]
Emma in the Library is a RenPy literary quiz visual novel.

[h1]Story[/h1]
You wake up after a night of drunken sex to find that the woman you were with has taken your books, wallet, laptop, and phone. The sex was good, but it wasn't that good. She will return your things in exchange for you writing her term paper for her…by tomorrow. Good thing you're great at writing paper.  You head to the library to use one of their computers and to research the paper.

None of the books on the list she gave you are available in the library. Fortunately a search on line reveals a nearby library where you can at least get one of the books. You drive the half hour to get the book you need. There you meet Emma.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
You start of by entering your name. You go to the library and meet Emma. Next you spend the week selecting what you want to do with your time. You have two papers to write and you need to study for Emma's test. When you study for Emma's test it gives you a free pass on a question. You can also check your phone as Emma keeps sending you pictures trying to figure out what's she's going to wear for your test. Emma also hid some pictures in your bag. There is sufficient time to write both papers and study each of the test areas once. However, to get the Happy Ending you'll have to forego  studying for Emma's test.

On the day of the test you will return to the library. The test is 24 questions, three in each subject, from a pool of questions. There is no time limit on the questions, so you can search the web to find the answers if you don't know them. Odds are unless you possess a degree in literature you won't know enough answers.  If you studied you can use one of your study points to answer the question. If you roll back or reload a save it will affect your score. The only way to get a perfect score is to answer the questions correctly.

[h1]The Gallery[/h1]
There are three different Galleries where you can view content that you have unlocked from the game. There is the Images gallery with 81 images. The Video gallery with 15 videos. Most of the videos are paired, one early act and one later in the act. Finally there is the Replay gallery with 6 scene replays, just like they were in the game. 

[h1]Final Verdict[/h1]
AceX is a a developer to watch. Emma - In the Library is another game from Ace X with a high quality beautiful girl. There is just one, but she's worth it. Plus you may actually learn something about literature. 

[h1]System Specs[/h1]
Intel i7-8086K Coffee Lake 6-Core 4.00GHz CPU
Crucial Ballistix Sport AT 2666 MHz DDR4 RAM (16GB x 2)
ASUS GeForce RTX 2080 Overclocked 8G GDDR6
Oculus Rift S VR

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/40330370-Kilroy%2527s/]Follow me on my curator page[/url]
Or 
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Rkilroy]Join my group[/url]Back to school in visual novel form. This is a puzzle/quiz game where you are trying to answer fairly challenging quiz questions about literature, poetry etc... If you ace the test you will be rewarded in a very spicy way but if you fail you don't get the full reward, and don't cheat (the game will know if you cheat :D) yup... not saying I cheated but... 

Storyline is fairly simple but yet it fits the vibe and makes it a fairly relaxing experience. Render quality is good and the animations are pretty neat + Emma's character is smoking hot!
[code]
[h1][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41965701/]Follow my Curator page for more NSFW games![/url][/h1]
[/code][h1]What for save files are?[/h1]

WTF, lol. Can't run a previous save file to get better results in Emma's exam. Game stricts us off it, telling its not possible and "cheating". Thus, you should replay again and again to achieve what...

TL;DR : This game grades out at an A on the A-F scale. Read further for more details.

Emma in the Library is a short adult VN with a literary twist.

Graphically speaking, it's done in the style of the CGI renders which have become increasingly popular over the past five years. There's not a ton of variety, since the only girl you're actually interacting with is the titular (immature giggle) Emma. That being said, if you like the “naughty librarian” look, and are into blondes, she's very easy on the eyes. The sound is nothing to write home about, but given how short the game is, it's hard to really penalize the VN for this. It features all the standard QOL stuff you expect in a modern VN – auto skipping text you've already seen, a gallery option, etc. It does all the things it should, and it does them competently.

Where it gets creative is HOW you reach the various endings and scenes. The first part of the game features a bit of time management, where you have to decide whether to do college coursework, or study for Emma's exam. You naturally want to do good in school, since it's college, but you also want to do well on Emma's personal quiz, because, well..SEX. This section is extremely brief, because the dev realizes you're much more interested in getting to the adult portion of the game, and soon enough, you're taking a 24 question quiz on various genres of literature. Studying for her quiz will give you the ability to automatically answer her question, assuming you have “study points” in whatever genre she's asking about. However, you're also able to use google to get your answers, so HA HA. (And really, taking shortcuts on exams is part of the college experience, isn't it?)

Depending on how well you do, you'll get a different outcome. Do poorly, and she's not even going to be fully naked. Do well, and you're getting more the bonus plan on your encounter. No spoilers here, but the ending may not be what you're expecting.

A full run through the game is approximately a half hour, assuming you don't skip text, so the game is very short, even by adult game standards. However, there's definitely some replay to be had here. (You're not likely to get her bonus questions correct on the first run without a guide.) You're still likely to have seen everything there is to see in roughly two hours at most, and it's unlikely to be something you'll revisit once you're done. Price is definitely a factor here though, and even at full price, it's only $5 USD. It's completely worth it for this experience, and doubly so if you find it on sale. This one gets an A rating without any reservations.See kids, this is why you should study real hard.[h1]Too Long Didn't Read Version[/h1]

[h1]Synopsis[/h1]
Emma in the Library is a RenPy literary quiz visual novel.

[h1]Story[/h1]
You wake up after a night of drunken sex to find that the woman you were with has taken your books, wallet, laptop, and phone. The sex was good, but it wasn't that good. She will return your things in exchange for you writing her term paper for her…by tomorrow. Good thing you're great at writing paper.  You head to the library to use one of their computers and to research the paper.

None of the books on the list she gave you are available in the library. Fortunately a search on line reveals a nearby library where you can at least get one of the books. You drive the half hour to get the book you need. There you meet Emma.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
You start of by entering your name. You go to the library and meet Emma. Next you spend the week selecting what you want to do with your time. You have two papers to write and you need to study for Emma's test. When you study for Emma's test it gives you a free pass on a question. You can also check your phone as Emma keeps sending you pictures trying to figure out what's she's going to wear for your test. Emma also hid some pictures in your bag. There is sufficient time to write both papers and study each of the test areas once. However, to get the Happy Ending you'll have to forego  studying for Emma's test.

On the day of the test you will return to the library. The test is 24 questions, three in each subject, from a pool of questions. There is no time limit on the questions, so you can search the web to find the answers if you don't know them. Odds are unless you possess a degree in literature you won't know enough answers.  If you studied you can use one of your study points to answer the question. If you roll back or reload a save it will affect your score. The only way to get a perfect score is to answer the questions correctly.

[h1]The Gallery[/h1]
There are three different Galleries where you can view content that you have unlocked from the game. There is the Images gallery with 81 images. The Video gallery with 15 videos. Most of the videos are paired, one early act and one later in the act. Finally there is the Replay gallery with 6 scene replays, just like they were in the game. 

[h1]Final Verdict[/h1]
AceX is a a developer to watch. Emma - In the Library is another game from Ace X with a high quality beautiful girl. There is just one, but she's worth it. Plus you may actually learn something about literature. 

[h1]System Specs[/h1]
Intel i7-8086K Coffee Lake 6-Core 4.00GHz CPU
Crucial Ballistix Sport AT 2666 MHz DDR4 RAM (16GB x 2)
ASUS GeForce RTX 2080 Overclocked 8G GDDR6
Oculus Rift S VR

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/40330370-Kilroy%2527s/]Follow me on my curator page[/url]
Or 
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Rkilroy]Join my group[/url]Back to school in visual novel form. This is a puzzle/quiz game where you are trying to answer fairly challenging quiz questions about literature, poetry etc... If you ace the test you will be rewarded in a very spicy way but if you fail you don't get the full reward, and don't cheat (the game will know if you cheat :D) yup... not saying I cheated but... 

Storyline is fairly simple but yet it fits the vibe and makes it a fairly relaxing experience. Render quality is good and the animations are pretty neat + Emma's character is smoking hot!

TL;DR : This game grades out at an A on the A-F scale. Read further for more details.

Emma in the Library is a short adult VN with a literary twist.

Graphically speaking, it's done in the style of the CGI renders which have become increasingly popular over the past five years. There's not a ton of variety, since the only girl you're actually interacting with is the titular (immature giggle) Emma. That being said, if you like the “naughty librarian” look, and are into blondes, she's very easy on the eyes. The sound is nothing to write home about, but given how short the game is, it's hard to really penalize the VN for this. It features all the standard QOL stuff you expect in a modern VN – auto skipping text you've already seen, a gallery option, etc. It does all the things it should, and it does them competently.

Where it gets creative is HOW you reach the various endings and scenes. The first part of the game features a bit of time management, where you have to decide whether to do college coursework, or study for Emma's exam. You naturally want to do good in school, since it's college, but you also want to do well on Emma's personal quiz, because, well..SEX. This section is extremely brief, because the dev realizes you're much more interested in getting to the adult portion of the game, and soon enough, you're taking a 24 question quiz on various genres of literature. Studying for her quiz will give you the ability to automatically answer her question, assuming you have “study points” in whatever genre she's asking about. However, you're also able to use google to get your answers, so HA HA. (And really, taking shortcuts on exams is part of the college experience, isn't it?)

Depending on how well you do, you'll get a different outcome. Do poorly, and she's not even going to be fully naked. Do well, and you're getting more the bonus plan on your encounter. No spoilers here, but the ending may not be what you're expecting.

A full run through the game is approximately a half hour, assuming you don't skip text, so the game is very short, even by adult game standards. However, there's definitely some replay to be had here. (You're not likely to get her bonus questions correct on the first run without a guide.) You're still likely to have seen everything there is to see in roughly two hours at most, and it's unlikely to be something you'll revisit once you're done. Price is definitely a factor here though, and even at full price, it's only $5 USD. It's completely worth it for this experience, and doubly so if you find it on sale. This one gets an A rating without any reservations.See kids, this is why you should study real hard.[h1]Too Long Didn't Read Version[/h1]

[h1]Synopsis[/h1]
Emma in the Library is a RenPy literary quiz visual novel.

[h1]Story[/h1]
You wake up after a night of drunken sex to find that the woman you were with has taken your books, wallet, laptop, and phone. The sex was good, but it wasn't that good. She will return your things in exchange for you writing her term paper for her…by tomorrow. Good thing you're great at writing paper.  You head to the library to use one of their computers and to research the paper.

None of the books on the list she gave you are available in the library. Fortunately a search on line reveals a nearby library where you can at least get one of the books. You drive the half hour to get the book you need. There you meet Emma.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
You start of by entering your name. You go to the library and meet Emma. Next you spend the week selecting what you want to do with your time. You have two papers to write and you need to study for Emma's test. When you study for Emma's test it gives you a free pass on a question. You can also check your phone as Emma keeps sending you pictures trying to figure out what's she's going to wear for your test. Emma also hid some pictures in your bag. The only way to get a perfect score is to answer the questions correctly.

[h1]The Gallery[/h1]

Most of the videos are paired, one early act and one later in the act. Finally there is the Replay gallery with 6 scene replays, just like they were in the game.

AceX is a a developer to watch. Emma - In the Library is another game from Ace X with a high quality beautiful girl. There is just one, but she's worth it. Plus you may actually learn something about literature.

<h2 class="bb_tag"><i>In a post-apocalyptic world, a woman must scavenge to survive. But she's not alone; she has a turret implementation on her back that helps her defend against the dangers of the world. This is a romantic visual novel about her struggles to find love and acceptance in a hostile world, with a Match3 Jewels mini-game to break up the action.</i></h2><br><strong>Features:</strong><br>- Short Game to play in one night<br>- Two different ends<br>- Mini-Game Match3 Puzzles<br><br><br><br><strong>A little of the background story</strong><h2 class="bb_tag"><i> World:<br>In the year 2xxx, the world was attacked by a force of darkness unlike anything anyone had ever seen before. These monstrous creatures devoured entire cities, leaving nothing but destruction in their wake. The few people who survived were left with no hope, and many of them soon became part of the invasion themselves. No one knew where these creatures came from, but they brought about the end of the planet as we know it.<br><br>She:<br>The woman's childhood was spent in a world that was on the brink of destruction. The monsters had already invaded and were threatening to annihilate human civilization. In order to fight them off, the woman had a turret implanted in her back. This meant that she had to undergo arduous training from a young age, without any love or support.<br>Despite all the odds, she managed to escape from the monsters. However, she failed in her main mission: to find a new home for humanity. Now that the world had ended as we knew it, she was trying to make her way back home. It was a long and difficult journey, but she was determined to succeed.</i></h2>

<GameName>Anime City</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>Anime City</strong> reinvents classic visual novel mechanics by transferring them into full 3D environment. You start the game with entrance ceremony of your high school, and will have to engage in school and after school activities, while also trying to win love of one of unique characters you meet throughout the game.<h2 class="bb_tag">ANIME SIMULATOR</h2>The game has a strong focus on anime culture, carefully and authentically recreating various details of Japanese architecture, cuisine, fashion, and traditions.<h2 class="bb_tag">SCHOOL AND CLUBS</h2>In addition to attending regular school classes (history, physical education, Japanese language, cooking) you can choose to join one of after school clubs and perform tasks assigned by club leaders.<h2 class="bb_tag">DATING</h2>Throughout the game, you can meet several dateable characters, and ask them out on dates. Your success will depend on whether your stats meet their minimum expectations. You can pursue both girls and boys as your love interests. Depending on your choice of playable character, boy x girl, girl x girl, and boy x boy dates are possible.<h2 class="bb_tag">SKILLS</h2>Your character has a number of skills, affecting your personal stats, and your success on dates: fashion, cooking, science, sports, social, gardening, gaming, arts. Improving any of these skills will require engaging in specific school activities or after-school clubs.<h2 class="bb_tag">CHARACTER AND CLOTHES CUSTOMIZATION</h2>You can start to play as either girl or boy, with a range of parameters to customize, and a number of clothes and accessories to use.<h2 class="bb_tag">SURVIVAL SIMULATOR</h2>Your character has health, hunger, thirst, energy, and comfort stats. During the game, you'll have to balance limited resources and take care of your character's needs. If you neglect those, you can end up getting sick and will be taken to school infirmary to recover.<h2 class="bb_tag">TIME OF YEAR</h2>The game world is dynamic and will change according to current time of year. Some events and opportunities will be available only during specific periods.

<GameId>2214860</GameId>
<GameName>Look for connecting stars</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">Story Background</h2>We travel through the universe to collect precious treasures. During our journey we enjoy the magnificent scenery of the universe, we will also encounter different enemies, we will create black holes and devour our enemies.<h2 class="bb_tag">Gameplay</h2>It is a relaxing game where when you choose two targets of the same color, they are connected by lightning and then destroyed by a black hole. When you destroy 100 targets, you win. <br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/GIFyanshi.gif?t=1669270258" /><br>Of course, you have to finish within the allotted time to win, each game is limited to 5 minutes, and the shorter the time, the higher the rating you get. As I said, it's a simple little game to decompress.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/GIF11.11.gif?t=1669270258" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Features</h2>To make the game more interesting, I made the game into 3D graphics. Unlike traditional 2D graphics, you can control your character to fly freely in the universe without being restricted. You'll need to keep connecting more targets during your flight, and you'll soon find it fun.<h2 class="bb_tag">More Game Modes</h2>Obstacle Mode: Add a random number of objects that are the same size and color as the target, but selecting them will not react in any way.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/11.21GIF.gif?t=1669270258" /><br>Gem Mode: Eliminate 100 targets while collecting a randomly specified number of gems to win.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/11.21GIF_1_.gif?t=1669270258" /><br>Vanishing Mode: Targets disappear randomly, making it difficult to lock onto them when there are fewer and fewer targets.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/11.21GIF_2_.gif?t=1669270258" /><br>These game modes interfere with quick target selection, and it's not easy to beat a perfect score.<h2 class="bb_tag">More Fun</h2>As you win more and more, new maps are unlocked for you. In the new map, bosses will be spawned with different skills that will attack you at any time. You'll need to dodge boss skills in time, because if you get hit, your character will die instantly and you'll need to challenge again.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2214860/extras/GIF.gif?t=1669270258" /><br><br>There are currently 4 maps in the game and 800 levels waiting for you to unlock.<h2 class="bb_tag">The Developers Want to Say</h2>This is my first indie game and I hope to make it even better. So I hope that players will be able to comment on this game after the experience, and I will do my best to improve it.<h2 class="bb_tag">You Can Contact Me</h2><h2 class="bb_tag">QQ：690845098</h2>

<GAME>
<GameId>2214870</GameId>
<GameName>Southern Legends - The Temple Defenders</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h1>Feature List</h1><p>- Several playable classes
- Numerous Subclasses to specialize 
- Hundreds of Skills/perks to build your unique character
- Different maps, with each map having its own special unlocks and unique features.  
- Hundreds of unique enemies
- Collect materials to gain experience 
- Purchase different items from in game shops.
- Craft items and Equipment
- Master the rune craft</p><br><h1>About the Game</h1>There is a war on-going, unbeknown to the rest of the world in distant lands. Every night the hoard descends from the depths of darkness to seek the power of the ancient scrolls hidden inside the forgotten temples, and every night they are faced with the guardians of the temples. Brave warriors from various origins who dedicated their lives to protect the ancient scrolls. The battle rages on, numerous guardians have sacrificed their lives to protect the scrolls and each time a guardian falls, a new one takes his place, for if the darkness ever gets to the scrolls the world as we now know it will end. 

Temple Defenders is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.

The night has fallen, the hoard is here to desecrate your temple grounds. As the protector of the temple your task is to make sure non enters the sacred grounds. Defend the treasures inside the temple with your life or die trying. They are many, you are one, all you can do is to try to hold them off till the dawn.

All rooms in Level 0 share the same superficial features, such as worn mono-yellow wallpaper, old moist carpet, scattered electrical outlets, and inconsistently-placed fluorescent lighting. Aside from these common features, no two rooms within the level are identical.<br><strong>It's almost as if the level existed to spite one's sense of reality.</strong><br><br>The fluorescent lighting present in Level 0 hums at a constant frequency. This buzzing is notably louder and more obtrusive than ordinary fluorescent lights, and examination of the fixtures to determine the source has been inconclusive thus far. Secondly, the substance lightly saturating the carpet cannot be consistently identified; it is not water, nor is it safe to consume.

<br />
*** IMPORTANT : You must have a Constant, Fast &amp; Stable Internet Connection in order for the Global Content Data System to Work ! *** <br />
<br />
You can Fly Out into Space to see the whole Earth at once.<br />
<br />
SPEED UP = Gamepad Right Shoulder / Mouse Wheel UP<br />
SLOW DOWN = Gamepad Left Shoulder / Mouse Wheel Down<br />
<br />
You can only 'See' on the Sunny Side of the Earth, some Cities are set at different Times of Day.<br />
<br />
Trying to Find Your House or another Place of Interest ?<br />
Try going to Philadelphia (It has Street Markers) and then Zoom/Fly out to Space and Zoom back into Your Location.<br />
<br />
If the Location You are Looking for is on the Dark Side of the Earth, then try ' FAST Travel ' to another City to see if it is Near Your Area.<br />

Some levels were good to play and then there were some levels where I just wanted to punch this game back into unity asset store.

Levels with obstacles (especially those Karate Kid practice things) are annoying as hell. In one level they just push you off (at least for me) but you have to use them to platform and reach the next stage. Wasn't fun at all and kinda destroyed my positive opinion from the first few levels.

Fall damage is kinda  random as well (it seems). I sometimes died by falling a small distance while other times I could fall for ages and survive.

Wall-Jumping, oh man. I don't know, it also felt like random. Often times the character would stop jumping from the wall and just fall/slide down. Its really not that hard to press the jump button, so I certainly won't take the blame for having issues with it.. :D

<GameId>2222420</GameId>
<GameName>The Curse of Eclipse</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This is a relaxing adventure and puzzle game created by a solo developer.<br><br>A strange phenomena named eclipse occurred in an abandoned house. The house is affected by the curse of eclipse where as ghosts become visible, objects are moving and doors are opening and closing.<br>You as the main character had a strange dream related to the abandoned house. It looks like the dream was indirect message from a super natural power which tells you to visit the house. Then, your story began when your curiosity led you to find the secret of the house.<br>This game is inspired by Atic Atac from ZX Spectrum.<h2 class="bb_tag">How to play</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Avoid enemies. Enemies are moving in patterns which make it predictable but difficult puzzle to solve.<br></li><li>Find keys. Different keys open different doors. Your inventory has only three slots. Therefore, choose wisely which keys to take.<br></li><li>Collect magical scrolls. Magical scrolls are used in the late game to open the gate to the heaven.<br></li><li>Read notes. There are notes in the house which tell you about the story of the game and guide you through the game.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Vector like graphics. All 3D objects and animations of the game are drawn as vectors or lines.<br></li><li>Different camera views. The game is playable with three camera views; third person, first person and top down.<br></li><li>Save and load. The complete walk through of the game may take up to three hours. Therefore, save and load options were added so that the player can take a rest.</li></ul>

<GameId>2221710</GameId>
<GameName>Ultra Rhythm</GameName>
<CONTENT>
This is a music+click+CG casual game. In the level challenge, with the music playing, a circular storm in yellow and blue will appear randomly. The periphery of the storm is a circle that shrinks toward the center. When the circle reaches the edge of the storm, click the storm to score PERFECT. When the circle does not reach the edge of the storm, click the storm to score GOOD. If the circle does not click the storm successfully, it will score MISS. The blue storm can only be clicked once with the left mouse button, while the yellow storm can only be clicked after long pressing the left mouse button until the progress bar disappears. After a music is played, the challenge of this level ends. If the score is greater than 100%, the challenge succeeds. If the score is less than 100%, the challenge fails. After passing the pass, you can also get a beautiful CG. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

When you find a bee, click it and it will disappear. You can also use WASD to move and the arrow keys to zoom.<h2 class="bb_tag">Difficulty:</h2>A full range of difficulty is included, but all levels start unlocked*, your progress is saved as you play, and you can use hints if you get stuck.<h2 class="bb_tag">Get immersed:</h2>Each painting has its own music and ambiance to help you connect with the world, as you search for all the bees.<h2 class="bb_tag">Replayable</h2>You can restore a small number of bees back into a painting so you can find them again! It’s much harder when there are only a few bees left (especially randomly). You can also use up to 3 save slots so you can replay without progress loss. Alternatively, you can reset your progress for the entire game if you’d like to start over.<br><br><br>*This is the ADVENT edition of the game. During December, all levels will lock. Each day, a new level will unlock (during 1 Dec to 25 Dec). You can disable this in the settings to immediately unlock all the levels. 3 user reviewsThis was a lot of fun, please do not do what I did and unlock all them at once. <GameId>2207520</GameId>
<GameName>MIND CORRIDORS: Paroniria</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>MIND CORRIDORS: Paroniria is a short first person puzzle horror game set inside the nightmare of a sleeping person.</strong><br><br>You open your eyes to some strange events inside your house. After leaving and entering your building's elevator, you realize you are still dreaming, and <i>something </i> won't let you wake up until you face it in the depths of your mind's strangest places. But, <i>is it really all a dream?</i><h2 class="bb_tag">FEATURES</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li> Unique and different-themed levels<br></li><li> Two separate game modes, for different difficulty levels and tastes of terror.<br></li><li> Distinct mechanics in each level; Every monster behaves differently.<br></li><li> A variety of puzzles that require observation rather than raw logic.</li></ul><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2207520/extras/MindCorridorsGif_SteamGifTrailer1_alt.gif?t=1669646847" /><br><br>This game takes from 1 to 2 hours to complete, and <strong>features flashing lights and loud noises</strong>. 3 user reviewsShort indie horror game experience where each level could be its own unique game! Despite being sent this game for free, I really did enjoy it and was legit terrified, intrigued and entertained throughout. Now, I won't lie- there is one puzzle that stumped me but that doesn't take away from my enjoyment of the game. 

Each monster is different as are the levels. They aren't lying when they tell you to be observant! Simply paying attention got me through- until that *one* part. Seems like the answer to that specific puzzle is randomly generated so a walkthrough didn't help me. BUT I will re-attempt to beat the game despite this. 

For this to be developed by a solo dev, it's an amazing game! I can't wait to see what else they come up with. I only played on Dream Mode but there is a Nightmare mode so the replayability is there. Also speedrunners will love this game!https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YuW-XGaxsaA

This was great fun! It'll only last you around an hour but there's a lot of variety here. Scares, monsters and challenges will be awaiting you in every chapter. I just wish it was longer!The only problem with this game is the fact that is was too short! I wanna see what more this team can do!

<GameName>Lost August</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">DISCLAIMER</h2>This game runs on Unreal Engine 5 and is not recommended for outdated hardware. Please refer to the system requirements section for more details.<br><br><br>lim-i-nal<br>- relating to a transitional or initial stage of a process.<br>- occupying a position at, or on both sides of, a boundary or threshold.<br><br>Article 3225 - Section B<br>Evidence #: 23<br>Security Classification: Top Secret<br>Location: [REDACTED]<br><br>Evidence Description:<br>A single video tape retrieved from a VHS camera recovered during a research expedition into the [REDACTED] zone. [REDACTED] has been unable to identify the person(s) and location(s) recorded on the tape; however, [REDACTED] assumes it is related to the recent [REDACTED] occurring throughout the [REDACTED] area. Additional expeditions into [REDACTED] have been inconclusive and the tape's origins remain unknown. The only description found on the outside of the tape was a date - 082192.<h2 class="bb_tag">DESCRIPTION</h2>Lost August is an open-world walking simulator game developed by Varrukt using Unreal Engine 5 based on the Backrooms universe. The game is currently in development, and is planned to release sometime in 2023. You can follow along with the game's development by joining the Discord server or checking for updates via the associated YouTube channel.<h2 class="bb_tag">FEATURES</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Explore a seamless open-world containing various unique handcrafted levels from the backrooms universe.</li></ul><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Multiple paths and endings where the decisions you make throughout the game decide the outcome.</li></ul><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Next generation graphics running on Unreal Engine 5 bring a new level of realism and immersion to the backrooms.</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">CONTROLS</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>WASD for Movement</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Left Shift to Sprint</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Left Control to Crouch</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>F to Enable/Disable Camera Light</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>E to Interact With Doors/Switches</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Right Mouse Button to Zoom Camera In/Out</li></ul> 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameId>2207610</GameId>
<GameName>Beat the Heat</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Beat the Heat is a game focused on the generation of environmental conscience through the smart management of natural resources of an ecosystem.<br />
Explore the territory, analyze its economic structure and take the role of leader to manage the resources and achieve the goal of making the ecosystem sustainable.<br />
<br />
The game takes places 5 years in the future, where you, as the player, will be able to notice that different ecosystems which are rich in terms of biodiversity are in high risk, due to the effects caused by climate change and by mankind's bad practices, such as: mining, extensive fishing, monocrops, extensive livestock farming, deforestation, contamination, etc.<br />
Your mission is to implement strategies that allow the ecosystem to avoid the destruction, that mitigate the impacts of the climate change and that guarantee the livelyhood of the population in a time limit. 1 user reviewsmuy entretenido, buen nivel de dificultad, me gusto mucho el estilo de las ilustracionesmuy entretenido, buen nivel de dificultad, me gusto mucho el estilo de las ilustracionesmuy entretenido, buen nivel de dificultad, me gusto mucho el estilo de las ilustraciones

<GAME>
<GameId>2207690</GameId>
<GameName>Bewells</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Bewells is not exactly a classic three in a row game. You don't have to stack three identical stones in a row, but on the contrary, remove obstructing stones so that the stones that fall as a result form a horizontal or vertical row of identical stones. The game has a timer. Your time is also reduced when you remove a row of stones, and also added when a row is counted by the game. With the growth of points, move to another tier of difficulty and get less time for counted rows. When the timer reaches zero your game will be over and the points will be reset to zero.<br />
<br />
Minimal graphics<br />
Relaxed logic game 2 user reviewsThis seems like it would be a really nice variation of a Match 3 game that doesn't cost very much. Sometimes when I am trying to actually play the game it takes me way too long to try to find Jewels that would be good to remove and the game seem to move a lot slower than a normal Match 3 game like Bejeweled. It is worth purchasing just to give you more variety. Other games like Bejeweled 3, Candy Crush Saga, and Mirror are much better, but this might be worth buying at a low price if you really like puzzle games. There appear to be a few bugs that need to be fixed.Extremely low effort cash grab to try and sucker consumers who love Bejeweled and Candy Crush type games.  

- There is NO music in the background
- There is NO explanation on how to play the game or hints on how to play better anywhere
- There are NO settings in the game at all, no volume settings, no resolution or window mode settings.. nothing!
- There are no other modes to play, no extra power-ups to make each game interesting or rewarding

Why would you buy this low effort TRASH when you could just buy Bejeweled 3 right here on Steam instead which has ALL of the missing content I listed above?

My Score:  1.5 out of 10, and trust me when I say that's a generous score based on the obvious quick low effort cash grab attempt that this is.

NOT RECOMMENDED!  Buy any of the Bejeweled games here on Steam instead, even though they are 12+ years older, they are also at least 12 times better games for your money!

（<strong>目前demo的美术资源并非最终效果，截图中效果为AI绘图最终版</strong>）<br><br>这是一款玩法多样的游戏，分为试炼模式和故事模式：<br><br>所谓<strong>试炼模式</strong>，你会扮演一位小说中人物有弱关联的、在武当山修炼的主角（可选性别）<br><br>游戏玩法主要是解谜、养成、闲逛<br><br>所谓<strong>故事模式</strong>，就是直接看小说故事<br><br>根据故事的解锁顺序来解锁新的故事，给一部分可以直接看小说的玩家准备<br><br><strong>【试炼模式】不同视角的历险旅程</strong><br><br>试炼模式主角分男女，男性角色和女性角色是完全不同的两个人，遇到的NPC，说的话都会有一些不同<br><br>试炼模式的通关目标有两种：<br><br>（1）收集故事残卷，但是随着主线的推进并不能收集完整的故事残卷，需要你在每个场景进行一定量的探索，当故事残卷到达一定数量，可以看故事残卷里的人物故事，在故事听完的时候，获得重要装备或道具<br><br>（2）攒够五万钱！没错你没听错，攒钱就能通关，游戏中你只需要用你喜欢的方式慢慢挣钱，就可以通关<br><br>游戏中包括的赚钱方式有：采矿、养鸡、冶炼、烹饪、探索、伐木、钓鱼、畜牧、看故事<br><br>养成的过程轻松简单，还可以随时停下来，发现一些在养成过程中得到的奇怪道具，或者单纯闲逛，和NPC聊天<br><br><strong>【故事模式】顾名思义的视觉小说</strong><br><br>顾名思义的视觉小说，只有视觉和小说<br><br>游戏的核心玩法就是阅读，用游戏的节奏来阅读文本<br><br>阅读进入一定进度，即可解锁新人物和新篇章<br><br>还有一些隐藏篇章，可能需要特定的顺序解锁<br><br>游戏总时长预计1-2个小时，只需要一部电影的时间看完一本书<br><br>有一些辅助音效和场景，字幕节奏会与叙事和阅读相宜<br><br>与纸质书不同的阅读体验，真正意义电子书<br><br><br>面对一女多男的圣母叶若晴，爱情居然才是故事核心要素？<br><br>震惊江湖的玄杀手，居然连一次都没真的出手过？<br><br>决心报仇的杜敌，最终对自己的恩人下手？<br><br>为了一个女人闯入江湖的许暮眉，最终进化成变态收集癖？<br><br>江湖之中也有程微中这样的小人物，作为普通人了却一生<br><br>每个人进入江湖都有一个目的，看似复杂的江湖掌故<br><br>不过是人们茶余饭后的添油加醋<br><br>每个人都有一段故事，整个故事拼凑出所有的信息<br><br>但是信息不代表真相，武林中的大侠豪客，原来都是鸡鸣狗盗的真小人？<br><br>两个普通的女人，八个普通的男人的纠葛与传说

Mostly PositiveFunny for a few minutes, but not worth the 64 cents I payed for it.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
You are given a list of good and bad things, the list gets bigger the more days in you progress, click + or - according to your list until the timer runs out to get a good score and win.Not very funFunny for a few minutes, but not worth the 64 cents I payed for it.

I played this genre in the afk arena and I quite liked it, but here is a full-fledged game and why not check it out?best runs/all skills unlocked here: https://youtu.be/GuT9gcmXxIE

Overall this is a fun game for 59 cents and is way more challenging then it looks it has some serious but minor flaws that are incredibly annoying though one if you try to cut back from the direction you're heading the character makes a C shaped looping movement which is annoying AF. You can't pause during a run which sucks. I really wish you could gain your xp from killing monsters while playing and you didn't get it all after death maybe give an xp bonus from how many waves, but at least let the player power up while playing having to die to power up sucks. Fire chicks burn screws up her scaling on her spells which makes the frost mage 100x better your line DOT spell with the fire mage the DOT gets linked to her burn which caps at .2 damage or something like with an initial 2 hits of the damage it should be doing while the Ice Mages DOT does how much damage it should be doing the whole time the enemies are on it. Also a way to skip the xp bar filling up at the end would be clutch as well. The achievements are broken also. The game does take a good bit of skill though and like I said it gets super challenging which makes it very entertaining definitely worth the price, but I hope the creators will fixed said previous issues.You are alone.

<u>INTRODUCING: <u><i>The Outsider TD</i></u></u><br><br>The Outsider TD is a top down view tower defense game. In this new take on the classic tower defense style game, you take on the role of Danny: A down on his luck fella who gets involved in a local gang when a much needed promise of fast cash arises. The &quot;towers&quot; will be your crew members, each of which will have a unique weapons and upgrade options. Place your crew members strategically around the paths in front of your stash houses to maximize their efficiency against the waves of enemies that seek to thwart you.<br>As you prove your stash house protection capabilities against rival gangs and the DEA, you get more responsibilities like bigger stash houses with more stash to protect. But with more to protect comes more unwanted attention and more enemies to fend off.<br><br><br>Much much more to come as development of the game progresses. We are in the early stages of development but will keep updating and posting as we have new exciting stuff to show. Join us in the discussion forum and stay updated on the news

PositiveLove this game. Very addictive and keeps me entertained for hours. I love the fact you can just restart if you fail. I hate games with limited lives so can recommend it who like 2048 puzzles!Let me just be clear and say, I enjoy the gameplay itself. It's a 2048 clone, and I'm a sucker for that kind of thing.

But the game literally does not save your progress whatsoever. Not the high score, not the stone library, none of it. If you close the game, everything is gone. Not to mention that the stone library doesn't even register new stones half the time.

I'd like to recommend this game, I really would, but when your game has so few features and a good number of them are outright broken, that's a huge problem.Love this game. <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206580/extras/Follow.gif?t=1669739422" /><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206580/extras/magican.gif?t=1669739422" /><br>Gravity Magician is a pixel art gravity controlled puzzle game. In Gravity Magician you have to go through a dungeon as a magician who can control the gravity of small objects. Move rocks, turn on ground plates, and avoid traps to advance further in the dungeon.<br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206580/extras/1.gif?t=1669739422" /><br>Game Features: 15 levels of levels testing your intelligence, Pretty pixel art, Unusual magic gravity mechanics. 3 user reviewsI wanted to like the game based on the art style but there's not much of a puzzle aspect to the game. A majority of the "puzzles" in the game are made significantly harder due to the inability to simply just drop a rock where it currently is. The turrets are also made extremely more frustrating due to their inaccurate nature, meaning that intended strategies to hold a rock to defend yourself become ineffective due to the turret not even aiming directly at you. The shots also behave differently depending on whether you are above or below the turret meaning you'll get killed plenty of times as a result.

Even if the game does receive a few QoL changes, it doesn't really change the fact that there's not much puzzle-solving to the game.[h1]Tired hands? - Sorcery![/h1]
 ⠀⠀Hard times have come, because the powers of the magician are not unlimited. An interesting puzzle game where we are waiting for 15 levels of puzzles.

<GameId>2206730</GameId>
<GameName>Self : Monica</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Self is a game about Monica, an old woman who has forgotten most of her cherished memories. One day, her childhood cat appears on her windowsill and offers her memories through dreams she once had. But the dreams are fragmented into pieces that she must put together, and with each piece, she connects she reveals a part of her past.<h2 class="bb_tag">Reveal the fragments of her dreams</h2>Luna, the cat that you looked after when you were a child, has now come back to visit you as a spirit. Luna wants to help you piece together the life that you have now forgotten by offering you pieces of your dreams. As you piece together and pattern match these pieces, slowly, your life begins to reveal itself.<h2 class="bb_tag">Discover the story of Monica</h2>As you piece together the pieces of your dreams, you will also discover your memories, your wisdom, and the lessons you learnt living your beautiful life.<h2 class="bb_tag"> A puzzle story game</h2>With self, you have to piece together your dreams. The mechanics are rooted in Jigsaw puzzles but reimagined with a story system that reveals itself as you progress through the game.<h2 class="bb_tag">FEATURES</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>A story-based puzzle game<br></li><li>Relaxing pattern matching puzzle system to reveal the dreams of Monica<br></li><li>10 different dreams to uncover, each with 50 wisdom and story points to unlock<br></li><li>Each dream you unlock uncovers the story of Monica<br></li><li>Written by a BAFTA New Talent nominated film-maker<br></li><li>An exploration of old age</li></ul> 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

He dons an elegant attire reminiscent of a fantasy world and wears his long flowing hair down.<br><br>You’ve been mesmerized, when he opened his mouth and said, “You died again!”<br><br>His haughty voice snapped you back to reality. “H-Huh?!”<br><br>“Go back and find more artifacts, or else we’ll die for real!”<h2 class="bb_tag">Planned Features: depending on budget</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li> 3D Map Exploration<br></li><li> Dress Up<br></li><li> Dating Sim / Life Sim<br></li><li> Hack and Slash<br></li><li> Choose Your Own Adventure<br></li><li> Female Protagonist (can add an option for other genders if there’s enough demand for it)<br></li><li> Pet (please tell me what pet you want: cat, dog, pigeon, frog, etc.)</li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Platforms</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li> Windows: This is the initial platform during the development<br></li><li> Android/iOS: If the game has enough people wanting to play it, I’d start a KickStarter to fund the development for mobile phones<br></li><li> Switch: Same with Android/iOS</li></ul>

<GameName>Star-Crosst</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>War is rough. Rebuilding isn’t easy. But we all start somewhere.</strong><br><br>The year is 2211. Nine years ago, the Earth was attacked by an invasive alien species. They used a superweapon that altered the Earth’s atmosphere, causing intense weather changes in the space of hours, creating hurricanes in jungles and blizzards in deserts. They made no attempts to communicate. Humans had taken to calling them ‘riklid.’<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206870/extras/2.png?t=1669412591" /><br><br>And today, the humans won. The riklid retreat after being dealt a decisive blow.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206870/extras/1.jpg?t=1669412591" /><br><br>You play as Ezra Foy, a young twenty-something coming out of their senior year at university. For Ezra, it feels like time had stopped: the war effort was all anyone could focus on, and now that peace has finally been won again, the time for revelry and relationships has begun. Choose between three love interests, each with their own deep branching storylines and hundreds of lines of dialogue; enjoy a futuristic setting involving people and places of all different walks of life, including a friendly lizard-like alien species known as the Ghians; and decide what the best course of action should be living in a post-war era, and what we as individuals can do for our future.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206870/extras/3.png?t=1669412591" /> 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
