<GameName>Steel Revenant</GameName>
<CONTENT>
In the middle of a termination mission Model-75, a biomechatronic unit, malfunctions abruptly. In the end he finds himself back in the embedded virtual training simulation, but this time it's not all bullets and covers. He must use a different arsenal of weapons in unknown territories where he should try to find answers and means to survive.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206890/extras/Splitter_Swords_Blue.png?t=1668708470" /><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Dodge, push, block and use your weapons to eliminate your enemies in melee based combat. Use the environment to gain time and advantage. Make sure you have ammo for your ranged weapon to stop distant attackers!<br><br></li><li>Fight against waves of enemies in 7 different levels, each with a unique finale or a boss fight.<br><br></li><li> Beware of Disruptors! They will try to make your journey come to an end shorter than you expect. Disruptors are enemies with unusual attacks and abilities, using the environment in their favor in unimaginable ways. <br><br></li><li>Create different builds according to your playstyle using 21 softwares and 6 hardwares upgrades to help you survive various difficult situations. Choose your hardware wisely; some of them can get you out of trouble in the direst situations. Try them out at your Hub before you set out!<br><br></li><li>Upgrade your weapons to optimize the best output against threats. Each weapon can have different stats which will affect their impact against crowd and armor. Play around with them! </li></ul><br><br><strong>Plans for post release:</strong><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Twitch Integration: Add more variety to the game with random events whether you are a streamer or not.<br></li><li>Modding support.</li></ul><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206890/extras/Splitter_Swords_Red.png?t=1668708470" />

<GameName>Canterz Paranormies 2</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Canterz Paranormies 2 is a 2D Top Down survival horror game based on the story of the most renowned paranormal investigation team of the US called &quot;Canterz Paranormies&quot; who got a request to investigate the house located in Kentucky, which is haunted by the spirits of the cemetery located a few miles away from the property.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206930/extras/cp2_gif_4.gif?t=1667623467" /><br><br>The Paranormal investigation team got a call from Jun, the owner of the Kentucky house, with a request to investigate her property. She said that an Evil spirit followed her home from the cemetery which she visited a few weeks ago for attending a funeral of one of her close relatives who passed away recently. A day after she returned home from the graveyard the paranormal activities started to pick up. Every day, she experienced the various paranormal activities like seeing dark apparitions, furniture moving on their own, unexplained banging noises, disembodied growling and laughing sounds, and foul smell coming from the basement area. <br><br>She was feeling uneasy living in her own home and desperately needed help in order to get rid of this entity from her house. On top of that, she was really concerned for the safety of her family and her kids. So, she asked the 'Canterz Paranormies' team to investigate her home for the paranormal evidence and assist her to get rid of the dark entity for good.<br><br>You play as James, the lead paranormal investigator of the 'Canterz Paranormies' team and your mission is to help her out at all costs! Are you ready to accept the challenge?<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206930/extras/cp2_gif_1.gif?t=1667623467" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Key Features:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Explore the entire Kentucky haunted house!</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Use the various kinds of scientific equipment like Rem pod, SLS, Night vision cameras etc.</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Lots of Evil spirits lurking in the shadows.</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Explore the Spirit world, cemetery and basement area!</li></ul><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Nearly half an hour of paranormal investigation!</li></ul><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2206930/extras/cp2_gif_2.gif?t=1667623467" />

<GAME>
<GameId>2206960</GameId>
<GameName>Cloud House</GameName>
<CONTENT>
In the midst of the 2020 pandemic, when performing arts spaces were forced shut, a team of creative and tech collaborators began a mammoth task to document Centre 42's beloved blue house as its own virtual world. Through the process of photogrammetry, we captured a digital rendering of the building. The desire stemmed from preserving memories, but it led to the curiosity in exploring and expanding opportunities to create theatre and build community beyond physical spaces.<br />
<br />
The Cloud House multi-player journey brings the player to a futuristic rendering of Centre 42. It is an invitation to explore its new imagining and the wider virtual world. You will encounter our very first theatrical experience titled 'Love Letters to 42', a single-player filmic story shot in 2020 that captures the history of pre-pandemic C42 at 42 Waterloo Street.<br />
<br />
In Cloud House, audiences can encounter arts performances, experiences, workshops and interact with artists and other audiences. It is also an invitation and opportunity for digital artists, theatre-makers to imagine their works to be presented in this space. The content, programmes, interactivity functions are being imagined and built as ‘modules’ and updates along the way after this initial launch. The digital possibilities are endless!<br />
<br />
Please note: the multiplayer environment features bright neon lights and special effects, discretion is advised. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2206970</GameId>
<GameName>Keepers of the Forest</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<strong>The Forest is in Danger.</strong> <br>Evil forces are absorbing what magic remains and destroying all in their path. Gain ancient knowledge from powerful spell books long forgotten and create alliances with magical creatures and Gods. Build your strength and defeat the invading forces.<br><br>As a Keeper it is your sworn promise to protect the forest and maintaining the balance.<br><br>Build your strength and defeat the invading forces. <br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Use coins to build your deck <br></li><li>Combine coins to gain more valuable coins<br></li><li>Use your coins to acquire powerful spells and allies.</li></ul><br>Gain ancient knowledge from powerful spell books long forgotten.<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Acquiring spell books will give you knowledge of ancient magic.<br></li><li>Combine magic spells to increase your mastery of the ancient, giving you more powerful spells.<br></li><li>The power of Destruction and Healing await the chosen one.</li></ul><br>Create alliances with magical creatures and Gods.<br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Many mysterious and mystical creatures reside in the forest.<br></li><li>Gain their favor for additional strategic advantage.<br></li><li>With enough favor you can sway the Gods to dominate your enemy.</li></ul><br><br>Keepers of the Forest is an epic, 2 player deck building game. Can be played alone against the computer or two local players can battle it out. Choose your hero to begin. Each of the 4 choices offers a different special ability (listed on each card) such as never having to discard or piercing through your opponent's protection with every damage dealt.<br><br>Each player starts with the same 10 starter cards. Use the coins you draw into your hand to acquire new cards from the Keepers Row. Each card may give you health, damage, protection, more coins, or a combination of these. There are also many Keepers you can acquire that will allow you to do special things (written on each card). Some special rules include refreshing the keepers row - discarding up to all 5 of the drawn keepers and drawing new ones from the deck into the keepers row, combining cards in your discard pile, or immediately gaining spells into your discard pile. Cards may also require you to discard, or may allow you to draw an extra card, or even make your opponent discard a card (these are denoted as icons on the bottom of each card).<br><br>The first player to bring their opponent to their knees, down to 0 health, wins! 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

<GameName>Footgun: Underground</GameName>
<CONTENT>
You wake up sometime in the future in a cryo capsule. You don't know who you are. But one thing is clear: you must survive to escape this post-apocalyptic madness.<br>Footgun:Underground has a very special challenge: master your futuristic ball-shaped weapon to smash all enemies. When their pink mutant slime spreads across the walls of the subway network, you've won. Fight your way through random rooms and don't give up. You're on your own and the dungeon gets harder and harder as you progress. But you are brave and strong. Level up, find valuable loot and become more and more powerful to successfully move forward through the dark depths of the underground. Beware of especially strong boss monsters that stand in your way. Defeat them to finally fight your way to out.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2>Explore the dungeon in your own way. Each new run is unique with a random sequence of rooms and rewards. This way you can develop your own play style.<br>Unlock different game characters with special features. Earn more than 20 randomly appearing futuristic items that give your character special attributes.<br>Each room is filled with post-apocalyptic mutant enemies. Find rooms with extra strong boss monsters and level up to defeat them. After each room you can choose how your journey continues.<br>Your weapon must be played with special skill. Hit the ball at the right angle and use everything at your disposal to direct it at the enemies. Make them burst with your ball.  Find more than 20 high tech upgrades to give your ball unique abilities.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠈⠳⣄⣀⡴⠋⠀I really don't get a few things .. #1. Why it has good reviews? so far ...  This is a game that takes forever to get to a point of some kind of challenge . Several levels won and Im just bored. Repetitive! . Its not a BAD game per say its just , well its just There . The Music is pretty decent .  #2. You are seriously charging $29.99 for this? ive seen better Free Games with the same idea but with better controls , and faster gameplay .. I can not recommend this .Changed my review to negative as the price went up to 30$.  This game is not worth 30$.  2$ at the very most.

Bought this game for a couple cents right after it came out, cuz I thought the little bang-bang guy looked cute.  Gameplay is quite fun, and the weapon variety keeps the gameplay from getting boring or repetitive.  While the game did release with a handful of bugs, the dev team was quick to fix them.

My only qualms with this game: enemy variety is lacking (there's just one enemy type, who comes in two very similar colors), and the lack of story is abysmal.  Seriously, who is this bang-bang guy?  Why is he in a furry village?  Is that hose thing his nose, or just coming out of his right eye socket?  The world needs to know!

I also wish there was more to this game in general - bosses, new areas, more weapons and playable characters to unlock… I’d love that, as unlikely as it is that such an update would happen.

Other than that, great game, 10/10II GET TO KILL MEN (and women i don't discriminate)If the game was $0.50 like when I got it then it is worth it just to say you have this game. I purchased it three times; one for myself and two for friends.

I do not recommend this game so people do not pay $30 for a game where you can get all the upgrades in less than half an hour.Oh my god.. This is truly the best game I've ever seen... How I love and adore these hentai games with furry... Simply amazing! For all lovers like me, I recommend, condolences to the rest

<GAME>
<GameId>2205800</GameId>
<GameName>CyberBrick</GameName>
<CONTENT>
CyberBrick brings the classic brick breaking action games of the 1980s and 1990s into the modern era with plenty of frantic fun, wild chaos, and plain ol' good times to the max!<br />
<br />
* Points are scored more by catching gems that fall from the broken bricks than simply breaking the bricks from afar.<br />
<br />
* Bricks sporadically drop both positive and negative power-ups and de-buffs and it's up to you to learn what drops do what.<br />
<br />
* Excellent play earns you extra balls that multiply your score exponentially! <br />
<br />
* Enemies can come in to taunt you and even re-spawn bricks you've previously destroyed!<br />
<br />
* Kill the enemies by becoming precise and accurate with your ball reflections before they rebuild the entire brick wall!<br />
<br />
* Rewarding gameplay ensures a high replay value that will likely have you playing again and again!<br />
<br />
* More features, gameplay modes, levels, and game mechanics will be released over time as more and more players play the game. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>

Most of the core features listed below are available!<br><br>* Play singleplayer, or play with your friends - on our public playtest server or by hosting a server session yourself!<br>* The public server is limited time only and is subject to player cap changes and/or complete shutdown at anytime. The full game will NOT include official servers.<br><br><strong>Survive, shoot, construct, and ride killer elemental robots.<br>Craft equipment, explore multi-floor buildings, build a base, uncover new schematics, and progress through technology tiers.<br>Alone or with friends in this brutal post apocalyptic open world survival robot riding crafting shooter game!</strong><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205810/extras/OVERALL_GIF_SHORT_resized_OPTIMIZED.gif?t=1667550234" /><li><strong>Survive</strong> against robotic creatures using your crafted guns and constructed rideable robots! Dangerous robots will try to take you down with melee attacks and plasma lasers.<br></li><li><strong>Craft</strong> guns, swords, tools, armor, workbenches and forges from technology you unlock and schematics you obtain! Gather natural resources and collect machine parts from fallen robot parts and destroyed robots.<br></li><li><strong>Multi-floor buildings</strong> with killer robots with tons of unique loot and equipment schematics await. Explore houses, multi-floor highrises, tents, garages, bus stations, robot upgrade stations, portals, and more.<br></li><li><strong>Explore &amp; Progress</strong> through a post apocalyptic open world filled with discoveries and dangerous robots. Choose your path, progress through technology tiers, and gain the strength to face new exciting areas and robots.<br></li><li><strong>Construct &amp; Ride</strong> killer robots using gathered resources by weakening and scanning them in the wild. Shoot robots in the weakest spots to cause parts to fall off and deal a ton of damage, or ride your own robots and use them to attack!<br></li><li><strong>Build</strong> your base to store and protect your items, machines, and robots. Alternatively you can also take over existing buildings.<br></li><li><strong>Elemental</strong> robots and elemental guns &amp; swords (Fire, Frost, Shock, Sharp) will be crucial to your journey, but will you be strong enough to obtain them?<br></li><li><strong>Rare Exciting Occurrences</strong> await you in the world, from dark constructor storms to 4 unique rare variations of each robot (which you can scan and construct), you'll always be surprised by what you might find.<br></li><li><strong>Singleplayer &amp; Multiplayer:</strong> join a community server or get your friends to survive the robots and explore the world with you.</li></ul>

<CONTENT>
Manage your clan of dwarves and lead them to victory!<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/dwarf_sword.gif?t=1670352116" /> <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/dwarf_axe.gif?t=1670352116" /> <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/dwarf_archer.gif?t=1670352116" /> <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/dwarf_hammer.gif?t=1670352116" />  <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/dwarf_shield.gif?t=1670352116" /> <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/dwarf_banner.gif?t=1670352116" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Current Features</h2> ⦁ Customize up to 10 dwarves individually!<br><br> ⦁ Equipped items will be visible on each dwarf. <br> ⦁ The class of a dwarf will be determined by its main hand weapon.<br> ⦁ 7 classes: Thief, Knight, Archer, Mage, Priest, Supporter, Warrior<br> ⦁ 7 attack types<br> ⦁ 15 ultimate abilities<br> ⦁ Many different enemy types<br> ⦁ Over 60 equip-able items!<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/dwarf_assassin.gif?t=1670352116" /><h2 class="bb_tag">Gameplay</h2>Survive as many battles as possible. You start with 500 gold and 3 dwarves. The core game loop consists of 3 phases:<br><br><br>1) Event Phase <br>Every round starts with the selection of an event. The player gets to choose from 3 options. There are 3 types of events: BUY, RECRUIT and BATTLE.<br> ⦁ BUY: buy an item for the amount of gold that is displayed<br> ⦁ RECRUIT: recruit an additional dwarf to your clan for the amount of gold that is displayed. Dwarf stats may vary!<br> ⦁ BATTLE: fight the group of enemies that is displayed, this will transition the game into phase 2<br><br>2) Battle Preparation Phase<br>Manage the position and equipment of each individual dwarf or sell items before heading into battle. <br><br>3) Battlefield <br>The battlefield features auto combat. Watch how the battle unfolds based on your previous decisions! If a dwarf dies here, his death will be permanent. Any ultimate ability (shown on the main weapon/shield) will be activated automatically when mana is full.<br><br>For more information you can visit <a href="https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://discord.gg/kwYUam5zfn" target="_blank" rel=" noopener"  >https://discord.gg/kwYUam5zfn</a>.<h2 class="bb_tag">Planned Features</h2> ⦁ Bosses<br><br> <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/troll_animated.gif?t=1670352116" /><br> ⦁ Persistent Skill Tree<br> <img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205850/extras/skill_tree_mockup.png?t=1670352116" /><br> ⦁ Special Classes

<GameName>Witchpunk</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205950/extras/Abouthisgame.png?t=1670241809" /><br><br>Do you like Halloween? Do you like skeletons, pumpkins, and witches on skateboards? And most importantly, do you like bashing robots with giant, magic hammers? If you do, then get out your magic wands and your spraypaint, because we know a game that you'll love!<br><br>Witchpunk is a third-person melee arena combat game where you play as Mollie, a skateboarding witch who battles against a tyrannical corporation seeking to destroy Halloween. Skate around the city and the subway, gaining speed in order to deal devastating blows to robots of all shapes and sizes. Skate faster to slam harder, and use your spells to leave enemies stunned and reeling!<br><br>Backed with a signature funky beat and comic-inspired visuals, you'll have a blast as you take down wave after wave of these no-good robots. Once you've made your mark on the city, you might even get a chance to show a supremely evil businesswoman what you think about her lousy plans!<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205950/extras/Gamefeatures.png?t=1670241809" /><br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>High-speed hammer-bashing skateboard combat.<br></li><li>An array of Halloween-themed robots to demolish.<br></li><li>Bright, comic-like visuals.<br></li><li>Spooky, funky beats!</li></ul><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205950/extras/Aboutdevelopment.png?t=1670241809" /><br><br>This game was developed as a student project at DigiPen Institute of Technology and was created for educational purposes only. Please check out our publisher page for more information. PositiveThis reminds me of the Jet Set Radio and Viewtiful Joe days of gayming.The idea of this game is super cool, and the artstyle is amazing, I can tell a lot of effort went into it

Right now the physics feel a bit floaty though, I don't feel like I'm really in control of the character

Will definitly return to the game if updated, im really looking forward to where this goes!I am ABSOLUTELY IN LOVE with the art in this game, in my eyes it's super unique and entertaining and I could never get tired of it. The way the colors pop out really stand out to me too, it just gives the game a much more vibrant look. The music factors in with this positive review too, it gives me nostalgia. I also love the idea of having something fantasy related tie in with something like skateboarding, I just think it's a super cool and one-of-a-kind concept. Although, it's incredibly easy to not die as there are items in the game that spawn in various places that instantly regenerate your health. It's fairly easy to acquire an outrageous damage boost as well, in some areas even you can sit there and keep the damage multiplier.the witch was definitely punkwitchThe game is short, and could do with more than 1 level, and its not necessarily challenging as it becomes super easy to refill your health completely with heart pickups. The dialog boxes appear while the game is playing, and it becomes difficult to play and read at the same time and some areas allow you to infinitely loop around and gain an insane damage modifier.
But after all the negatives, this game is fun. The artstyle is cool and unique and doesn't distract on what you're even looking at. The sounds and music are good, and the character designs for the player and the enemy's look great. The game plays well and feels snappy, and there is not too much going on to get lost.
TL:DR short fun game with cool ideas and mechanics.This reminds me of the Jet Set Radio and Viewtiful Joe days of gayming.The idea of this game is super cool, and the artstyle is amazing, I can tell a lot of effort went into it

<GameName>RACE: Rocket Arena Car Extreme</GameName>
<CONTENT>
R.A.C.E is an action game set in a post-apocalyptic world of steel monsters and epic battles! Survival racing simulator! Welcome to a unique game where the management, pumping and control of the car at the highest level! Real steel rage in survival races! Get engaged in 3D ultimate race battles, fire rockets and use the protective shield to counter the attack from the enemy. Nitro Boost is mandatory! Collect turbo while you hit that gas pedal and leave all other race cars behind. You decide the rules on the track while you drift, drag, bump, collide, fire and overtake to finish first!<br />
<br />
FAST ACTION RACING IN 3D<br />
Monster trucks, roaring engines, smoking tires, damaging collisions, and above all Speed! R.A.C.E. - Rocket Arena Car Extreme - is full of epic explosions, destruction and effects. Press nitro - get even more adrenaline, and let your enemies breathe dust. The change of day and night, the neon signs and tricks will never let you get bored. If you like to play with beautiful graphics and no brakes, then this is your race car game of choice! You can change the graphics settings to improve the gameplay quality and smoothness.<br />
<br />
THE ULTIMATE RACE BATTLE EXPERIENCE<br />
Your Monster Truck, your arena, your rules! Participate in Arena battles and get straight in to the real action. Burn out your enemies in the derby arena and race them into fire traps, huge morgensterns, chainsaws and other destructive obstacles. This race game is like a real action movie! Rocket Arena Car Extreme (R.A.C.E.) is a burning cocktail of survival races and battles on wheels.<br />
<br />
VARIOUS BATTLE LOCATIONS<br />
Participate in battles of different historical epochs!<br />
<br />
THE BEST ENEMY IS THE BEATEN ENEMY<br />
Crazy and dangerous driving is a good thing in this racing game because risks are needed to beat your enemies. Choose a weapon to your liking: missiles, bombs, machine guns, and various electric weapons.<br />
<br />
BEST ARENA RACE VEHICLES<br />
Win action-packed races and earn rewards to collect your ultimate off-road race car. Make the most out of the vehicles available to you. You will find American muscle cars, European classics and Japanese drift vehicles! Each car is equipped with everything you may need to inflict the maximal damage to your opponents. Those monsters on wheels will cope with any off-road conditions.<br />
<br />
VEHICLES LEVEL-UP SYSTEM<br />
Each vehicle may be leveled up as high as level 30. When a vehicle is leveled up to levels 10, 20 and 30, it gains unique body kits that improve race and battle performance even more.<br />
<br />
NO GASOLINE AND OTHER HINDRANCES<br />
Have you ever wondered if the tank is half full or half empty? The positive attitude rules in this action game - the tank is always full. No need to wait for several hours to restore energy for your car to start racing. You can always rush at full throttle without any limits!<br />
<br />
THE BATTLE ROYALE RACING GAME - ONE AGAINST ALL<br />
Get prepared to battle for the rank. Many players fight to become the first one and to grab the main reward - the all-time champion title. Upgrade your cars, unlock new ones, upgrade your super skills and perks, upgrade your weapons and win on the road!<br />
<br />
MUSIC DESIGNED TO FEEL THE RACING EXPERIENCE <br />
Enjoy the specially designed music to feel the excitement of the spectacular speed and explosive competition during the races.<br />

REALISTIC 3D GRAPHICS <br />
You can change the graphics settings to improve the gameplay quality and smoothness. Unique car skins, colorful and vibrant styles of drawings and car stickers!<br />

<GameName>Dungeon of Death</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Dungeon of Death is a 3D adventure game with RPG elements.In which you will have to explore the dungeon and fight various monsters to find the necromancer who gave you eternal life.You will expect 14 game levels in which you will have to search for a portal to go to the next level in search of a necromancer, but do not think that this will be an easy task because the closer you are to your main enemy, the stronger the enemies will become.<br />
<br />
The main character is tired of the eternal life that the necromancer has endowed him with and decided to end it in order to finally retire, but he will have to go through a huge dungeon in which the necromancer lives, fight with many monsters that guard this dungeon, explore the dungeon to find weapons that will help fight,avoid traps, as well as solving riddles.<br />
<br />
Key Features :<br />
<br />
- Isometric 3D graphics with a touch of nostalgia<br />
<br />
- 14 different levels<br />
<br />
- Various enemies , many different weapons<br />
<br />
- Dark soundtrack 3 user reviewsMINECRAFT 2023.Hardcore gamers should look elsewhere if they are searching for a long game. Dungeon of Death might be up their alley for a casual gamer.

You fight some monsters; collect equipment and health flasks from chests and then move on to the next level.
Complete 14 levels and try to defeat the final boss.An adventure after death, the protagonist is immortal, he is bored with the kind of life he received from the necromancer. Gathering our courage, we move forward on an exciting search for our donor, through dark dungeons that are teeming with various monsters. A considerable arsenal of weapons, armor and heals will help us in our search. The game itself is made in the style of an isometric 3D pixel RPG, which is unusual for the eye.

<GameId>2205270</GameId>
<GameName>Cuana</GameName>
<CONTENT>
Place yourself in the shoes of Johnny with his typical teenage problems. Eat lots of beans, discover the hidden abilities of your body and learn to utilize them to progress in a colorful cartoony universe of Cuana. Master techniques and moves that will help you weasel out of any situation and become a real winner in any scenario. Help Johnny succeed in his oneway relationship with Monica by unleashing smelly hell upon the unwary and treating them with some unexpected gassy surprises such are ordinary raspberries, fart mines, and fart bombs.<h2 class="bb_tag">A VERY GASSY STORY</h2><br>Johnny is a teenager who hates healthy food. His mother forces him to eat beans since a certain psychologist on TV said that mothers need to introduce their kids to a healthy diet. After eating the canned beans, Johnny discovers the hidden abilities of his organism. Now he commands a very powerful weapon of mass destruction... Hmm... Farts... Through mastering this newly acquired superpower, Johnny aims to win the heart of his long-time crush Monica. However, each and every time it doesn't work as expected. Will he manage to overcome his problems, defeat his worst enemy Greg, and make Monica fall in love with him? It's up to you to find out.<h2 class="bb_tag">LEVELS</h2><br>The game features 6 levels - <strong>Bus</strong>, <strong>School</strong>, <strong>Grocery Store</strong>, <strong>Cafe</strong>, <strong>Airport</strong>, and <strong>Airplane</strong> levels. <br><br>Some levels require Johnny to fill the room with unpleasant smells without anyone noticing. Other levels can only be accomplished if Johnny causes enough havoc on the premises. Each level has unique conditions for winning.<h2 class="bb_tag">POTENT WEAPONS</h2><br>Command 3 potent weapons at your disposal - <strong>Ordinary Fart</strong>, <strong>FartBomb</strong>, and <strong>FartMine</strong>.<br><br>Ordinary fart comes in handy to relieve pressure from your stomach, cause havoc, surprise other characters in the game, and even open doors.<br><br>FartBomb can knock out NPCs at a distance. It requires beans to pump enough pressure into your digestive system.<br><br>FartMine is more for tactical players who want to get rid of NPCs that walk around in the game through covert operations. Delivering FartMine requires beans too.<h2 class="bb_tag">DIFFICULTY LEVELS</h2>I can say for sure that you can win Cuana on easy-peasy and normal difficulties. However, even I - the developer of the game, have no idea if it's even possible to win on Gas Bomb difficulty. You gotta find out that for yourself! 3 user reviewsGreat little game. Me and my little brother are having fun playing it.

<GameId>2205510</GameId>
<GameName>WITCH'S</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205510/extras/gameplay.png?t=1670285167" /><br><br>Still in development, Witch's is an action/adventure game with simple and intuitive mechanics, with the ability to send you to a magical and fantasy world where a witch has cursed a kingdom called Farheim. Amid countless obstacles and enemies, you'll have to find a way to reach the witch at the top of the castle.<br><br>Points to note:<br><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Vivid environments with unique music;<br></li><li>Several traps;</li></ul><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205510/extras/Witch_sGIFF.gif?t=1670285167" /><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Mystery rooms to find;</li></ul><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205510/extras/Witch_sGIFFFFF.gif?t=1670285167" /><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Dialogue with the living and spirits;</li></ul><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205510/extras/Witch_s_dialogue.gif?t=1670285167" /><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Inventory where you can change/upgrade weapons;</li></ul><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205510/extras/Witch_s_Inventory.gif?t=1670285167" /><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Variety of enemies, weapons and more!</li></ul><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205510/extras/Story.png?t=1670285167" /><br><br>In a world of pure magic you are a knight belonging to Farheim, and you have been tasked with fetching a mysterious object from its king Damon in a faraway village called Littlegard. When you return from the small village, you will receive sad news... Farheim was invaded and cursed by an evil witch called Shadora from Shadowheim, you were far from the kingdom, you were the only one not to be cursed. Now with the mysterious object, the knight must save Farheim from the witch's clutches!<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205510/extras/casttle.gif?t=1670285167" /><br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205510/extras/Creator.png?t=1670285167" /><br><br>This game is being developed entirely by a single person, keep in mind that Witch's will be constantly updated and improved with new features until it reaches its perfection. The final battle with the witch is not yet programmed in this version. 1 user reviewsWITCH'S is one of the most videogamey fantasy games, and I can't help but admire its earnest style. There are sparkly, mystical sound effects when you do anything of importance, the HUD -while minimalist- evokes simple arcade titles, and the world itself -floating unchained in an ethereal void- makes it feel like you're playing on the edge of imagination, pressing against the border of reality. You may have seen these art assets and ideas before, but WITCH'S knows how to use them really, really well. It all feels like playing with tiny figurines, as a child, and strongly evokes the Toybox Takeover game mode from Disney Infinity, especially given the overhead perspective.

When we strip away the romanticism, we have a light action-rpg here, but like the presentation, it excels with what little it has. The level design is thoughtful, with tight corridors that encourage skilled movement, where you quickly learn to prioritize your resources and tackle enemies in the most efficient order. Each encounter feels like its own lighting fast puzzle, bolstered by your limited number of ranged weapons, and how swiftly the enemies perish. Your health refills on its own, but only to half, ensuring each fight is tense, but also gives you a fair shot at victory.

The game is currently in Early Access, and can be finished in about 30 minutes, but what's here is really good.WITCH'S is one of the most videogamey fantasy games, and I can't help but admire its earnest style. There are sparkly, mystical sound effects when you do anything of importance, the HUD -while minimalist- evokes simple arcade titles, and the world itself -floating unchained in an ethereal void- makes it feel like you're playing on the edge of imagination, pressing against the border of reality. You may have seen these art assets and ideas before, but WITCH'S knows how to use them really, really well. It all feels like playing with tiny figurines, as a child, and strongly evokes the Toybox Takeover game mode from Disney Infinity, especially given the overhead perspective.

When we strip away the romanticism, we have a light action-rpg here, but like the presentation, it excels with what little it has. The level design is thoughtful, with tight corridors that encourage skilled movement, where you quickly learn to prioritize your resources and tackle enemies in the most efficient order. Each encounter feels like its own lighting fast puzzle, bolstered by your limited number of ranged weapons, and how swiftly the enemies perish. Your health refills on its own, but only to half, ensuring each fight is tense, but also gives you a fair shot at victory.

The game is currently in Early Access, and can be finished in about 30 minutes, but what's here is really good.WITCH'S is one of the most videogamey fantasy games, and I can't help but admire its earnest style. There are sparkly, mystical sound effects when you do anything of importance, the HUD -while minimalist- evokes simple arcade titles, and the world itself -floating unchained in an ethereal void- makes it feel like you're playing on the edge of imagination, pressing against the border of reality. You may have seen these art assets and ideas before, but WITCH'S knows how to use them really, really well. It all feels like playing with tiny figurines, as a child, and strongly evokes the Toybox Takeover game mode from Disney Infinity, especially given the overhead perspective.

When we strip away the romanticism, we have a light action-rpg here, but like the presentation, it excels with what little it has. The level design is thoughtful, with tight corridors that encourage skilled movement, where you quickly learn to prioritize your resources and tackle enemies in the most efficient order. Each encounter feels like its own lighting fast puzzle, bolstered by your limited number of ranged weapons, and how swiftly the enemies perish. Your health refills on its own, but only to half, ensuring each fight is tense, but also gives you a fair shot at victory.

The game is currently in Early Access, and can be finished in about 30 minutes, but what's here is really good.

<GameName>Battle Drones: Red Rock Resistance</GameName>

<strong>Welcome to Red Rock. Will you survive the onslaught of <i>A-EYE</i> enemy drones?</strong><br><br>Battle Drones: Red Rock Resistance is a 3D top-down shooter set in a reimagined version of Red Rock, New Mexico. It's the post-drone war era, a supposed time of peace. You'll find yourself in the desert equipped with nothing more than a military drone, a handgun and a knife to fend off the incoming waves of hostile drones sent from the evil megacorporation <i>A-EYE</i>. Luckily, famous drone parts salesman Solomon Burgundy has a shop nearby! You’ll be sure to pay him a visit if you need new guns, ammo and even drone insurance…<br><br>What sinister intentions does the <i>A-EYE</i> mega-corporation have planned? What will become of the Battle Drones Championship when everyday competitors continue to disappear, only to be replaced by A.I. drone pilots?<br><br>Red Rock Resistance (RRR) is the debut game title for our community to experience the Battle Drones universe. Join us on our journey in building the next generation of games.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2205520/extras/BD_STEAM_GIF_2.gif?t=1669865307" /><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><h2 class="bb_tag">Choose your arsenal!</h2>Uncover a range of unique weapons, from katanas to shotguns, missiles to ray guns, and equip a loadout that works for you against the various enemy types!<br><br></li><li><h2 class="bb_tag">Discover new frontiers!</h2>Explore Red Rock! <GAME>
<GameId>2204650</GameId>
<GameName>Last Days Of Future</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">Explore this post apocalyptic future</h2><br>Last Days Of Future is a post-apocalyptic survival game set in 2765. You have just woken up in the back of an old bunker, you are alone and probably one of the last survivors of the human species. Go on an adventure to discover what happened to this world that evolved without you and find answers to your questions.<br><br>Use what you find to craft useful items for your survival by exploring ruins and abandoned buildings. But beware of the dangers lurking. Some areas will require more preparation than others with much greater dangers.<h2 class="bb_tag">Manufacturing and construction</h2><br>The crafting system is scalable and doesn't require long hours to level up and unlock new stuff. You will have to dismantle what you have at hand and try combinations of objects, the results will be varied and not always effective, but it is by trying that you learn.<br><br><img src="https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/2204650/extras/DescriptionImg01.jpg?t=1668694745" /><br><br>You can establish your base wherever you want, whether in a house that you barricade or in the middle of nature by putting up the walls and fences yourself to feel safe at night.<br>Recovery will also be important to improve your daily life, survival is good but with electricity it's better! Why not even a pet robot that will do the tasks for you.<h2 class="bb_tag">Play Solo and co-op</h2><br>Whether you're a solo adventurer or prefer community living, Last Days Of Future lets you have the experience you desire. Players versus players is possible, friendly fire too but if you want survival only it is also a possibility and you have the choice to leave the game public or private. In-game communication is done in a realistic way, if you are too far away you will not be heard. The sessions are dynamic, your friends (or enemies) can join you whenever they want.<h2 class="bb_tag">The world evolves with you</h2><br>As you advance in Last Days Of Future, new elements will be offered to you and the discoveries and experiences you will have will make you a better survivor.<br>The seasons will have their importance on your survival which will force you to find solutions to warm you up or feed you for example.<br>Random events may occur to upset your daily life. 
</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2204710</GameId>
<GameName>Green Garden</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">General</h2><br><strong>Green Garden</strong> is an <strong>addicting game</strong> in which you have to solve puzzles with <strong>Lovely Girls</strong><br><br><strong>Incredible Atmosphere</strong>, <strong>Great Music</strong>,<strong> lots of levels with girls art in HD quality.</strong><br>The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Several difficulty levels.<br></li><li><strong>Relaxing gameplay</strong><br></li><li><strong>5 HD quality art with beautiful girls</strong><br></li><li><strong>Pleasant atmosphere.</strong></li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Modes:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>EASY</strong> - 4x4<br></li><li><strong>MEDIUM</strong> - 4x6<br></li><li><strong>ADVANCED</strong> - 6x10<br></li><li><strong>HARD</strong> - 8x14<br></li><li><strong>EPIC</strong>- 10x16</li></ul> 1 user reviews[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Green Garden is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Rosa Special Studio, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

It gets worse... the Jigsaw Github template has been shamelessly dumped on Steam by Rosa Special Studio a whopping 62 times.  That's got to be a world record for the most asset flip scams from the same template.  Here's some of them so you can see for yourself:

Take a look... these are all [i]exactly the same game![/i]

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Rosa Special Studio.
[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Green Garden is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Rosa Special Studio, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2204720]Sunny Memories[/url]"
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1777550]Fuyu no Tsuma[/url]"
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592550]My Sweet Ants![/url]"
[/list]

Take a look... these are all [i]exactly the same game![/i]

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Rosa Special Studio.

</CONTENT>
</GAME>
<GAME>
<GameId>2204720</GameId>
<GameName>Sunny Memories</GameName>
<CONTENT>
<h2 class="bb_tag">General</h2><br><strong>Sunny Memories</strong> is an <strong>addicting game</strong> in which you have to solve puzzles with <strong>Lovely Girls</strong><br><br><strong>Incredible Atmosphere</strong>, <strong>Great Music</strong>,<strong> lots of levels with girls art in HD quality.</strong><br>The game is great for relaxing after a hard day.<h2 class="bb_tag">Features</h2><ul class="bb_ul"><li>Several difficulty levels.<br></li><li><strong>Relaxing gameplay</strong><br></li><li><strong>5 HD quality art with beautiful girls</strong><br></li><li><strong>Pleasant atmosphere.</strong></li></ul><h2 class="bb_tag">Game Modes:</h2><br><ul class="bb_ul"><li><strong>EASY</strong> - 4x4<br></li><li><strong>MEDIUM</strong> - 4x6<br></li><li><strong>ADVANCED</strong> - 6x10<br></li><li><strong>HARD</strong> - 8x14<br></li><li><strong>EPIC</strong>- 10x16</li></ul> 1 user reviews[quote][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Asset_flip]Warning: Asset Flip![/url][/quote]

Sunny Memories is an asset flip, what Valve calls a "fake game".  The "developer", Rosa Special Studio, took the [url=https://github.com/Shit-Just-Got-Real-Studios/Jigsaw]Jigsaw[/url] Unity game template/demo from the real developers, Sh*t-Just-Got-Real Studios, changed the name and added a couple (about 3) stock/low effort images of "anime girls", and dumped the result onto Steam.  They're attempting to scam people into buying this, so they can get your money for someone else's work.

It gets worse... the Jigsaw Github template has been shamelessly dumped on Steam by Rosa Special Studio a whopping 61 times.  That's got to be a world record for the most asset flip scams from the same template.  Here's some of them so you can see for yourself:

    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1706440]Island of Girls Dreams[/url]"
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1871810]Otome No Himitsu[/url]"
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1891570]Sokonashi No Me[/url]"
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1777550]Fuyu no Tsuma[/url]"
    [*] "[url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1494220]Soft Wind[/url]"
[/list]

Take a look... these are all [i]exactly the same game![/i]

"Jigsaw" is just a free Github jigsaw template for Unity mobile apps, and doesn't have any merit as a proper, fully fledged PC game, so this lame copy of that template is impossible to recommend.

Asset flips don't involve any professional game development.  All Rosa Special Studio does here is change the puzzle images and then dump the exact same game with different images onto Steam as a cash grab.  Asset flips like this are harmful to the gaming industry and to Steam because they reduce the visibility that sincerely made indie games should have, and make it harder for gamers to find real games from genuine developers.

Don't reward this morally bankrupt, unethical behaviour from Rosa Special Studio.

</CONTENT>
</GAME>

With unique controls that capture the nuanced capabilities of unicycling, alongside that nostalgic goal oriented gameplay formula of video games past, STREET UNI X is guaranteed to leave you aching for one more run as you brush up your skills to match those of the pros.<br />
